This camp will be a place to spread different cultures and teachings from all over the world for all that want to learn. We are honored by our Two Spirit community that support and are an integral part of our camp. The camp will be safe space for all Indigenous people for all over the world and allies. It is a place where people can learn and share traditions, foods before and after colonization, games, languages, and music. We will host interactivity events-based food and the gathering of people.
landmark: IPOW sign out front - many flags

name: Teddies
description: Themed parties, food, bar & tunes all week. Cuddle with Bears & more in the Teddy dome, open 24/7
landmark: Teddy bear head in the sky

name: Kentucky Fried Camp
description: Kentucky Fried Campers only need one spice, and that's the spice of life. And if you want some, join us any time of day or night. We begin each morning with the best hot breakfast in Black Rock City; a shot of good Kentucky bourbon served with a fried baloney sandwich. Afternoons you'll find us relaxing in our Olde Kentucky Dome, crafting, napping, music making, perhaps a bit of gossiping, and lots of just watching the Black Rock City whirled go by. Evenings are for dancing and more music making. Look for the KFC high in the sky and then spot our gingham-wrapped dome. Kentucky Fried Campers have been waiting for y'all!
landmark: red gingham wrapped dome and baloney shack

name: Celestial Bodies
description: For 21 years, Celestial Bodies has been your friendly, all inclusive, gay bar on the playa. Brining you fun, daily events in a welcoming environment.
landmark: Large bar blue walls with space scenes on panels.

name: Cloud 9
description:
We are a live music, deep ancestral camp that jumps between mayhem and meditation depending on the day and whether we've had breakfast.

We wish to preserve clean water for future generations. To that end, we will provide only cold beer to the filthy citizens of Burning Man.
landmark: Fire pit and 4 pyramids

name: Oh No You Didn't!
description: Be our guest and get it off your chest at our playa confessional lounge, featuring libelous libations and scornful judgment by our panel of experts. Commiserate with the best as we help keep your shame in perspective.
landmark: Large Pink Canvas Sign "Oh No You Didn't"

name: The Melon Motel
description: Welcome to The Melon Motel, a vibrant oasis in Black Rock City where relaxation meets high-energy sound. By day, our shaded decompression lounge offers a refreshing escape with frozen facials, cooling face masks, and watermelon-infused water to help burners recharge. At night, the space transforms into a dynamic dance floor, featuring curated DJ sets from 10 PM to 6 AM with immersive lighting and an electrifying atmosphere. Whether you're looking to cool down, connect, or dance until sunrise, The Melon Motel is the place to check in and be part of the experience!
landmark: Large Watermelon inflatable bridge entrance.

name: PlayAlchemist
description:
As longtime citizens of Black Rock City, we've seen how Burning Man catalyzes transformation in those who fully embrace it.

PlayAlchemist was born from a dream: to create a space that deepens this journeyâ€”a container for activation, co-creation, and personal alchemy.

Through immersive programming day and night, we foster exploration, introspection, and connection. At its heart stands the Pyramidâ€”a 71-foot-high, 111-foot-base structureâ€”both a crucible of alchemy and a beacon of higher consciousness.

Inside, participants journey through the seven stages of alchemy, while outside, the seven days of Burning Man mirror this transformation, uniting individual and collective evolution.
landmark: The grand illuminated pyramid

name: Khan You Not Conform
description: Have you ever seen someone on playa who looked like they were the most likely to get caught in a dust storm, or the biggest flirt, or simply the most captivating and inviting individual and wanted to recognize that individual? Well now you can! Introducing playa's first absurd awards camp. Come by and make a custom award for that special someone (or yourself), vote for award nominees, or just relax and listen to some not shitty music. We are kid friendly too!
landmark: Colorful Khan heads in gold frames & couches

name: Sonic Soul Tribe
description:
Our Soul is Sonic..  
Sound is our passion - our reason for being... We move in threes - Celebrating the frequency of life an all that is..  through music, dance and art. 

Radically inclusive, we seek to create a magical space for all to connect, plug in and find our own way. We deliver live, world class music and electronic music, an amazing sound system on the playa, art to open your minds and evoke the spirit whatever you came here for!

 Workshops that behold art, music and or dance ranging from fire dancing, salsa dance workshops, frequency healing, and create-an-artwork day.. We bring you an interactive visual delight of art, lasers, video and lighting, dancers, fire performers and other surprises.

Came play with us, that's why we're all here.
landmark: A pyramid encircled by bright sky-reaching lights

name: SoundCloud
description:
Welcome to the SoundCloud. Your cloud-themed portal to high-vibe frequencies and dreamy beats. Weâ€™re a crew of sound enthusiasts serving up elevated sounds from our cozy, cloud lounge. Float with us through ambient bliss, deep grooves, and healing vibrations on the fluffiest clouds in the multiverse.

We are an eclectic collective of sound therapists, healers, ceremonialists, psychedelic therapists, musicians, DJs, and sound enthusiasts, united by a deep love for vibration, frequency, and connection. From meditative sound journeys to soulful beats and heart-opening ceremonies, we offer a full spectrum of sonic experiences designed to uplift, align, and inspire.

At our dreamy cloud-themed lounge on the playa, youâ€™ll find a sanctuary to relax, vibe, and recharge â€” wrapped in soft textures, loving energy, and surround-sound goodness. We also roam the dust in style aboard Claudius, our custom cloud art car, sharing healing frequencies and danceable grooves wherever we float.

Whether youâ€™re seeking stillness, movement, or just good vibrations, SoundCloud is here to carry you â€” gently, playfully, and powerfully â€” on waves of sound and spirit.
landmark: Light up Pink Cloud & Wings & Colorful Circus Tent

name: Camp Touch This
description: Camp Touch This is diverse crew of artists, tradespeople, medical professionals, teachers, seasoned Burners and virgins. Come climb our 4 Story Cuddle Puddle, participate in pixie bike races, or enjoy one of our resident DJ dance parties. Wet Woody Wednesday starts around 5pm on Wednesday and is not to be missed!
landmark: 4 story scaffolding with red led lights

name: Hookers & Peggers Naughty Cafe
description: Come for the coffee and stay for the fun! Test your skill on our 10' Hooker & Pegger game, enjoy an erotica reading, or throw a dildo to drench your buddy! Don't forget to take a complimentary porno mag while you're at it.
landmark: 10' tall purple ring & hook game w lit disco ball

name: BuddhaCamp @ the Lotus Dome
description: Our mission is to share the principles of radically inclusive Buddhism and mindfulness with the playa - along with meditation, self-awareness, love and compassion for self and others. We also serve delicious coffee and tea in our cheerful cafe to fuel your adventures.
landmark: Multi-colored flame mimicking lights + Dome

name: Luminos
description: Come make a gourd lantern with us! We provide the gourds, tools, and know-how to help you make a beautiful gourd lantern that you can take home with you.
landmark: Large Dome with gourds out front and bike racks

name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse
description: The best big, fat, kitty-loving teahouse on the playa.  Come get some shade, couches and tea, tea, tea 24/7.  If you come at the right time you might catch a performance, a wandering piano player tickling the keys, some aerialists, fire spinners or just some fabulous conversation at the tea bar.
landmark: Big, white, saddle-span tent

name: Giants Workshop
description: We could be anythingâ€¦
landmark: Free standing saloon doors + Giant's Workshop sign

name: Aah Wonder
description: Aah Wonder Camp  offers a sampling of savory and sweet round tasty bites and beverages inspired by our members' favorite experiences traveling around the world. While waiting for your fresh off the griddle treat, step into our shaded lounge space with rugs, pillows, and cool mist fans. There, you can relax and enjoy connecting with new people and playing conversational and hands-on games. All ages welcome!
landmark: Brightly colored Bedouin style tent

name: Vines Without Borders
description: A chill international wine bar and lounge open afternoons and evening daily, gifting great chilled wines and snacks from around the world, served by people from around the world.  We celebrate a different wine producing region daily.  Great music, fun people, curated tastings and something new every day.
landmark: Bug Light at about 15 feet in the front of our bar

name: Galactic Cruzaders
description:
A JOURNEY OF TIME AND SPACE 
Galactic Cruzaders - the true international camp bringing in folks from all over the world.  Stop by for Wednesday Night cocktails in formal attire. Sit your ass down and get warm around the camp fire on every night. And stop by and listen to what our DJ's are spining, or join in with the live band when they play.
landmark: Car Wash of Tomorrow (sign)

name: VCamp - Vibrations in the Desert
description: CampV â€“ Vibrations in the Desert offers a unique sound immersion experience designed to relax, ground, and awaken the senses. Our Vibration Lounge features specially designed beds equipped with built-in subwoofers that emit deep, resonant frequencies, creating full-body vibrations that promote mindfulness and presence. Visitors are invited to pause, tune in, and journey through curated soundscapes that inspire relaxation, clarity, and connection. Step into our space, close your eyes, and let the vibrations carry you to a place of inner balance.
landmark: large "V" shaped sign

name: Hang-Out, the
description: Welcome to our hammock oasis, where ethereal visions of community unfold beneath the swaying sails of wonder and delight. Here, vibrant hammocks create a mosaic of color, gently cradling souls seeking solace and connection. Sunlight filters through, casting playful shadows while laughter dances on the breeze. Friends share stories and dreams, weaving together their hopes in a tapestry of shared moments. Aromas of herbal teas swirl around as spontaneous music resonates, inviting everyone to join in harmony. The atmosphere is charged with kindness, where creativity flourishes and inspiration flows like a river. In this haven, every heartbeat aligns, celebrating the beauty of togetherness and the magic that emerges when spirits unite with love.
landmark: 30 foot tall mast w/ LARGE beige shade sails.

name: TRANCEylvania
description: Soup'a Place. Join us in our interactivity nights for a hot mug of traditional Romanian soup, shots and fine tunes. Followed by coffee in certain mornings.
landmark: Colorful Entrance Wooden Gate and Red Laser

name: Shotski Wanderlust
description: Shotski Wanderlust, we have it all! Shotski's Skiing! Snowboarding! Nipple Dunk Challenge and AprÃ¨s Ski in the lounge!
landmark: Shotski Wanderlust NEON Sign

name: Black Rock City Animal Control
landmark: container with a mural of the desert on side

name: Your Dad's Couch: Chill Zone
description: Providing cold water and a place to chill/escape.  We always enjoy a good conversation and meeting new Burners.
landmark: Spinning Fingers

name: Black Hole Literary Society
description: COME PLAY!! Grow old, not up. By day rest in our shady lounge and hydrate, color, knit, play games and talk. After dark, lose yourself in our 3-D black-light experience! Come flow to some vibey tunes, create a visual masterpiece on our Giant Bright Light, and warm yourself at our campfire. Join us late on Thursday night for 'Elvis Hour' around 8 pm followed by a night of music with words through the decades and psychedelic rock. Friday we welcome ALL for our annual Shabbat potluck at sundown - bring some food to share or simply come and enjoy! We dig high fives, interpretive dance, and hula hoops, meaningful conversation, and old-school burners. WELCOME HOME! We've missed you. Let's share and play.
landmark: 30-ft LED wrapped flagpole and huge "BHLS" letters

name: Red Nose District
description: Red Nose District (RND) has been in existence, in one form or another since 1998. In 2013, we resolved to keep our hearts, minds, and noses RED from now until the end of time! RND has roots and participants in LA, SF, Santa Fe, NYC, Las Vegas, Pacific NW, Canada, Israel, France, & various states & countries around the world. Our members are involved in (or are lovers of) the circus arts, & work to bring our skills & talents to the playa in forms that allow for immersive & participatory experiences for citizens of Black Rock City. Notable past projects/activities include: High Chair Stilt Bar, PedalBump, Muse, Fire Wire, Wheel of Fortune, Zenobia Blanca stilt limo, Mega Mega, Bounce Back, stilt lessons, 30' swings, & circus variety shows of all forms! Come find us on the playa!
landmark: Big Top Circus Tent

name: Vessels of Love
description: Vessels of Love is a sanctuary for the soul, offering a space of deep connection, healing and nourishment. We aim to be a calming space that can soothe friendly souls. Our sacred healing dome hosts shamanic rituals and heart-opening ceremonies. We also provide healing Amazonian elixirs and wholesome foods such as superfood popcorn to uplift the body and spirit. Step into the vessel and surrender to the flow of love.
landmark: 7ft Red Infinity Heart, lit at night

name: Nipple Crime
description: Nipple crime is a Reno based theme camp dedicated to memorable experiences. Come have a drink at our extensive home-brewed bar. Friday's Sensual Hotdog eating contest is our biggest event and won't disappoint. We are mostly a day camp but often have small parties well into the morning.
landmark: Red and White

name: Congee Central
description: ( Fresh HOT Congee)
landmark: Hot Pink and White Congee sign

name: Happy Hanuman
description: Get ready for a wild ride with Happy Hanuman, the grooviest mutant vehicle support camp around! We're a global crew of creative crazies, zooming in from every corner of the planet to unleash our wacky imaginations on the Playa with some seriously epic Mutant Vehicles. But wait, there's more! Our camp is packed with fun goodies for you to exploreâ€”like our totally awesome calligraphy wall! Picture this: a giant white canvas where you can splash, scribble, and paint with water that magically vanishes as it dries. Swing by, say "hi," and let's make some Playa magic together!
landmark: Light beacon and large Happy Hanuman Logo flag

name: Tierra Bomba
description:
Tierra Bomba brings a Latin American flair with a kick to the playa, infusing it with spicy flavors that transport you to a vibrant oasis. Our camp embodies the spirit of Latin hospitality, aiming to foster connections and create magical moments for all who gather under our roof. With open hearts and arms wide open, Bombito's mission is to share our unique blend of Latin culture with the Burning Man community, embracing everyone with the mantra: "Mi casa es tu casa."

Fueled by the energy of Latinos, heavily influenced by Colombian roots, Tierra Bomba is a camp that embraces diversity with open arms. We welcome people from all corners of the globe, including Mexico, Argentina, Italy, France, Turkey, Ghana, Pakistan, and beyond, creating a melting pot of cultures and experiences.
landmark: Palm tree flag, Military tent, net shade structure

name: Desert Healers
description:
A welcoming sanctuary will provide a great refuge for those seeking to rest, meditate, decompress or rejuvenate.
Experience Reiki Sessions with Desert Healers
landmark: 10' posts with planks form X-diamond over the gate

name: Chico Urban Area
description: Climb aboard the Intergalactic Transporter for a trip across the Playa you will never forget! We are happy to give you a cold beverage, space to dance, chill or just meet new people.
landmark: "Intergalactic Transporter" on shade structure

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description:
A celebration of Jazz Music featuring nightly concerts and jam sessions, 
 daytime educational workshops, and a lively bar serving coffee and cocktails.
landmark: Green Dome and purple Jazz Cafe sign

name: Lost Highway
description: Lost Highway is an immersive experience where participants can discover the story of an old, dusty stretch of desert highway that mysteriously disappeared in 1959. This Lost Highway, full of roadside attractions of the era, finally reappeared complete with paranormal, trippy, vintage, and sun baked sights. It's a time capsule from a bygone era, but then the more you look, the more things seem to be a little differentâ€¦
landmark: LoHi Diner neon sign on top of 25 ft metal trailer

name: rEVOLUTION
hometown: Los Angeles, Amsterdam, Finland, Costa Rica
description: rEVOLUTION is both a high energy camp and a chill camp.  We believe that through evolution, we can create a revolution.  We reserve the right to change, to be agents of change and to commit to the Burning Man principles each time we return after our revolution around the sun.  We offer food, beverages, healing through Gamma Breath Work, opportunities to communicate with anyone and fun through dance.  West Coast Swing and Martinis.  Hot dogs, Chili Cheese Dogs, Veggie Dogs, and Gin & Tonic.  We feed your body, soul and sense of freedom.  There are no requirements to visit us, only the ability to participate, act on immediacy and be open to both revolution and evolution.
landmark: Large rectangular white structure with rEVOLUTION

name: The New Barbarians
landmark: 16 foot barbarian tower

name: Camp Random Pants
landmark: Lage CRP Marquee sign and dome/shade with pants

name: Blue CATerpillar
description: Come to the Wonderland Hookah Lounge to enjoy Tribal/Shamanic beats, herbal teas, cool smoothies and a variety of games like Backgammon, Chess, Checkers, Dice Poker, Spy, The Hat, Catan, CodeNames, UNO, etc. For those looking for more active entertainment we have a foosball, and the fire pit at night, so put your best foot forward!
landmark: Big Blue CATerpillar Figure, lit at night

name: Camp Elektra
description: Come visit us and ride on our beautiful Dragon Elektra and hang out at the Dragon's Lair Lounge while sipping on a cold beverage and dancing to the beats of our camp DJs!
landmark: Three white peaks of our tents and Elektra banners

name: Enrichment.Institute
description:
The Aperture Science Enrichment Center ("Portal") has joined forces with The Institute ("Fallout") to form the Enrichment.Institute

The Enrichment.Institute reminds you that the Weighted Companion Cube will never threaten to stab you and, in fact, cannot speak. However, any advice it does give you should be radically included.

The Weighted Companion Cubes are from the computer game "Portal"; this year there will be two, one companion cube and one steampunk cube. They are single rider, mutant vehicles, mobile art pieces, a 3 foot square cube, with sound and lights.

Remember, the cake is a lie!

The Portal Enrichment.institute hosts the Weighted Companion Cube Mutant Vehicles.
landmark: White mesh conduit shade structure and Starlink.

name: CURB
description: CURB your expectations.
landmark: Reno Arch emblazoned CURB

name: Fake Moon Factory
description: Fake Moon Factory is an international team of Burners dedicated to bringing art to Burning Man. Led by Australian artist Clayton Blake, the team has contributed monumental art to the event for four years, including the iconic "Perpetual Consumption" shopping cart sculpture in 2018. They have since exhibited significant artworks like "Containerisation" (2019), "Toxic" (2022), and the 26ft stainless steel rocket "Odyssey" (2023). In 2025, they return with their most ambitious project yet, "Vertica", a monumental, inhabitable, stainless steel sculpture that explores themes of progress, ambition, and the complex risks inherent to modern society.
landmark: Bus with name and wrapped graphics of FMF.

name: The Balls Depot
description:
Your Neighborhood Balls Improvement Store.

"Do Yourself"
landmark: 4" tall The Balls Depot sign. Its oragne and white

name: Metal Detected
description: Calling all metal heads! Open stage to bang out sick tunes. Jam on a open mic/instrument stage and meet other musicians. Can't play? Nightly karaoke with backing tracks or live bands. Come metal detect or get metal detected - your choice!
landmark: Metal Detected sign and lighted stage

name: Sozo Experience
description: Sozo Experience is open for those looking for inner or outer healing, and for those wanting more of the supernatural! We offer venerative and regenerative meditation, drum circles, spiritual readings, healings, and an experimental "Dopamine Dump" experience. So get some caffeinated exotic coffee with us in the morning, or come to afternoon thought provoking and interactive workshops on desert survival, or exploring the unseen world. Our crew is from the fabulous Chai Lounge-so if inclined, join us for a truth ceremony, or check out the menu board of spirituality!
landmark: Sozo Experience (banners)-detail TBA. +HAM radios

name: YOUniversal Teahouse
description:
YOUniversal Teahouse offers a Iranian / Persian Tea House, daily from 12pm to 8pm.

Come by for Iranian tea, exotic desert drinks / sherbets and yummy artisanal treats like sohan (saffron brittle) all served with a dose of Iranian / Persian Mysticism and loving hospitality that Iranian Sufi mystics like Rumi, Hafez and Ferdowsi would be proud of! :)

On Wednesday night we will host an open Iranian Dinner Party that should not be missed.  Authentic home-made Iranian food / stews / rice and tadeeg on the Playa!!

 Come on, what more could you ask for?
landmark: Wooden Teahouse  structure by Greg Fleishman

name: The Pleasure Dairy
description: Finally, what you've been waiting for! A Burning Man Camp that reimagines the little-known historic phenomenon of pleasure dairies! Think Marie Antoinette but in the Wild West. A place where you can never have too many cows or cow puns. At high noon be udderly refreshed by dairy-alternative craft cocktails at our bar, The Tits, and spend some time in the shade nourishing your connections at our message-in-a-bottle service. After sundown, explore our LED cactus garden and kick up your boots in our cozy lounge. Moo-la-la!
landmark: western fences and 'The Pleasure Dairy' sign

name: Cameltopia
description: You Look Thirsty! Welcome to Cameltopia, your desert oasis and refuge from the sun's heat. You are welcome to pet the camels but please do not feed the animals. Recharge your soul and fill your vessel with premium unleaded H20 at our post-apocalyptic "Route 66" gas station. Our attendants will refuel your canteen while you browse our Inconvenience Store. Monday-Friday 11AM-5PM Playa Standard Time. Wednesday afternoon is our annual "Hump Day" party with an eclectic mix of tail-shaking beats!
landmark: gas station setup on the camp's frontage road.

name: Mindless Movement
description:
Come empty your mind and be intentionally aware of the present moment via embodied play with our many mental wellness mindLess movement activities and toys.

"To find your heart you've got to lose your mind"
landmark: Vertical twister board

name: Eddy Out!
description: We are a salty group of river rats who got eddied out for far too long and have lost our way.... We dally, role play, keep people from getting where they want to go, lure them in with bait, take them fishing, compete in games and generally keep them going in circles. Where were you going? No one knows... got eddied out a while back!
landmark: river raft with a skeleton in it, orange camp flag

name: AdramaNation
description: AdramaNation is an all inclusive and diverse camp focusing on a drama free and fun filled burn.  Engaging workshops, delicious delicacies, hydration, art, weddings, burnercise, and good company are to be found with us.  Whether you need a safe space to escape your drama or a place to meet new friends, you're always welcome here.
landmark: Pink & Yellow Yin Yang Sign

name: AYA
landmark: car ports with various bright color shades

name: Reno Housewives
description: Costuming BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US -- From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.
landmark: Distinctively-shaped shade structure & scaffolding

name: Whiskey and Dust
hometown: Denver, Washington DC, Seattle and more
description:
We are a Whiskey Theme Camp with a habitual yoga problem, as we like to joke.
Serving mid-high end whiskey at our funky little bar.
landmark: Light poles with 10 globes and a big red tent

name: HeckleBerries
description: Who doesn't come to the playa to enjoy getting heckled on your bike, humiliated in a cute way, told to join a crazy party, get fed fresh berries in the hot sun, and enjoy a shot in your mouth with a slap in the face?! The HeckleBerries offer the unique experience of sick burns, sweet berries, shots that offer a consensual face slap, and of course rude babes.
landmark: Lit HeckleBerries sign

name: Homebrew 4A Homebrew
description: We are a daytime bar with cold home brewed beverages, games and a friendly welcoming atmosphere. Enjoy a cold beer (incl. non-alcoholic), cider, mead, soda, and gluten free served daily from 10am until after dark. We have a pool table and daily events including our Playa famous pickle party! Bring your keg and we will refrigerate and tap it, or bring a bottle to share. We have daily pop up events that happen based on the hosts spontaneity. We are adding table games into the mix this year.
landmark: pink dinosaur, chalk board box truck

name: ELEMENTUM
description: Earth. Air. Water. Fire. The place to nurture your nature. Experience the balance and amplification of the four elements through yoga, workshops, sound, and dance parties.  We offer a non-alcoholic bar serving matcha & elemental elixirs daily. We provide flow, connection, and restoration for people of all identities and points of view. Home of the Space Cow People and the MIDNIGHT INFERNO PARTY on Thursday. Magic happens here.
landmark: 60' beige shade structure + 2 belle domes

name: Choo Choo
description: We have two art cars, bipolar express trains, we drive around the playa and play music, this year we will still build art.
landmark: 6 flags with the words choo choo

name: I Taste Purple
description:
Step into a world where a psychedelic dream meets a desert carnival. Look for our kaleidoscope of purples and our signature lips and tongue logoâ€”we're a vibrant, welcoming oasis on the playa.

At our camp, creativity knows no bounds. Join us for crafting, contests, parties, our one-of-a-kind "triathlon," advice of all kinds, and other surprises we dream up each year. Whether you stop by for an activity or just to relax and connect, you'll find a community that feels like home.

Don't miss our legendary Wednesday Night Prom! Dress up (or down), grab a dance partner, and lose yourself in a night of music, mischief, and magic under the stars.

Come share stories, make memories, and, of course, indulge in our signature purple tastings. You never know what magic awaits!
landmark: Purple swing lit banner sandwich boards night lit

name: Kurenivka
description:
Reboot, reconnect, and restore. Our camp offers a sanctuary of relaxation and cultural immersion through the Reboot Experience, a journey designed to refresh your mind, body, and spirit.

Step into our Carpathian Tea Ceremony, where you'll savor herbal blends sourced from the mountains of Ukraine, prepared with care and accompanied by storytelling that weaves together history, tradition, and mindfulness. Then, immerse yourself in the Sound Healing Session, a meditative experience of deep relaxation, where vibrations and frequencies guide you into a state of inner harmony.
landmark: KURENIVKA signage

name: Electric Kool-Aid Balloon Room
description: Our sign says "this is a room full of balloons." What could be inside? Come by and find out!
landmark: sign that says "this is a room full of balloons"

name: Vibe Check
description: Vibe Check is an oasis on the playa, here to welcome you in with a cold drink and a shady place to take a load off. Pull up for a drink at our swing bar or relax in a hammock while meeting new friends and enjoying good music.
landmark: Swing set bar with Vibe Check banner

name: NORSE CODE
landmark: Large Bedouin stretch tents and the NorseCode flag

name: KAIF
description: Step into the cool ambiance of our cozy KAIF Lounge, a haven where relaxation, creativity, and connection come to life. Unwind with a refreshing slushy (virgin, or not?) in a crisp waffle cone, complemented by expertly crafted cocktails. Immerse yourself in spiritual practices, find your rhythm in poi flow workshops, and sip your way into bliss. Whether you seek movement, mindfulness, or just a moment to savor, KAIF Lounge is your escape on the Playa.
landmark: 4 wooden letters "KAIF" in front of a tent

name: Planet Palm Tree
description:
Welcome to Planet Palm Tree, an otherworldly camp for all intergalactic and desert  wanderers alike looking to take a breather, explore new connections, or enjoy good music. 

Our camp welcomes explorers with open arms, and our Alien Welcoming Dance party is no exception â€“ the camp's alien-themed welcome party kicks off. The air is filled with cosmic tunes from our aerospace DJ and the drinks will be plentiful.

At the heart of the camp is a unique mini golf course designed for all ages, with holes out of this world. We will be holding a tournament with a galactic prize for the winners. Even if you're not in the mood to compete, it's the perfect way to enjoy the surreal beauty of your surroundings as you stop by our camp any time of day or night.
landmark: Golf course and palm trees

name: DragonCamp Armory
description: This is a HIGHLY participatory workshop where women will learn to make and decorate their own sexy Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the Playa. Recyclable aluminum is used to hand hammer a custom fit costume using traditional hand metal working techniques used for props in films and space operas. Patterns are provided in a variety of sizes. The thin sheet aluminum is cut by hand and then pounded into custom form at our special work stations. When done, the armor can be decorated with various baubles, bangles and jewelry bits which we supply, Bikinis are secured with nylon thong. We have offered this workshop for several years and they are amazingly popular. Many have told us it is their favorite thing they have done at Burningman.
landmark: Yellow Dragon Banners

name: Iron Monkeys
description: Home to the Iron Monkeys, the creators of (Re) Routing
landmark: blue, tan, green shade, fire pit, Monkey Logo

name: Sunrise Diner
description: The Sunrise Diner is a retro diner serving breakfast, coffee and Elvis to help feed the hungry, the hungover, and the happy-to-be-here burners every morning. Come join us and jam to throwback tunes while waking up right!
landmark: Pink-and-Teal awning, giant neon "Sunrise Diner"

name: The Market
description: Imagine â€“ you are wandering through Playa on your way home from a night of adventure or just starting out in search of adventure. Your stomach growls a bit, maybe you feel just a tiny bit thirsty. From afar you see a gathering of carts, lit up and welcoming. What's going on over there? You pedal towards it and stumble upon The Market. You are suddenly surrounded with stands offering their goods. You eat, you drink, and maybe you even get your future told. As you bumble back home, you wonder â€“ was it a dream? Is this still today, or is it already tomorrow?
landmark: A 3 x 6 ft sign reading The Market, and six carts

name: Emergence
description: The fake ID camp.
landmark: Big owl sign

name: Museum of One
description: The Museum of One (MOO) showcases art, one piece a day. It's an antidote to the experience typical of most museums, where you can't possibly see everything. There is no FOMO at the MOO.
landmark: Large "Museum of One" sign, lit at night

name: Nirvana Camp
description:
Nirvana Camp was born out of a dedicated teamof Burners with a single focus in mind: building the best Effigy there ever was. Our slogon isï¼šWe born to make miracleï¼

Our team leader is a famous Chinese artist named JinMa. He is a contemporary artist and the founder of multidimensional three-dimensional calligraphy installation art.
landmark: The red Nirvana bird flag

name: Plaisance
description: Plaisance: "A joyful pleasantness" captures the spirit of frenchness and fake-frenchness. Join us for French toast, Iced glace, and Let-Them-Eat-Cake. Our front porch offers iced tea, lemonade, and cheap french wine.
landmark: Two beige octagonal gazebos

name: That Bunch Of Pricks
description: If we are not there when you get there, we are definitely somewhere.
landmark: White Camouflage

name: Kegel Kommandos
description:
A warm Playa welcome always awaits at Kegel Kommandos ("We're doing it now!").
Can't-miss Thursday's Annual Grilled Cheese and Baconstravaganza for those seeking gluten, lactose and fresh mimosas.
landmark: green Kegel Kommandos sign on shade structure

name: One-Eyed Monster Art Car Camp
description: How to design a pendant that tells a story.  Learn the do's and don'ts of designing and manufacturing a pendant.  Come and help design a pendant and see it come to full fruition.   Want to build a pendant, come to our workshops and we will provide the materials to do so.
landmark: One Eyed Monster Art Car camp sign.

name: Stardust Lounge
description: Enter an interdimensional portal that leads to a magical experience comprised of love, silliness, and sparkly things! Stardust Lounge is an eclectic pit stop for dusty travelers on their inter-playatary journeys. The three sections of the camp--the Lounge, Spa, and Wedding Chapel--offer visitors a fun blend of rituals, games, and opportunities for self-care.
landmark: Infinity mirror box Stardust sign!

name: Camp Home
description: Just your friendly neighbors next door.  We are here to provide creature comforts â€“ cold booze,  hot tea, mist and buffer massages.  Whether it be a piping hot midnight cup of custom blended tea, or a citrusy boozy creation while you briefly escape that blazing playa sunshine, we are here for you.  We will keep you cozy with the comforts of home.  Let's get weird and stay magical.
landmark: Camp Home Signage/Flag, Geodome, Green Parachute

name: Chicago Handshake
description: Craving a drink from Chicago or need some shade for your head? Look no further than Chicago Handshake, where you can grab a shot and a beer(The Chicago Handshake) or find a hat on our hat shack to protect you from the blistering sun. We also take sunrise and sunset videos of art on the playa.
landmark: Chicago Handshake Sign

name: Lingerie Lounge
description: We will adorn you and adore you, fulfilling all your lingerie and costume needs and dreams! We have a huge inventory of hand-picked, sewn and dyed items, and our attentive camp members will find just the right item for you. Come see us for lingerie and other fabulous and festive items! We serve all sizes, ages, genders, gender identities, gender preferences, race, creed, religion and ethnicity! Our goal is to remind each Burner who visits us that they are beautiful.
landmark: flashing strobe on corner on a 10 foot pole.

name: Kosmik Dust
description: Please stop by and play Fire Skee Ball! with your friends and campmates!  Check out our other technological interactivities such as our High Striker and Theramyd.  Take a spin on our Tipsey Totter!
landmark: Illuminated orange Kosmik Dust rotating star sign

name: Kerosene
description: Black Rock City's premiere laser engraving camp. Solar powered gifts from The Playa
landmark: Camp Kerosene Flag

name: Swan Forest
description: Swan Forest is the heart and soul of our camp, where creativity, community, and transformation come together. Named after both the Prodigal Swan and the Forest House art cars, our camp serves as a space for artistic expression, connection, and shared experiences. The Prodigal Swan, with its dynamic sound and light displays, invites exploration and interaction, while the Forest House brings a sense of nature and futurism to our environment. Together, these art cars provide a unique space for immersive experiences, where all are welcome to engage in a vibrant, inclusive community.
landmark: Two Large flags w/ Swan logo and Forest House

name: Dusty Beavers
description: We are the Dusty Beavers. We are a camp at Burning Man. We are from QuÃ©bec, Canada and France. We bring love, joy and maple goodies to Burning Man!
landmark: Winter SnowMan

name: Elemental Studios
description:
At Elemental Studios, you don't need a Multi Pass to join in our camp's love of the movie Fifth Element. We invite all visitors (humanoid, alien or cyborg) to participate in our unique and 'Super Green' workshops. Each day is dedicated to an element; Earth (Mon), Wind (Tue), Water (Wed), Fire (Thur) and Love (Fri). Come relax under our shaded structure and light up humanity with your amazing creations. Instructions may be in the Divine Language. All materials provided while supplies last. Non-alcoholic, highly caffeinated bevvies available. Younglings or children at heart are always welcome. Come for the creative expression, stay for the community! 

AdjÃ®set,
Leeloo (Slay Bunny) & Korben Dallas (Mischief)
landmark: Neon Elemental Studios Banners

name: X marks the spot
description: X marks the spot of the greatest treasure, friends and family. Come visit the mannequins that adorn our humble bar. Live consultants available to offer advice on romance, family, work, etc., and recommendations for your next playa adventure. Bring something to apply our stencil designs to, and freely peruse our clothing boutique and library (with real books).
landmark: 'X marks the spot' flags and mannequins

name: Leopard Martini Lounge
description: The LEOPARD MARTINI LOUNGE has been returning since 1998 serving top shelf cocktails in a chill area with wonderful people. The LML BIKE REPAIR SHOP will return this year to support our community. BETTY'S PIE SHOP will continue to serve fresh pie daily in a no rush atmosphere. CLEO the mutant vehicle with continue to roam the playa.
landmark: Dome with green parachute and white camo netting

name: MARA
description: MARA Camp invites you to experience ancient Belarusian magical practices and traditions that facilitate ritual purification and inspire new beginnings. Step into our three-tent Laznia complex for traditional steam bath rituals that cleanse both body and spirit, following the sacred practices where Belarusians have celebrated birth, honored death, and found renewal for centuries. Rest in our Harbata tea space where you can sample herbal teas while listening to electronic ethnomusic and traditional incantations. Visit our Draniki Station in the afternoon to taste traditional Belarusian potato pancakes and connect through the universal language of food.
landmark: three-tent complex, flagpole with the MARA sign/flag

name: Sounds Unlimited
description: Enjoy our Sonic Playgroundâ€”a psychedelic, first-of-its-kind audio experience where Burners bend beats, not just hear them. Twelve speakers create a trippy 360Â° directional sonic vortex, while a joystick-controlled panel lets you warp, whirl, and whoosh music through space. Step inside, take control, and feel the musicâ€”literally.
landmark: Large red & illuminated Sounds Unlimited Sign

name: 7 Sirens Cove
description: A pirate bohemia since 2011 where merrymaking, mermaid lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground. Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren's call!
landmark: large dome and pirate ship with flags

name: Halloween Camp
description: Halloween Camp brings out the inner child in all of us BOO-urners, taking us back to the haunts of that special day, where anybody can be anyone. Come knock on our door for some tricks, treats, sips & beatsâ€¦if you dare!
landmark: Purple trick or treat house with an orange door.

name: The Espresso Martini Organization
description: Whether you are tired and in need of energy, or simply heading out on the playa and in need of a drink, stop by our camp for an espresso martini (or simply an iced coffee or non-alcoholic beverage)! Snow cones will be available at certain events! Meet and chat with fellow burners while you sit in our shade, lay down in our hammock, or rest in our cuddle puddle. A trampoline and dancing pole are there for the adventurous, and our lawn games can be played by the competitive!
landmark: Light-up espresso cup & martini signs; trampoline

name: Home
description: 2025 marks HÅme Camp's fourth year on playa and our vision for this year remains the same: to co-create a colorful, welcoming oasis at Burning Man. A home. A home of kindness, laughter and respect. A home where everyone contributes. A home where we eat great food and play great music. A home where we can kick back and relax amongst the chaos. Always clean, always nourishing, always light & colorful. And, of course, a home where we host our spa parties.
landmark: Home Sign and White Mailbox

name: Wasted Sunshine
description: Frozen Lemonade FOR ALL AGES! Fantastic insults and booze for consenting adults. AC Lounge chill zone.
landmark: Lemonade Stand. Inflatable tent with Sun Logo

name: Muffin Bottoms
description: We are a group of artists, musicians, and all-around goofballs who love bringing silly, whimsical energy to the playa. Come by in the late mornings to enjoy coffee, our signature mini clerbs, and dance with 15-foot puppets.
landmark: Muffin in the sky and Muffin Bottoms sign

name: Fantastic Sams
description:
Camp Fantastic Sams serves breakfast in the morning, debauchery in the afternoon, and drinks in the evening.  

We are a LGBT+ camp, and we have a comfy "cuddle puddle" for after dark (and during the daytime).
landmark: Big Fantastic Sams sign, and the big wedding tent

name: Crepiphany
description: The Crepiphany cafÃ© offers a typical Parisian-style experience with chef-cooked crÃªpes and puzzles.
landmark: Big "Crepiphany" sign sitting on top of our cafÃ©

name: HAVANA NIGHTS
description: Experience the essence of a vibrant Latin dance party infused with the relaxed vibe of Miami. Encircled by palm trees, our spacious, shaded dance floor beckons. Relax on our plush, elevated chill pads or sway in hammocks. Savor the night with bottomless, hand-muddled frozen mojitos served by attendants in traditional guayabera shirts as world-class DJs deliver an electrifying mix of Cuban and Latin rhythms. Immerse yourself in culture with daily dance lessons and indulge in complimentary cotton candy. Join us on Thursday, from 10 PM to 3 AM, for the iconic 9TH ANNUAL HAVANA NIGHTS, the pinnacle of our week-long dance celebration.
landmark: Palm Trees, Flaming Cigar, 20 ft Lime Green Tent

name: Duck Pond
description: Quack quack! Grab your cup (and your ID) and come on down to Duck Pond for cold drinks, bumpin' music, and to take a wild ride on the infamous Bucking Duck.
landmark: Yellow striped tent, radio tower w/ light up duck.

name: Misfits Menagerie
landmark: Circus like large tent with bright fabric walls

name: Badlands Bordello
description: The Badlands Bordello returns in 2025, bigger and badder. By bigger we mean more art car, more lights and music, more bars and bar games, bigger hangout spaces, and a great place to chill and party. By badder, we mean dumber. But like good dumb, not bad dumb, but still bad, but dumb and good at heart. Like bad good.
landmark: Big wood saloon-door frontage, or rainbow art car

name: Suspended Animation
description: Experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage and BDSM rides to all (Yes! You too can fly!), workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties. We also rove the playa and build impromptu bondage sculpture!
landmark: Big black tent with aerialist rig in front

name: Phantasmagoria Camp
description: Day and night come to enjoy our gorgeous temple and impressive playa view. Don't forget your cups to be served delicious handcrafted cocktails at day and tea/coffee at night. Join us for flashiest parties, art cars links or weddings.
landmark: Two big towels interconnected with bridge

name: CouchBurners
description: A cozy oasis offering shade, restful couches and a hammock forest, life-size games, workshops, a cuddle-puddle, tasty libations, late-night warming fire and black coffee. As Black Rock citizens for almost two decades, we are a diverse international collective of travelers, hosts, creators, misfits, and friends from many walks of life and corners of the earth. Find us by the perimeter of international flags.
landmark: Giant lit up couch sign. Couch shaped flag.

name: Guano Loco Lounge
description: We are a sanctuary for those who embrace the mystique of the winged wonders that navigate the darkness. Take a break from the stimulation of BRC with a visit to our Bat Cave, a sensory deprivation experience featuring sound blocking headphones and inversion tables inside a cooling cave environment. "Hang out" in our lounge equipped with surround sound, moody lighting, and espresso martinis for 21+ Burners. We encourage a sense of unity and Radical Inclusion. Sane or Bat Shit Crazy, with wings or without, it doesn't matter to us. All creatures are welcome in our colony.
landmark: Large black rectangle shade structure, neon sign

name: Camp Summer Camp
description: We are a San Francisco-based camp that celebrates the whimsical spirit of Summer Camp. We want to revisit  the connection, growth, and playful wonder that comes with those magical childhood weeks. Think back to those golden days of campfire singalongs, friendship bracelets, and endless playâ€”our mission is to teleport you right back to that delightful, wonder-filled time of your youth, but reimagined on the Playa.
landmark: "Camp Summer Camp" sign

name: Arrow Dynamic
description:
Join us at The Arrow Bar each day from 2pm-6pm for drinks and shenanigans
Arrow Party Wednesday night 9pm-12am 4 Mutant Vehicles patched for great sound.
Look for the Arrow 40 feet in the air to guide you home at night
landmark: 40" Arrow also lit at night

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on the playa, with all the trimmings! Department of Wedding Planning is in our camp, consult with the experts.
landmark: wedding dome covered in flowers

name: Parks and Wrecked!
description: Come play with us at Parks & Wrecked! We have the Playa's finest swim-up ball pit bar. Slide into the pit and climb on our playground! Enjoy fine libations! Listen to sweet boppin tunes! Come park your butt and we'll do the wreckin'!
landmark: Large Pink "Parks & Wrecked" national park sign

name: Interaction CafÃ©
description: We create a space where servers get to create their ideal burning man experience by choosing interactions offered to guests who come by, and guests choose whichever of their offerings tickles their fancy. The result is consensual weird and wonderful experiences, and it's hard to leave our camp, because you never know what might happen next: one moment it's sweet and moving, and the next it's rowdy and hysterical. During self-service hours, guests use menus to engage in interactions between themselves.
landmark: Interaction CafÃ© signs multiple white carports.

name: Black Rock Observatory Theme Camp
description: Black Rock Observatory is a mobile astronomical observatory dedicated to showing people just how amazing the universe is. Started at Burning Man in 2014, we have expanded beyond the borders of Black Rock City to educational institutions and events all along the West Coast.
landmark: Black Rock Obs sign, telescopes, space tapestries

name: Metal-Morphosis
description:
Camp Metal-Morphosis provides metal workshop M-F 12-2pm.
Make your own pendant and learn metal work skills at our camp.
Some burners come every year !
landmark: 2 black shade structures in shape of two pyramids

description: Welcome to Camp 3907! The beauty of Black Rock City is we are all on equal ground--in fact, we're 3,907 feet above sea level, and so are you! We are Elevators, here to Elevate your experience. Elevate yourself with our 12' tall Mood Swing!  We will gladly supply you with (mis) information while you have a drink at the bar, then browse our clothing boutique with all the latest fashions. Be sure to join in our classes including make your own Rope Man, followed by a dive into our expanded pit of 1000 rubber chickens!
landmark: 12' tall, 2-person Mood Swing

name: Baconeers
description: Come visit the Baconeers for BACON, BOOZE and BEATS! 3 huge parties featuring 90's Hip-Hop, break-beats, funk and more. We're cooking up more than 300 pounds of bacon this year, so come get your fix. The new game plaza will have offer some weird and exciting fun. Evening videos, karaoke and periodic bacon sightings! Sunday from 6-9 PM. Tuesday from 2-5 PM. Thursday from 2-5 PM.
landmark: tall monument with a spinning fist full of Bacon!

name: Hot Mayo
description: Come by for a cold beer, daily drink specials and a game of corn hole, basketball and other games provided.  Open daily from around noon till 5ish.  We give away 500 shot glasses on Thursday w/ a shot of Irish Car Bomb starting 4:20pm till they are gone on Thursday only.  Lots of fun daily activities.
landmark: Camp Hot Mayo lit up Sign

name: Club Bamboo
description: A relaxing place to come and chill, we offer shade, misting machines and a chance to connect with fellow human beings. Try to lift the heavy suspended rocks and guess their weight!
landmark: 2 story bamboo yurt

name: Great Vibrations
description: We're not Good Vibrationsâ€”we're Great Vibrations. Our camp is a sanctuary of movement, relaxation, and high-frequency energy, dedicated to restoring and elevating Burners through the power of vibration. By day, we offer 24/7 high-end massage chairs, morning sound baths, and spontaneous spa experiences featuring cooling face masks, mint water, and head massages. As the sun sets, we transform into the ultimate pre-party spot, hosting Sunset Dance Parties with a perfectly tuned sound system, vibey beats, and handcrafted drinks. With a Turkish-inspired aesthetic, soft lighting, and welcoming community, Great Vibrations is here to keep the vibes immaculate, the energy flowing, and the playa dust-free.
landmark: Glowing Great Vibrations sign

name: Space Racers
description: Strap in, space pioneers! Our camp is your launchpad to a retro-futuristic world where yesterday's dreams of tomorrow come to life. Slide through our neon-lit stargates and experience micro-penis-gravity with big dipper energyâ€”zero-G not included, but the vibes are stellar.
landmark: large sputnik LED art piece, lit at night

name: G
description: Welcome to our living room, g. Grab a croissant and dance for an hour or ten. We're grateful you're here.
landmark: g spot (literally a g inside a spot sign)

name: Disco Roboto
description: Gratitude Love and Fun. We are a group of healers, dancers, friends, artists, creatives and foodies. Deep playa and camp dancing on Disco Roboto; Iron Giants disco floor. Morning Daytime games and community gatherings.. Sunset trips to deep playa and a Friday Grace and Ease Shabbat Gratitude circle.
landmark: 5' x 5'  white Iron Giant image Banner

name: Degenaissance
description: We are Degenaissance, a camp founded to celebrate the thrill of the quest. Journey to our lands to test your skill, fill your belly and slake your thirst.
landmark: Uplit medieval banners

name: Banana Hammocks
description: Banana Hammocks is a queer-centric camp full of individuals from all parts of the rainbow. We are extremely straight-friendly and pride ourselves in being silly and whimsical. We offer different activities every day as well as a 24/7 hydration station and hammock forest.
landmark: Yellow Flags, yellow hammocks

name: Raditude
description: A collective of Lucid & Light lucky individuals serving up Rad-Attitude Adjustments every DAWN & DUSK with a themed streetside Fireplace Art Piece and an Tomorrow, Today Alchemy Tea Lounge; shoe-free shade and more for all those building, volunteering, and interacting within Black Rock City!
landmark: 4 foot tall steel Fire Art piece!

name: Spanky's Wine Bar
description: The infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars. We take a tongue-in-cheek approach to wine, and a paddle-to-cheek approach to your butt ;)
landmark: 60 foot shade structure (day) searchlights (night)

name: Decadent Oasis
description: A windswept grove of white palm trees by day, with fun activities abound; an iridescent oasis in the dark of night. Welcome to the magical playground of Decadent Oasis, where we invite you to dance, play, perform, and chill. Fun experiences and games, dance parties, and friendly folks imbue within an eco-conscious camp made from mostly reclaimed/reused materials. Stop by for a warm welcome and find shelter from the storm.
landmark: Glowing palm trees in the dust.

name: Blazing Death Ship
description:
Join the legendary Death Ship at its home camp, where an interdimensional Viking feast hall awaits weary travelers.  Join us for  libations and savor slow-cooked dead animal at dusk-ish, Tuesday 
 and Thursday, or just ride with us out on playa.
landmark: Sign that says Death Ship.

name: Hushville
description: A welcoming camp with no amplified music or generators. First time burners greeted with joy and mentored with care. We welcome campers from across the world and beyond. We've had people from every continent camp with us in the past. Many activities all week long.
landmark: Hushville City Limits Sign

name: Fire Conclave Convergence
description: Fire Conclave Convergence is where Fire Performers, Ambient Drummers, and Documentarians who will be performing in the Great Circle will be signing in and receiving procedural information. Those with a Black Rock passport can also get their passport stamped.
landmark: Fire Conclave sign and photo gallery

name: Sunrise Tavern
description: Come for the bacon, stay for the sunrise. You gnome you'll like ;)
landmark: Army trucks, letters, flames, and other cool shit

name: Camp Yellow Umbrella
description: Join us at "The Pit Stop" and live out your Talk Show dreams as guest, host, or audience member- you decide! Live events all week. Before you leave, get a spritz and a spritzer at the bar from one of our lovely campers. The Show starts when You get here!
landmark: Yellow Umbrella

name: Who's Ready for Jelly!?
description: Your Jello shot hub!  With Jello, power & internet for all and art for some!
landmark: Game Changer large sticker visible.

name: Shitty Glitter
description: Welcome to SHITTY GLITTER, a boutique Bed and Breakfast providing the most luxurious hospitality experience in Black Rock City. Stop by for a rest in the clean white linens on one of our freshly made canopy beds (changed daily) and be sure to chat with a camp concierge to get the most out of your stay. Be sure to swing by The Parlor on Wednesday evening for our breakfast (for dinner) party where we'll be serving breakfast burritos and dancing the night away. If you're in need of some relaxation, check out our in-house spa, SPAcate, where we'll be providing cold Tecate, face masks, massage chairs and other gadgetry to put you in the ultimate state of relaxation.
landmark: Neon pink Shitty Glitter sign and canopy beds

name: Black Rock Yearbook
description: Every year at Burning Man, since 2007, we set up a professional shooting gallery and photographers to give out playa names and take your Black Rock Yearbook Photo! Hosting the archive for tens of thousands of Burners online at blackrockyearbook.com
landmark: storage container with Black Rock Yearbook sign

name: Yes Please
description:
Yes: adv. â€“ Used to express affirmation, agreement, positive affirmation, or consent.
Please: adv. â€“ Give pleasure to or to be pleasing to; give satisfaction.
Yes Please is the answer to every question. Come chill in our calm and revitalizing sanctuary, dance with new friends, and experience our inclusive oasis of sex-positivity, queer empowerment, and love. Be sure to visit our infamous Non-Monogamy Advice Booth.
landmark: Camp flag/sign, yellow Advice Booth, sari banners.

name: Black Rock Cinemas
description: Black Rock Cinemas is pleased to announce the return of "Movies on the Playa" with new features and events.  We screen a selection of world class short films to entertain, amuse, challenge, inspire, educate and otherwise get the conversation kicked up a notch. Our large, air-conditioned Cinema Tent is perfect in the afternoon heat and our Outdoor Cinemas with fire pits and blankets are wonderful in the cool night air. We continuously screen 5-6 short films on a 75-minute loop. New films are presented every day. Be sure to check out our Late-Night Trash Cinema after 1:00am for an extra laugh. Films so bad, they're good. Check our schedule for special events and Red Carpet Premiers. Come enjoy the Playa's most underrepresented art form: film.
landmark: Two tall LED Neon Pink Light Spires

name: Discotique Pancake Boutique
description: The most sizzling spot on the Playa, serving up a symphony of pancakes from 10AM-4PM daily along with Live Music, Open-Bar and a chill lounge with classes and workshops. Bring your plate and dancing shoes and let's get this pancake party flipping!
landmark: Large White Tent

name: badlands
description:
Badlands is a live music open jam camp. 
Formed in 2011, we have always had a drum kit (or 3), amps, guitar, bass, keys, and a PA with microphones available for anyone that wants to come by and play. All levels of musicianship (within reason haha) are welcome!! We are open from 1-5 Mon-Fri and oftentimes have random night jams too! We have topless bartenders and bottomless drinks at our bar and a comfy shaded area with games and couches to relax, enjoy music and get out of the sun.
landmark: "badlands" flags & mailbox with "badlands"

name: StarFist
description:
StarFist's infamous international tea service. Mon-Sat 2-5pm â€“ serving a delightful selection of hot and cold infusions from around the world as we pamper and delight our guests. Offering a refuge from heat and dust, unparalleled hospitality and secret surprises for the lucky few. 

Morning meditation/yoga sessions most days at 11:11am and our fascinating evening StarFist Lecture Series, exploring a range of thought-provoking topics and stirring debate in our sumptuous StarFist Lounge.
landmark: 2 containers and pink/orange flags lining the road

name: The Lavender Lounge
description: Welcome to The Lavender Lounge! Come in out of the sun and receive a relaxing scalp massage while we mist you with lavender scented water. Lie back on an air mattress and take a few moments to slow down and enjoy yourself. You will leave feeling fresh, alive, and with just a bit more pep in your step! Open 11am-2pm Mon-Fri
landmark: Big silver tent with "Lavender Lounge" on the side

name: OPERA
landmark: Large beige tent, OPERA flickering sign

name: NYC Community Container
description: We Guarantee Nothing! But you'll probably pick up your gear from us if you're from NYC/NJ
landmark: 4 or 5 53' hi-cube shipping containers

name: Unitopia
description: Our camp is a vibrant and welcoming space designed to foster creativity, connection, and interactive experiences. This year, we are offering a unique blend of art, workshops, and communal activities that invite participants to engage, play, and express themselves. Whether you're looking for a place to relax, connect with others, or take part in hands-on experiences, our camp provides a dynamic and inclusive environment for all.
landmark: Unitopia Flag

name: Happy Kaos!
description:
This year hApPY KaOs! presents GalÃ¡paKaos Island, a living, evolving wonderland where curiosity thrives and the unexpected awaits! 
We emerge from the abyss onto the shores of GalapaKaos Island, where creatures adapt, transform, and become something entirely new.
Here, evolution is messy, playful, and inevitable. Step through our iconic saloon doors and into a world where the strange and unexpected thrive.
landmark: HAPPY KAOS yard letters, 24ft flags & disco ball

name: Better Together
description: Better Together Camp is where sparks fly and connections are madeâ€”literally, we're not responsible for any Playa-induced lightning strikes. ðŸ˜Ž Our Speed Dating isn't your average meet-and-greet; it's all about real conversations, radical self-expression, and a little bit of magic. Whether you're a Burning Man newbie or a dusty veteran, we've got a spot for you to connect, laugh, and maybe even find your Playa soulmate (or just a good chat). In our camp, everyone's welcome, and everyone's encouraged to be their weird, wonderful selves. Come for the speed dating, stay for the unforgettable memories, and remember: we're better together.
landmark: neon light better together sign

name: Big Chungus
description: Everyone is an artist. We provide the art supplies and the art wall, you bring the inspiration. Stop by, say hi to our alien comrade Big Chungus, and paint with us.
landmark: 30 foot long art wall and the big green alien head

name: Camp One More
description:
Camp One More's ethos is "Yes!" or even "Okayyy". How did we get here? By a series of excellent choices of course! Join Camp One More for a bevvy at the Excellent Choice Bar during Canadian Breakfast which is neither traditionally Canadian nor a typical breakfast. 
Let us valet your bike and come hang out; enjoy the high low-key vibes in the Excellent Choice Lounge or Liff Laff Luff tent. Make sure to stop and hop on our Wee-saw for a moonlit bounce!
landmark: Camp One More flag, orange signage & purple seesaw

name: Daydream
description:
Welcome to Daydream, where reality takes a vacation and dreams throw the parties! Nestled in  Black Rock City, our sanctuary is all about radical inclusion and self-expression. Get ready to dive into enchanting art installations, mystical workshops, and dance parties that make reality jealous.   And oh boy, our legendary dream parties kick off the day with beats that'll wake up even the sleepiest spirits!

Need a breather from the chaos? Slip into our Dreamers' Lounges for some cool tranquility amidst the madness.

But wait, there's more! Join us for our sunset workshops that'll unleash your creativity. 

Join us in forging radical connections and embracing transformation as we journey together through the wonders of the playa.
landmark: Daydream Lounge and Faces of Thought installation

name: Pink Heart
description:
Pink Heart welcomes all Burners with open arms and open hearts! Whether you're seeking refreshment, connection, or a moment of reflection, our camp is here to nourish your body, mind, and spirit. Rehydrate with ice-cold water, indulge in our beloved vegan coconut ice cream (served Tuesday and Wednesday from 1â€“4 PM), or unwind with soothing buffer massages at our Vibration Station.

Find your way home through our iconic Pink Heart Arch Beacon, or rest in our lush pink cocoon of shade, complete with soft fur couches and welcoming smiles. Share your journey, process your transformation, or simply bask in the beauty of Black Rock City from our vibrant lounge. This is your space to pause, connect, and be seen.
landmark: Pink fur couches & glowing pink heart arch beacon

name: Cosplay Central
description:
The most awesome Cosplay LARPing experience on earth! 
Come by and see us and get involved in some fun activities in the Cosplay world.
For sexy and adventurous couples- We have a Barbie theme and naturally Ken being a dickless doll will be fitted with a male chastity cage and Barbie will hold the key!!!
landmark: Cosplay sign and the Barbie and Ken boxes

name: Wonder Camp
description: The Department of Wonder is our on-playa bike shop. We offer bike repair service and education every day of the event through man-burn.  We will be offering a workshop around fixing and maintaining bikes in playa specific conditions.
landmark: flags atop tall poles

name: Playa Choir
description: Playa Choir is a performance art piece open to all participants.  Come and join us for a rowdy,  spirit-lifting musical experience!  Radical Inclusion, no audition required!  Singers of all skill levels, ages and persuasions are welcome! Also seeking musicians, dancers and aerialists. Rehearsals are Tuesday through Saturday 10:30 a.m. to 1:00 pm.  Join us on the risers or just come to listen.  Full  performances are on Sunday: Sunrise at the Temple and 11:00am in the Playa Choir Dome.  An additional collaboration performance with the Black Rock Philharmonic tbd.   Performances are a non-denominational, non-religious, spiritual, moving experience. More information and music can be obtained in advance at our website Playachoir.com.
landmark: 22' White Dome- lit at night with Blue lights

name: YES!
description: YES! explores the philosophy of saying "yes" as a catalyst for growth, connection, and authentic living. We believe in the power of wholehearted participationâ€”and that a true "yes" comes from deep internal alignment. Sometimes, that means saying YES! to stillness, to rest, to solitude, or to a different path entirely. Our camp is a haven for adventurers, seekers, and anyone ready to engage with life from a place of resonance and presence. We celebrate the liberating energy of YES!â€”in all the forms it takes.
landmark: Big Neon YES!

name: Prometheatrics
description: Bringing the gift of Fire to humanity since the dawn of time, Prometheatrics has been a fixture of Black Rock City's Esplanade since 2002 and hosts a fine interactive collection ready to surprise and delight you! Step inside the Tesseract to experience yourself as you truly are: infinite! Trace your face at our Self Portrait Studio and take home a masterpiece or shoot a selfie in Clesthyra's Eye. Enjoy a bounce on our Danpoline, enter the dream-space of the Infinitipi or admire the playa's colors through the radiant FrameBows. Join us for dusk and dawn spin jams on our mirrored stage, where there's a safety on duty and all wicks are welcome. We're honored to be a part of what makes our city magical, and eager to share what makes us shine!
landmark: Tripod of Aluminum I-beams w/ 4' Welded Steel Cube

name: MISTO
description:
We are MISTO, a Ukrainian camp symbolizing 'city' in Ukrainianâ€”a place that honors the rich cultural heritage of Ukraine. https://www.instagram.com/mistocamp/ 

MISTO is the cultural heart of Ukraine at Burning Man, created to join  talented individuals that come together to showcase Ukrainian rich arts and traditions.

MISTO unfolds as a colorful and lively camp, inviting you to immerse yourselves to experience Ukrainian hospitality, savor delicious food like Ukrainian borscht, and to share Ukrainian uniqueness and talents with the world.
landmark: 4black,2yellow-blue flags,44ft dome logo MISTO

name: MOOP Museum
description:
The MOOP Museum, aka MoMu, features a curated display of the finest museum-caliber MOOP around. Our exhibit is always morphing. When our curators are on duty, MOOP collectors can bring us their finds for appraisal and intake into our collection. With small exceptions, everything on the walls is available for permanent loan if patrons see something they'd like to take home with them.

A few select, high-value MOOP items are part of our permanent collection and not available for loan. Our permanent exhibit also includes educational elements, art made from MOOP, and a spoken-word MOOP receptacle.

Our gift shop is stocked with handcrafted, high-quality items made with MOOP. We hope you'll find something you like to take as a souvenir of your visit.
landmark: Neon MOOP Museum/MoMu signs & pink light string.

name: Black Rock City Passport Office
description: Your adventure awaits! Explore Black Rock City! Record your journey! We provide playa passports you can get stamped at various camps to record your travels. Visit your favorite camps and discover new ones!
landmark: Large Black Rock City Passport Office Sign.

name: Sphere Vision
landmark: 2 inflatable Droids and Bright Sphere

name: Buddha Lounge
description: The Buddha Lounge is a healing and sound camp offering DJs, workshops, ecstatic dance, yoga, breath work and meditation.
landmark: Buddha Lounge sign

name: BRCvr presents BurnerSphere
description: BRCvr invited you to come play and learn about immersive technologies and storytelling. Learn about the BurnerSphere and how you can participate.
landmark: Black Rock Yearbook. We are next door.

name: Society for Temporal Preservation
description:
The Society for Temporal Preservation consists of time travelers tasked with preserving the fabric of spacetime. Space time is like a cat though, it takes care of itself. This is good, because now we can leave a bowl of food out and ignore it while we visit Black Rock City. We serve as ambassadors of the temporally free, working to introduce Black Rock City to the magic (science) of time travel.
Our goals include:
- Exposing burners to the wonders (AND HORRORS!) of time travel
- Instilling a sense of hope and responsibility in regards to an individual's place in time
- Getting the anti-matter out of the carpet. That stuff is STICKY
landmark: Blue flags and blue signage, light up bar at night

name: Live Your Best Porch Life
description: Won't you be our neighbor? A throwback to the American front porch born from the melting pot of different cultures and ethnicities; our front porch invites friendly greetings, recognition, acceptance, and fosters neighborly community. Come sit in our adirondack chairs and have a chat. We will be offering no-frills cowboy coffee in the mornings and ice cold lemonade in the afternoons. Grandma is eagerly awaiting your arrival so she can serve you some fresh apple pie. Stop by and visit our yard sale full of trinkets. No early birds!
landmark: White picket fence and covered pink porch

name: Priscilla
description:
Priscilla â€“ the imperfect camp with Aussie roots and an international twist, where radical self-expression meets a bloody good time. We're the camp you know and love for our inclusive, high-energy parties like the infamous Rizzle Sizzle (snags done the Aussie way). Under our unmissable pink camo nets, we bring the chaos, the charm, and a solid dose of Who Gives A F*ck energy.

It's a place where strangers become family in no time, friends reunite in the dust, and memories are made that'll last long after the desert fades.

Come for the snags, stay for the sass.

PriscillaÂ xoxo
landmark: Pink camo net frontage

name: Olympus
description: Olympus is the home of the gods! We are a Bay Area based Burning Man camp dedicated to self-expression, inclusivity, and the celebration of every individual. Since 2016, Olympus has always strived to help people discover the best versions of themselves, their inner god. There is no limitation in terms of mythology; gods from all cultures, times, and places are welcome. Olympians also create own mythologies if the spirit takes them. The only limit is one's imagination. The mission of Olympus is for every burner to foster radical self-love, self-expression, and a connection with their own divine spirit.
landmark: 8 white Greek-style columns, lit rainbow at night

name: Base Camp
description: Home and landing pad for the Metro Chop mutant vehicle.   A working camp where stuff gets done so the Black Rock City can have some fun.
landmark: The Die Cut Metro Chop sign

name: Mobility Camp
description: We offer Oh Shiny! Tours for anyone who wants to get out and explore the incredible art. We give priority to people with physical disabilities. We also provide crutches and wheelchairs for anyone who gets injured on the playa. Public charging station for Medical Equipment. Stop by and check out our obstacle course!
landmark: Crutch Sunburst with silhouettes of disabled Men.

name: Lit AF
description:
Tired of stumbling around in the dark like a lost puppy? Lit AF's mission is to save the darkwads and bring light to the darkside! What we provide to the Burning Man community:

- Fairy lights galore for your bike, backpack, or clothes - batteries included!
- Daily events and workshops to bling out your gear and become the brightest light in the desert!
- Darkwad Patrol - our team of dedicated light-lovers will be out and about on the playa, scouting for lost souls in need of illumination.
landmark: lightning bolt and sun rays LED sign

name: Fucking Joe Camp
description: Welcome to Fucking Joe Camp!  Where everybody knows your name, and we're always glad you came!
landmark: Pole with bright orange beacon, lighted camp sign

name: Nuage
description: Nuage is a cloud-inspired Mutant Vehicle with an elevated platform, adorned with floating aluminum butterflies and dynamic LED lighting, creating a mesmerizing fusion of light, sound, and movement as it glides across the playa.
landmark: illuminated signature cutout butterflies

name: Hydrology N Civic Responsibility
description: Visit our camp to learn about your drinking water and the procedures to have your water tested.
landmark: sign with our camp name

name: Camp Cohere
description: Camp Cohere is a group of long-time burners who are feeling called to share their wisdom, joy and experience in a camp designed to support and foster shared experiences around human connection.
landmark: white moroccan tent with the sign camp cohere

name: Camp Delicioso & Creperie
description: Hungry! Hung over? You've been hankerin' for something warm in your belly? Swing on by Camp Delicioso and CrÃªperie, where you'll find an International collective of foodies who'll entertain and serve you the best damn OG French crÃªpe in Black Rock City.  EST 2007 We've got sweet and savory flavors that'll satisfy even the most discerning Playa palate.  And while the crÃªpes are cooking, and the coffee is grinding, we'll serve up a saucy dance music set too! 9ish to noonish Tue, Wed and Thu. If you miss us giving you crÃªpe, come on over anyway.  We have various events happening throughout the week Tue - Fri.
landmark: Giant RED Lampshade that towers over 15ft

name: Bearwhalea
description: They frame the wildest theories upon the most irrelevant facts, or upon the merest fancies. Mr. Darwin thinks that whales may be bears which have enormously increased their bulk, washed their paws into fins by constant swimming, and stretched their mouths by keeping them open to catch insects in the water. So also he thinks that men and women may have been developed out of monkeys, monkeys out of mushrooms, and mushrooms out of " monads," or little clots of jelly. Where is the proof? Where is a single instance of a bearwhale, or a man-monkey, to be seen? Of course there is not one.
landmark: 10' wooden platform, bearwhale sign, bone statue

name: Acrobatica Galactica
description: Space-themed anti-gravity acro and movement camp fueled by spice elixirs. Calling all acrobats and acronauts! Come move your body and partner up for space travel.  We have a padded circus tent, safety belt and lines, daily acro/movement classes and afternoon acro jams, and a volleyball net! Iced coffee served daily at jams.
landmark: Large wooden letters spelling ACROBATICA GALACTICA

name: 17 Virgins
description: 17 Virgins invites you to the transdimensional portal. Come explore our 250' long tunnel to another universe! Who knows you may find a hidden doorway to the party of your dreams.
landmark: 17Virgins Owl and the 250 FOOT LONG TUNNEL

name: Mo's Mini Martini + Erotica Camp
description: Mohammeds serves the coldest martinis and the hottest erotica on the playa. Come and join us for an ice cold martini in a REAL martini glass and,if the spirit moves you,write down your own true erotic tale in our 400 year old book filled with the derring do's of other Black Rock Citizens. We open after lunch and close when the  the camels go to bed(around midnight).
landmark: bedouin tent ,giant lit martini glass in the sky

name: Disco Snail
description:
We are Disco Snail's slime trail of humans. 
We love disco.
We love sNeil(the disco snail). 
Come enjoy some tunes and talk about your slimiest life moments under our shade with us.
landmark: Disco Snail sign

name: Blank Slate
description: Camp Blank Slate will repair your bike day or night, provide sounds to get you to move your feet, drinks to wet your whistle, and insults that'll remind you of when Burning Man was cool again. Come on by for a history lesson into Burning Man, and learn about our founder, Larry David!
landmark: Geodesic dome next to square shade structures

name: Vagabonds & Tagalongs
description: A camp for wanderers and wanderlust! Vags and Tags brings together an ever-expanding nationwide community of burners to co-create a space where everyone can feel at home. Come by and see for yourself why we've won the official BRC award for best friends on playa since 2012!
landmark: Coloraful canopy, hammock dome, and camp flag!

name: Camp Manatee
description: Lounging Area offering: Imported Beers, Sodas, Iced Tea, Cold Water, Shade, Day Bed, Couch, Solar 'Fire Pit',  Salty Snacks, Candy, Toys, Sunscreen, Lip Balm, Hand lotion, Board Games. Fun! Relaxation! Bike Repairs: Monday - Friday 1pm - 4pm. PLUS....... 'Tall Tales' about Manatees.
landmark: 2 -10' x 10'Red/Whtand Yellow/Wht striped Tents

name: Camp Desert of Eden
description: Escape the elements and indulge in our garden of earthly delights, inspired by the fiery fate of humanity consumed by passion and pleasure. We will be providing food and nourishment daily at our "Giving Kitchen" including vegan and GF options. For those who are just passing by, stop at our "24 Hour Electrolyte Vanity Bar" where you can refuel your water bottle and freshen up your face.
landmark: Our leafy green community shade space

name: Camp Babe
description: CAMP BABE is comprised of unique characters from all over the planet. We are focused on finding the perfect balance between deep connections, fun play through activities and games, and dancing till our feet are playafied!
landmark: large wooden sign "CAMP BABE" at the front

name: Apokalyptika
description: We are proud to be an eco conscious kamp that strives to re-envision waste materials into art. Come chill out with us and have a beverage in our post Apokalpytikally themed sunset bar and 24 hr lounge, or play with our eclectic collection of installations and games.
landmark: 40in disco ball, swingset & pink rope light

name: Pretentious Fox
description: Our name may be Pretentious but we're a diverse, international crowd with an eclectic mix of personalities and playa offerings, including our Flying Fox swing-set, the Fox Hole Bar, Foxy Beats, and parties and self-improvement workshops galore. Come get Foxy with us.
landmark: Big swingset with turquoise aerial silk

name: Cabaret of the Void
description:
