Cabaret of the Void is a variety show-style vaudevillian speakeasy featuring an intimate stage and bar offering wine and song and a bohemian-chic lounge for socializing and unwinding.

Boasting a decadent aesthetic, red and purple velvet decor, and low-lit ambiance, our interactivity will focus on bringing the spirit of satire, performance art, and parody to the playa. Cabaret of the Void offers a dizzying array of burlesque, comedy, magic, dance, circus, music and more!
landmark: 8ft wide lit Cabaret of the Void sign

name: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge
description: Sharkey's Oasis: The unrivaled "Preferred Party Beyond the Porto-Potties, where Peni and Pagina frolic on the Pre-Playa Plaza Playground!"  Our mission? To delight you with delectable libations, provide respite under our shady canopy, serenade you with tunes in the lounge, and bestow upon you exhilarating and daring drinking games! ðŸ¹ðŸŽ¶ðŸŽ²
landmark: Sharks, sharks, everywhere sharks!

name: Camp Do Nothing
description: Camp Do Nothing - the camp that's actually doing the opposite of its name! Come take in a 360 view of the playa on our swing (yep, you'll be hanging 35 feet upside down!), climb on and into the foam dome, or come have a seat and some conversation with burners from all over.
landmark: The giant 360 swing and Camp Do Nothing sign

name: Camp Little Bitty
description: Burner Express rider (or friend of one)?  Use our camp as the luxury bus stop option!  Shade, drinks, luggage storage, luggage help, and lots of informed campmates are here to help you on your journey (or wait for your friend!).
landmark: 40 foot wide pavilion with pink arches

name: Wanderlust
description: Welcome to our Moroccan Themed Oasis in the Desert.  Come join us for our fun activities.  We look forward to seeing you on the Playa!!!
landmark: Shade Structure with Wanderlust Sign on street

name: Shenanigans
description: ICE COLD face masks! Find us when the sun is high and the heat is excessive every day. We will welcome you into our comfy chill space and put a cold mask straight from our ice packed cooler on your face. While the moisturizing ingredients soak into your skin, you're welcome to kick back and enjoy the occasional water spritz, fanning and cup of iced tea.
landmark: Tan tarp wall that reads "shenanigans"

name: Destiny Lounge 3D
description: We invite you to enjoy our astounding 3D lounge completely surrounded by amazing 3D UV artwork! Have your mind completely blown by our incredible artistry, and get the best sloppy wet Free Blowjobs available on the playa: all ages, genders, and species welcome!!
landmark: 3 Pointy Canopies w/ Glowing UV Art. Lit at night

name: Sandy Taco
description:
Sandy Taco; We are a gay camp, with deep shade and Taco events.  
Enjoy our shade and misters during the day, and Beautiful Glow in the dark Art and Structures at Night.

Our Taco Events are: 
Tuesday 5-7pm, Thursday Noon-2pm, Saturday Noon-2pm 

We have a cocktail bar and focus on adult themes during our hosting times.  Look forward to some giant jenga and naked twister as some of the fun during our seductive parties.
landmark: Glowing Angler Fish

name: Disfunktion
description:
Come join in with our wobbly world of Weebles , Music, Fire and Mayhem
Evenings eclectic music , slushy's, fiery chill out areas
Wednesday Main event Pyjama party with funkiest PJ giveaways and Sounds
landmark: 2-3 large tripods, flames ,lasers

name: Kamp Kaos
description: Celebrating all that is chaotic! KAOS campers hail from across the US. We celebrate curious minds, artists, engineers, makers, and anyone with an open mind. We bring something new every year!
landmark: Purple Kaos sign/flags, 15' tripod w/ pendulum

name: Equal and Opposite Force
description: Immerse yourself in the ancient wisdom of the I-Ching, considered by many as both the first, and the best, guide to personal development. In our space, we expertly guide you through the very same Taoist teachings that have guided wise souls for centuries. Participants will be provided with all necessary materials to continue this transformative practice beyond the playa, including coins for throwing, and a copy of our specially crafted guide, "Changes." Learn to become "like water," adaptable yet potent. The secrets of balance and harmony await you.
landmark: yin yang flags.

name: Camp Peachy
description:
Camp Peachy is all about good vibes, great beats, and a whole lot of peachy fun. Established in 2016, we bring a mix of music, interactive art, and our signature peach cocktails to the playa.

ðŸ‘ Peach Cocktails: Stop by for an peach cocktail served up with a smile (and possibly some mischief).
ðŸ‘ Bum Art: Let us paint your peach, press it onto canvas, and then you make it your own! Once decorated, your masterpiece gets displayed on our infamous Bum Wall to dryâ€”ready for you to collect and cherish.
ðŸ‘ DJs & Dance Parties: Whether it's sunset grooves or late-night bangers, our DJs keep the energy high and the dance floor moving.

We believe in gifting, playfulness, and co-creation, so come join the party, grab a drink, and get peachy with us! ðŸ‘ðŸŽ¶âœ¨
landmark: a big giant dome that looks like a peach

name: Monkey King Camp
description:
Join us as we bring the legendary spirit of the Monkey King to life on the Playa! Our camp is offering immersive culture through drinks, games, music, and interactive art. Our Monkey King Art Car is decorated as the Flower Fruit Mountain like the original story.
ðŸµ Totems of Power: Touch-activated totems glow with Sun Wukong's mythical energyâ€”sharing light and spirit with the Playa.
ðŸ’§ Flower Fruit Moutain Bar: Providing Cultural Drink/Alcohol to cool down your temperature in dessert!
ðŸ’ Sunwukong Lair : A Comfortable indoor spot you can rest and enjoy interactivities like Music, Gaming, Story Episode on Projector, and Karaoke. 
ðŸŽ¶ Open-Deck DJ Stage/Art Car: A collaborative music space open to DJs of all styles and backgrounds.
Come vibe, connect, and be part of the Monkey King experience! ðŸ”¥
landmark: Oue monkey king lit up on top of our art car

name: Polaris
description:
A community of heart centered leaders, dreamers, luminaires and innovators, from all around the world, that are driven by having a real impact on society. 

Every year we end the the week by having a new 75-people family that we can reach out to in every corner of the Planet. 
\nWe achieve this through the power of creating together and of course... partying together.

Our beautiful 2-story Art Car is a beacon on Playa that allows us to throw our own parties until Sun rises, as well as take our whole Polaris family to the best parties on playa at any time, while dancing on top of it. \n\n"Polaris - Love and Care for Each Other"
landmark: star on a shade structure and a sign "POLARIS"

name: Black Rock City Municipal Pool
description:
Looking for a place to cool down and relax? The Black Rock City Municipal Pool might be the place for you! There's something for everyone: come by for a refreshment and shady misting during one of our Open Swim sessions, bike through at night for a bit of poolside lounging in peace, or put your dancing boots to good use at our Spring Break party! Access to our Spa is supposed to only be available for members, so stop by our Membership Office and fill out your application. 

Want to book the pool for your next event? Reach out with a request and let's make a splash together!
landmark: four point 2-story pool enclosure and signage

name: Quarks and Recreation
description: Games for Progress! Play! Scientists vs. Morlocks! Discover! Nuclear Fusion Bocce-Golf! Learn! The modern wonders of the Atomic Age! Your local Quarks and Recreation department invites you to experience our comprehensive catalog of nuclear-inspired games, physics trivia, labyrinthian bureaucracy, and definitely-not-radioactive "drinks" at the elusive h-bar. (Void where the strong nuclear force is inhibited; the electromagnetic force may apply).
landmark: Parklet with gatorade fountain

name: Cosmic Casbah
description: We are a diverse group of like minded individuals that started off as strangers and became family. By becoming each other's chosen family, we feel we can be open and honest regarding our mental, spiritual, emotional, and physical health and have helped each other work through past and present trauma on and off playa. By building community and trust within each other, we are able to connect through art, music, and self expression. The goal of our community is to show genuine connection, love, and support with each other that we may not normally obtain in our default lives. Through this action we strive to create a safe space for individuals to learn and grow into the best version of themselves.
landmark: Lg circus tent, 30 ft flag poles, red emperor bed

name: PG Squirt House
description: PG Squirt House is your pre-party haven on the playa, featuring an inviting lounge adorned with plush playa-tech couches and vibrant, neon decor. Unwind with our interactive offerings, including creative drink "squirts" to energize you for the night ahead, trampoline bouncing, and engaging board games. Join us for our "Golden Hour" parties and "Ask the Bartender" series, where experts discuss intriguing topics like neuroscience and conscious relationships. Come experience the warm embrace of our radically inclusive camp, where diversity thrives and unforgettable memories are made.
landmark: Big Purple Easy Ups and Purple PG Flag!

name: Playa Pinups and Fine Art Fatales
description: We are a camp consisting of playa photographers and models dedicated to capturing the beauty and diversity of the citizens of Black Rock City, while offering an opportunity to enhance personal expression through the creation of several types of art.
landmark: Playa Pinups and Fem Fatale Banner

name: Heart Fusion
description: Heart Fusion invites you to step through its pulsating hearts into an LED-lit Heart Glow Labyrinth of reflection, mindfulness, and wonder. Join us to share a relaxing beverage, and take a break in the heart chill cubes. Then continue into an immersive experience of throbbing lights which everyone will add a light to within the cuddle puddle dome. The space invites you to lay down, take in the light installation, relax, and cuddle. Plus, we're keeping the Labyrinth lit, and the dome open, for chill vibes and late-night heart talks all week. Come find your glow!
landmark: 2 pulsating heart totems & labyrinth lit at night

name: Scotch & Hop
description: Oh My Fur & Whiskers! You're late! You're late, for a very important date! Come follow the White Rabbit into our garden, where you can journey down a whimsical Acculturation Path with glowing & mesmerizing flowers & sparkly things. See where the rabbit has gone, Down The Rabbits Hole, to get some enlightenment and inspiration for your life! Enjoy our Tea Party, day or night, where you may encounter some personalities like Queen Elizabeth, Mr. T, Ice-T, or some Tea-Rex's!  Who knows?!  We offer restorative libations of all types during the day and Hot Toddies to warm you up on your nightly adventures.
landmark: Scotch & Hop Robo Bunny Portal

name: Jelly Dance
description: DANCE in our lighted "Psychedelic JELLY-fish Forest" which responds to your touch and enjoy live music from the house band or DJ sets late afternoon/evenings.  Join us for band "jam-a-longs", midnight acoustic "Jelly Jams" in the Jelly Forest , sports tourneys, or other activities listed daily at the tower â€¦ or very small cocktails at our "Mini-Bar".
landmark: lighted "Psychedelic Jellyfish Forest" & bandstage

name: Oh mi Gato! HAT Cafe
description: Oh Mi Gato Hat Cafe, formerly known as Oh Mi Gato Cat Cafe, delighting your senses with a combination of Colombian coffee, relaxing yoga movements, really cool hats and Latino party vibes. Drinks, art, music and hot food. What else do you want in your present and your future?
landmark: Colombian flag, camp name sign

name: I Love Elephants
description: I Love Elephants is a vibrant, interactive camp celebrating art, movement, and mindful connection. Home to the Be Here Now Pavilion (in partnership with the Ram Dass Foundation), we host transformative workshops, ecstatic dance, and dharma talks. Our camp features a 45' marquee with glowing elephant art, a mutant vehicle called The Orb, immersive projection spaces, and a 3,500 sq ft padded dance floor. From misting oases to hands-on art, we're a hub of creativity and radical participation. No spectatorsâ€”just a herd of devoted Burners co-creating the magic. Come play, paint, dance, and be part of the elephant love!
landmark: sky high light beacons and 4 lit up circus tents

name: Contraptionists
description:
Join us, 1 to 3 PM,  for our afternoon Fire and Ice parties with Snowcones and FireFries.
Over heated kids can ask if we have ice anytime to cool off their little Brains. (Any age in destress will be helped.)
Check the schedule for Yoga classes, or having your reading done.
or just come cool off in the shade and watch the world go by.
landmark: 40 foot vase tower, in day white, at night colors

name: DISTRIKT
description: The DISTRIKT experience is a vibrant, energetic, and inclusive party where we welcome you to express yourself through dance and human interaction. Our friendly bar serves up frozen libations to keep you cool, while DJs from all corners of the globe play on our premier sound system. Venture onto our massive dance floor, or climb up on that platform for a new perspective. We see you smiling!
landmark: Large white/gray/red shade sail over dance floor.

name: Mimosa
description: Hey you, yes you our dear friend! I know what you want, or I would say even need. A fresh, cold MIMOSA. Please step by our bar where we will get you what you need.
landmark: Multicolor pompons, our Mimosa sign is made of it

name: Corn'r Store
description: Welcome to the Corn'r Store! We are part daytime dive bar, part cornvenience store.  We will be serving up all things corn; popcorn, kettle corn, corn nuts, corny jokes, corn quesadillas, walking tacos,, and all sorts of non corny things such as toothbrushes, tampons, condoms, soap, eye drops, etc. Stop by to escape the sun and play some board games, grab a needed item from our cornvenience stand, and lounge around with a refreshing drink. Late at night we plan to wind things down and create a safe space for people to relax, decompress, and watch old cartoons.
landmark: Corn on the Cob Floaty on a 10x10 shade structure

name: PhoCureBurn
description: PhoCureBurn is a Vietnamese-inspired cafÃ© serving comfort food to the citizens of Black Rock City. We believe food has the power to bring people together and foster a sense of community. Our goal is to create a welcoming space where burners can connect, share stories, and form lasting memoriesâ€”whether over an iced (!!) coffee or a steaming bowl of pho.
landmark: Neon PhoCureBurn sign on frontage

name: Hair of the Dog (HOTD)
description:
HOTD(Hair Of The Dog) is the oldest longest running bar at Burning Man.  We hold a piece of the original fire.  HOTD gives raw performances and spontaneous acts and entertainment powered by you!  HOTD is a donation bar ran on participation and gifts by burners like you! 
If you bring the booze and the music, then we supply the music and the booze!
landmark: large orange letters above frontage "HOTD"

name: Good Enough Live Band Karaoke
description: If you ever had a secret desire to sing onstage with a live band, Good Enough Live Band Karaoke will unleash your inner rockstar and make it happen!  We are a full rock band with backup singers and a rocking sound sytem that will bolster you while you belt out your favorite shower tune. From Chapelle Roan,AC/DC and Nirvana to Taylor Swift, The Killers, Amy Winehouse, Shania Twain, The Misfits,  and everything in between, we play and YOU sing.
landmark: Fever Dream Theatre and Tazii Moroccan tent

name: My Dad's House
description:
My Dad's House is a cozy, classic respite from the maximalism of BRC and we offer a cornucopia of Dad-led wonderment. Be it dance parties, movement workshops, live jams, philosophy discussions, cereal breakfasts, poetry slams, socialist propaganda, or super-tan buttholes, there's something for everyone :]

At the same time, we're seeking to creatively redefine fatherhood, to reclaim masculinity, and to reparent ourselves, our friends, and our inner children. Y'all are warmly invited to hang out, write a letter to your Dad in our garage, and enjoy a sense of shelter, of safety, of home (and to boogie down and heckle and giggle and tickle and squirm too!). 

So c'mon by, ditch the shit, and stay a while.
landmark: Big-ass house, slackline pyramids, & yer dads!

name: Ashram Galactica
description:
The Grand Hotel | Your Home Away From Home Away From Home 

Located Directly Above the Center of the Earth
landmark: Large Morrocan Tent and Ashram Galactica sign

name: Twisted Swan Celtic pub
description: The Twisted Swan and Bacchus!  Come for a calm cool after noon or a nice cold pint at night.
landmark: The celtic flags and the red door

name: Boonville Camp
description:
Join us at our Love Lounge: a place to join a meditation, have some tea and tarot, or just chill out.Â \n\n

We invite you to join us for our Thursday night Cabaret: an old-school spontaneous talent show.Â
landmark: The pink heart above camp, lit at night

name: VW Bus Camp
description: Want to participate at Tomorrow Today driving to the Playa in an old VW Bus or other unique camper? Well, Welcome Home to VW Bus Camp, a wonderful Burning Man theme camp which has been placed and participated on the Playa every Burn since 1998. So first, make sure to change out your leaky fuel lines, check your tires, carry a fire extinguisher and pack lots and lots of spare parts and then join us and participate in Camp's many interactive projects. Yep, we still have a tie dye party amongst other cool stuff. This is a wonderful opportunity for you to bring out your own projects to share and teach us all something new. Welcome Home and see you in the dust!
landmark: Old VW Campers

name: Atlantis
description: Atlantis returns from the dust with mezcal, myth, and music. Our lounge is open 24/7. Two DJ parties to incite dance rituals. By day: tea, meditation, and rest. By night: light, rhythm, and strange delights. Come curious. Stay so long that you forget why you came.
landmark: 7-foot-tall disco trident hanging at front of camp

name: Camp As-Is
description: Camp As-Is wants you to come as you are because that's how we do.  We're dancers, builders, and menders.  Rusty MetalWorxz can mend your stainless, steel, & aluminum so bring it 10a-2p.  Fire circle, shaded flow space, benches, fans and music sit along side our mutant vehicle The Rusty Iris who will keep the downbeat playing all week.
landmark: 5 elements fire poofers - Rusty Metal Worxz sign

name: Camp Bean Water
description: Beans, flicking, roasting, steamy dripping love, room for cream â€“ our secret steps to the finest cup of coffee. Bring your brewtiful self over to Camp Bean Water to enjoy a cup and let us show you the full potential of a coffee shop. All cups of coffee our baristas serve-up are made to order and come with positive affirmations. Looking for something to fill your now stimulated colon, our cooks can fry you up mouth-watering arepas. Love and good vibes are abundant in our cafe, so drip on in. We're open every weekday morning. We have special evening events like arepa night and a special sunrise opening.
landmark: "Camp Bean Water" large painted sign.

name: Armageddon Bike Camp
description: It's not the end of the world, it's the safe word! Think Armageddon for all your bike needs. We've been providing Bike Love Bike Repair on-playa for about 15 years, and we offer professional bike repair daily. Or fix your own bike at our Public Bike Repair stations, 24x7! We also host great parties, don't miss our Wednesday afternoon Alley Cat Race and After Party with Funny Bike Demo! Our well-stocked BoozeBar opens on (polite) demand. Blend yourself a refreshing frozen beverage on our Blender Bike while you're there! Our 28ft dome 'living room' / shade structure provides the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather. Open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!
landmark: 28 ft dome with blue, orange, yellow cover

name: Street Life Hip Hop on the Playa
description:
Sunny days, where the beats don't fade,
Where the bass kicks in and the records play.
Can you tell me how to get, how to get to Street Life?

Old-school jams and a dance floor bright,
Cookies, rhymes, and a vibe so tight.
Follow the groove, the funk feels rightâ€”
Welcome to Street Life, day or night!
landmark: Big White Shade Tent with Cookie Monster in front

name: Miki Beach
description:
Miki Beach is inspired from an array of beach lounges in Miami and the Caribbean, and mimicking these beach lounge vibes, we are striving to create an open, breezy, colorful environment to relax and have fun.  
Miki Beach is your desert oasis so come celebrate with us at one of our playful parties, sip on one of our delectable libations, visit us for our Brazilian BBQ on Saturday or participate and become a winner on one of our silly activities such as the Miki Beach State Fair.
landmark: Miki Beach sign attached to truss & fake palm tree

name: Radio Electra
description: Live coverage of Burning Man streaming 24-7 during the event. Real news, Fake news, mayhem, music and good times.
landmark: Lighted Signs out front

name: Xpat Alien
description:
Xpat Alien has searched far and wide, through many galaxies, to find a new place to rest our travel weary heads. Earth fits the bill and we have decided to stay.
We bring with us the Crop Circle Cantina, complete with 80' of circular shade, phenomenal DJs spinning epic tunes, a bar top with stripper poles for dancing shenanigans, six 3-butt benches to relax on, Colorado brewed craft beer and root beer on tap, and glasses full of ice filled with our own Alien Punch.
landmark: Silver and blue space ship canopy

name: AprÃ¨s Ski Injury
description:
AprÃ¨s Ski Injury is an interactive camp offering an AprÃ¨s-Ski Bar, a Morning Coffee Bar as well as a thrill ride: A ski ramp in the middle of the desert! Our bar is open every afternoon till late night and offers not only drinks, but entertainment, fun games and fire.
You can also ski!

We will have also events (see WhatWhereWhen) and ski-races.
landmark: Ski Ramp and the big "Apres Ski Injury" neon sign

name: IcyHands Chillzone
description:
We seek out the weary, the overheated and the disconnected to offer our signature Icy Hands experience.  The instantaneous sense of relief, joy and connection turns recipients into PARTICIPANTS and makes them part of a larger whole.  Icy Hands epitomizes "the gift that keeps on giving"  by coaching recipients through providing the experience to others.  Hands are cooled to near freezing temperatures by means of a simple block of ice, then with full positive consent of the recipient, those hands are placed upon the neck and jaw, providing an immediate sense of cool, calm and connection. 

Block of Ice: $5.  Memories, endorphins, friendship and dopamine rush: PRICELESS.
landmark: Blue and turquoise tie-dye tapestries and flags

name: Happy Hair Salon
description: Happy Hair Salon is a transformational hair salon where we showcase hair extensions as performance art. We offer hair extension makeovers, rave braids, beard braids, bubble braids and the like while serving snow cones and offering shade and relaxation in our antigravity chairs. Burnt out? Playafied beyond belief? Come to Happy Hair and we will help you get your groove back, but this time even better. Cause u might have the perfect outfit for Burning Man, but what do you really have if you don't have Happy Hair?
landmark: The 20 x 50  tent, pink and green strip runway

name: Inappropirates
description:
Come for piping hot pour over coffee! Meet interesting people! Challenge the Strip Plank! A harrowing game of skill and poise, walk the plank, grab the cock all while the crowd heckles you with supportive guff. Each time you fail, you can try again, but the price is an article of clothing! Winners get to skip the coffee line, losers lose more than their shirt... 9am to Noon, Monday through Saturday.
Wednesday from 5pm-6pm we will be hosting Capers Erotic Fiction Reading and Improv Competition! There may be puppets! Also, Thursday-Saturday , from 5pm-7pm our bar will be taken over by the mutinous Priva-tea-ers for piping cold ice tea! Join and walk the plank (with your pinkie out)!
landmark: Big wooden and LED "Inappropirates" sign

name: Nuclear Dandelion
description: Unlock Your Inner Radiance at Nuclear Dandelion! Come visit our "One Dandy of a Spa" daily for hydrating facial masks.
landmark: lighted circular "Nuclear Dandelion" sign in front

name: Sound Cabin
landmark: Sound Cabin

name: Embers
description: Our Desert Oasis Bar and Lounge offers craft cocktails alongside our popular self-postcard station, where participants write messages to their future selves that we mail before ticket sales as reminders of playa magic. Join us for daily morning yoga sessions, smutty poetry readings, and UV paint dance parties under our powerful blacklight system. Stop by our Playa Confessional booth to record your deepest burn revelations, then return for Absolution Happy Hour where we broadcast the previous day's confessions while serving themed forgiveness cocktails. When night falls, our burn barrel becomes a gathering place where strangers become friends over shared warmth and stories.
landmark: 20' lit octagon with "EMBERS" roof panels

name: Pinhole Project
description: Come create large format pinhole photography to capture art installations and the community in the desert! We have built a darkroom every burn since 1999. We host art-making workshops every morning. We take the workshop on an art tour using old-school pinhole cameras loaded with photographic paper. This allows participants to slow down, observe their surroundings more closely, and truly immerse themselves in the process of capturing images. Plus, the unique aesthetic of pinhole photography adds a distinctive charm to the photographs, making them truly special mementos of the experience.
landmark: Art gallery full of giant pinhole paper negatives

name: Black Rock Disc Golf Club
description:
Black Rock Disc Golf Club has a mushroom-themed disc golf course which embraces fun, games, friendly competition, collaboration, and creativity. We provide a place where folks can join together and throw one of the custom stamped discs loaned out at the camp. You can win one at one of our tournaments or events! The course is accessible 24/7, and discs glow in the dark so don't hesitate to swing by late night/early morning for a round. 


We also have some mushroom hazards on the course! We have tall ones, small ones, ones that glow, and ones that show you what disc golf is all about. It's definitely a psychedelic experience to walk through, even if you aren't in the mood to play a round. Just make sure to listen for the call of, "FORE!"
landmark: Disc golf baskets, mushroom sculptures, blacklight

name: IGNITED STATES
description:
Ignited States is all about our states of mind, our states of being, our states of consciousness. It's about lighting up our worlds. It's about igniting and fanning the flames of our creativity. And sometimes, it's about igniting the fire in our bellies with a shot of fireball.

- Ignite your artful state by making a flag or tetrahedron to illustrate the state you're in or immersing yourself in the lights and sounds of our two interactive art pieces, Point of Interest and Lucid
- Ignite your wakeful state with beverages and bad advice
- Ignite Your ready to party state at Let's Get This Party Started, Bangers & Mash, Fireball Friday Happy Hour or one of our popup dance parties 
- Ignited your playful state with our ring toss game, Heads of State
landmark: 3 colorful tetrahedrons (pyramids), lit at night

name: Silver City
description: While cooling down fellow burners with delicious soft serve ice cream,  and ice cold drinks. Silver City will be supplying the beats that will have peoples feet stomping and body swaying.
landmark: Large rocking horses, 8 ft Squid, Silver City sign

name: Black Rock Roller Disco
description: Every city has a roller skating rink. The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller skating rink for Blac Rock City. We ae a full service roller rink.  We have the skates, the funky music and we're always a funky good time every time.
landmark: Black Rock Roller Disco sign above the rink

name: AMAZONE
description: AmaZONE Camp is inspired by the power of the largest river in the world. We started out as a Brazilian camp and, in that way, we honor our South American heritage. We see each of the 10 principles of Burning Man reflected and encapsulated in every water molecule: inclusive, self-reliant, participative, immediate... Like water, like life. We are a hub of people who get together to reinforce our beliefs and share our studies.We like to provide experiences so people can contemplate water and the natural forces that rule existence. We are a tool for awakening. We bring up practices to heal our body and soul and by doing that we heal the whole. Be water, my friend.
landmark: A LARGE WATER VORTEX

name: Celestial Alchemy
description: Celestial Alchemy, the practice of inner transformation and parallels with the cosmic realms, a diverse camp that celebrates the love and connection of a transcendent humanity.  Join us for 10 Principle themed heartfelt yoga and conscious breathwork to revitalize your Burn spirit. Our celestial moon art piece is visible during dusk and early nighttime, accompanied by soft beats and easeful smiles. We look forward to morning movement and moonlit kisses with you.
landmark: Colorful signs that are placed in front of camp

name: Camp PtP - The Clock Ship Tere
description: Home port and mutant vehicle support camp for The Clock Ship Tere and her crew who have been sailing the playa regularly since 2010.
landmark: Large, domed, white fabric, shade structure.

name: Pookah Lounge/SNAFUBAR
description: Pookah Loungeâ€” an old-school burners' paradise, complete with fine company, xmas lights, art & music, thrills, and chills... But what makes it really cool is YOU. Drop by and be cool. SNAFUBARâ€”the better beverage barâ€”drop by and stay in school! We'll mix you the best drink on the Playa!
landmark: BAR + camo netting, star-shaped kinetic sculpture

name: Burning Sky
description: Skydivers over Burning Man. Come see Black Rock City from 9,000 feet in the air. Watch the skydivers exit the plane while you stay safely inside, and get an exciting ride back to the earth. Gifting rides Wednesday & Thursday 11a-5p.
landmark: "Burning Sky" Cartoon Sign visible from the street

name: Boots & Cats
description:
Join us on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday afternoon for kom"boot"cha - we'll have a rotation of refreshing flavors. 21+ burners can turn their kombucha into an alcoholic cocktail, if desired. 

For our creative cats, while you sip kombucha you can also decorate your dusty boots and hats and get your cat nametag (we'll provide DIY supplies). On Wednesday, we honor all boobs in a Boobs & Cats kombucha party, aka "Titty Takeover" with pastie decorating.

Missing your cat or furry friend at home? Write them a message and we'll mail it after the burn!
landmark: Boots & Cats and SLAPPERS ONLY signs; lit at night

name: I Need An Adult
description: Come hang out with adults, who need an adult. Play childish games, with childish adults. Release your inner child and we'll teach it bad words.Â
landmark: Neon sign  says I NeedAnAdult.

name: Better Bitstream Bureau
description: It is the mission of the Better Bitstream Bureau to be the leaders in Black Rock City for advancing the art of generating bits and inside jokes for each and every camp, burner, and sparkle pony on the playa. We celebrate the sudden, surprising, and chaotic subversion of expectations. If you need consultation on your bits, stop by our offices, where our team of puppets are standing by to assist you. And keep an eye out for our representatives who will be visiting camps to offer official grades for your bits.
landmark: 10 feet tall rainbow glowing monolith

name: Death Guild Thunderdome
description: Join us for our nightly exhibition of good-natured tussles. Remember, if you don't participate, there is no show. Bring your own partner. When the sign is lit, we're open. Usually around 9 PM.
landmark: geodesic dome with "Death Guild/Thunderdome" sign

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Come taste anything real or imagined at the Yum Cart! Playfully-mindful camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness. Daily experiments in vulnerability, intimacy, self-discovery, and storytelling.
landmark: The Rainbow Colored Yum Sign!

name: Firelight Film & Lemonade Retreat
description: Firelight Film and Lemonade Retreat: Escape, recharge and commune. Join us at our oasis for cold lemonade and warm interaction. Our retreat is designed for you to pause, reflect, and converse. Participate in an interactive racial redlining discussion with Dr. Rich. Join us for fun, funny, and entertaining video shorts at the Ring of Chill Fire.
landmark: Lemonade stand! Yellow and black banners.

name: Save the Monarch
description: Save The Monarch
landmark: Save The Monarch sign with Butterflys

name: POWERHOUSE
description: PowerHouse is the on-Playa home of the Sunbelt Rental Power and Heavy Equipment service teams for Burning Man DPW and dozens of Theme Camps.
landmark: Green Shipping Container with Green/Yellow Flag

name: FDA: Food & Dance Administration
description: If you're on the hunt for a warm bite to eat, a drink, and a chill spot to groove to some kick-ass beats, your quest ends here! Report to the food & Dance Administration and make new friends at our daily themed Beats and Eats events. Back for a 4th year of valuing self-expression, openness, and an infectious vibe of fun, we guarantee genuine connections, thought-provoking ideas, and unique themed parties.
landmark: The 75 foot Big top white circus tent.

name: Bungalow
landmark: Bungalow sign and orange velvet couches

name: Cirque du Sol Risers
description: Cirque Du Sol Riser is a fire, flow, and movement arts camp bringing high-energy performances, absurd competitions, and interactive workshops to Black Rock City. From the sultry "Sex on a Slackline" showdown to the "Butt Cheek Olympics," we invite you to play, perform, and push your limits. Our fire jams and "Heckle & Flow Show" nights challenge performers to spin their props while enduring comedic roasts from the crowd. Whether you're here to dance, heckle, or simply bask in the spectacle, we welcome all playful souls to join the fun!
landmark: CIRQUE DU SOL RISERS Marquee Sign

name: STEEP?
description: GOOD JOB! You made it to Burning Man. Now come playfully question existence with us at STEEP?. Explore you inner child with games, heckling, random acts of wonder, authenticity, connection, and... DRINKS. We love them. With alcohol, without alcohol, and often featuring plant extracts and ALWAYS made with love. Come Drink in the Love at camp STEEP? ya weirdos.
landmark: Bamboo fence, Aframe sign, fire pit, white tent

name: M*A*S*H 4207th
description: Attention all personnel! Come visit the MASH 4207th - best care anywhere! Relax during the day for ice cold PBRs and the best martinis on the Playa. Enjoy the shade of our vintage tents and the company. Return at night for a break from the chaos of the burn with nightly showings of MASH TV episodes.
landmark: 15ft tall, 10 ft wide army green sign

name: Ocean Beach
description: Ocean Beach is a sun-soaked fever dream of surf shacks, sea creatures, and boardwalk absurdity. Join our salty circus for lobster pizza rituals, smoothie shamans, sunset cocktail ceremonies, and the infamous ode to JB's cheeseburger in paradise. Stretch your soul with yoga, tantra, and sound healing. Play boardwalk games, ride silly rides, and lounge like a sea god. We're a 100% green camp and compost collection site riding the tide toward a stranger, better world. New beach bums always welcome â€” come get weird by the waves.
landmark: Large Ocean Beach welcome portal

name: Cornstars
description: Everybody wants to be a CORNSTAR!  That means YOU!!!  Stop by for a delicious cocktail during our Bar Hours (M/W/F:  2-4PM; Tu/Th 6-8PM; Sa: 11:00AM-1:00PM)!!  We would love to see you!!  Every day, we have Cornshoots, where we can take your picture with an instant film camera.  And, we have plenty of corny outfits and props for you to include in your Cornshoots!!  If you need a picture for this year's Christmas card, we are the camp for you!!!  And, keep an eye out for our BILF (Bar I'd Like to Find) in the deep Playa!  You never know where we might show up!!!
landmark: Cornstars Sign

name: Potty Project
description: Home of the Potty Project a group of volunteers helping teach LNT at the potties and make the potties fun! We offer volunteer shifts M-F of the event so stop in to sign-up!
landmark: Blue porto potty art piece

name: fruitPOP
description: Founded in 2019, fruitPOP is a LGBTQ-centered theme camp dedicated to radical self-expression, inclusivity, and pure, unfiltered queer joy. We create a vibrant, consent-driven space where playful absurdity meets delightful connection. Whether you're a longtime fruity member or a first-time guest, you're part of our ever-evolving, radically welcoming community. Join us, participate, and let's make magic together on the playa!
landmark: Neon flags, fruit lights, signs & undie chandelier

name: SoulSound
description: Step into SoulSound, where rhythm meets intention and every visitor becomes part of the magic. Let the music guide youâ€”through sound journeys, dance jams, and moments that move something deep within. Whether you're flowing with the beat or sharing meaningful exchanges, every note and connection is designed to touch your soul. Come curious, leave transformed.
landmark: Tent with a SoulSound sign with lights

name: Slow the Fuck Down
landmark: Line of Fire - Flame effect (12 flames); white trash fence around camp

name: Camp Come Find Us CCFU
description: Here at Camp Come Find Us (CCFU) we are a camp that is about finding yourself and exploring who you are at Burning Man.  Every journey is individual and unique.  Come flow with us and find your journey!  We will create a laid-back and spontaneous atmosphere, and our offerings will be inspiring and fulfilling. We endeavor to create a strong community among our fellow Burners. Come find us and find yourself!
landmark: Green School Bus, and rainbow flags on main tent

name: The Island
description:
A French Polynesia theme camp of mostly residents in this beautiful paradise. Wanting to share his marvelous culture with you.
Don't miss out on the chance to participate in some social experiments.
landmark: The banner : The island presents: tahiti 'n' chill

name: Golden Gate Project
description: Best way to describe our camp address would be as if you were describing someone who has never been to San Francisco.  Look for the San Francisco Bridge.  Except at Burning Man our camp is best described by a 60 ft long, 26 ft tall replica of the San Francisco Golden Gate parked at our camp.    When the Golden Gate is not parked at camp, our camp main entrance driveway is marked on each side by 15 ft tall wooden, painted in international orange,  replicas of the Golden Gate bridge's metal towers
landmark: Golden Gate Bridge

name: 1001 Nights
description: 1001 Nights is a desert sanctuary where anyone who enters our dome is immediately welcomed, acknowledge and heard. We offer Makateeb where you can enjoy an Arabic coffee/tea while writing out your story for our treasure chest.  Once done, you can reach in and read a story left behind. In our main dome we will have DJs, musical acts, spoken word nights, movies under the stars, etc. The dome is decked out with foam flooring, mattresses, cushions, pillows, blankets and low top tables.  So one minute it can be our dancefloor and the next minute our lounge. Whatever the offering, we want people to feel like 1001 nights gives rest to weary souls desperate to recharge.  It should feel like you would want to stay with us for at least 1001 actual nights.
landmark: Big dome with geometric fabric pattern

name: Bubbles and Bass
description: Bubbles and Bass is a 100% volunteer run art and music collective that brings joy to burner events worldwide! Our goal is to provide a home conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, energetically. Best known for our sunrise to midday dancing revelry: more Bubbles and Bass makes the playa a magical place!
landmark: Tan shade sails, and warm inviting glow by night

name: Afterglow Lounge & Spa
description: A communal space of nurturement where wandering burners can rejuvenate, relax and recharge.  A caring place where burners can restore and reignite their radiant glow. Come to enjoy the spa, grab a drink and relax at the lounge, or get weird to the sound of our beats to show off that new sexy glow!
landmark: Afterglow signage

name: IN DUST WE TRUST
description: A lovely camp, which has been giving away lingerie and pasties in exchange for a good life story for over 10 years now, serving snow cones in the afternoon sun and filled with people from all over the world, whose paths to our camp are always somehow unique and worth a story.
landmark: Blue and purple flags at the front, mermaid cutout

name: Cockpit
description: Welcome to the Cockpit. On the one hand, we will spirit burners away to the golden age of air travel where they can stop by, relax and recuperate in our airport lounge with an espresso or green juice by day, or a cocktail by night, before taking flight again back to the playa.
landmark: Large bell tent with orange wind sock

name: PlayAground
description: We are playground with radical swings, shade, lounge, bar, games & art.
landmark: 20' tall circle swing w/ 10' orange & blue flags

name: Coffee and Pasties
description: Coffee and Pasties, bringing organic peculator coffee back the Playa with great things to add like Whiskey or Irish cream and of course all the colorful pasties!
landmark: large hanging fire pit sculpture

name: Space Oddity
description: Your Space Oddity! Come celebrate the stars, the myths, the lessons and your own unique weirdness.
landmark: Large handmade Star Map

name: PopoVille
description: PopoVille is your local watering hole with an artisitc twist please come enjoy our excellent "M" cocktails and enjoy chilling out in our grafitti zone
landmark: 2 story bar with Michigan Flag flying

name: Fresh Squeezed!
description: Art & Lemonade since 2006. Come join us for ice cold lemonade and group painting.
landmark: Giant LED lemon

name: Jurassic Snark
description: Jurassic Snark presents The Bean Flicker Cafe coffee with a dose of Snark and little more. Games, Books, Open Mic Nights, Music, Dinosaur Erotica Readings. Come on by for a roaring good time!
landmark: The Jurassic Snarks Sign, lit at night.

name: Burnpops Scorpion Anglerfish
description: Burnpops Scorpion is a family friendly camp offering cocktails and popsicles all day long and taking you for a ride on their giant scorpion art car by night.
landmark: The big outdoor bar with multiple colors Burnpops

name: Forty is the new twenty
landmark: Metal obelisk out front, CO flag with a dog on it

name: Dolly Llamas
description: Serving southern hospitality and high desert camp since 2022. Stop by for one of our famous drag brunches and our Dolly Parton tribute party!
landmark: Bright pink camp with Dolly Llamas camp sign

name: Horny Camp
description: Horny Camp is an arts & crafts camp with a cheeky, sexy twist. Our crafts can be appropriate for everybody, from children to the childish (but pervy) at heart. Our main craft is horn making; we teach our guests to mold polymer clay to create little horns to wear on their heads. We also offer bar night events, and have an art gallery called the Gallery of Cocks that honors all things chicken, as well as other art. Visit the camp at hornycamp.com for activities list and photos of prior year's activities.
landmark: 10' orange fabric horns

name: Camp Shit Ain't Right
description: Wyoming-based with international flair - campmates from Wyoming, Canada, New Zealand, Russia, Australia, Ukraine, UK Germany, Netherlands... aaaand I'm definitely missing some. Come visit for public lounge, food, movie night, clothing boutique, large-scale, shitty punch and more!
landmark: Large "Camp Shit Ain't Right" sign & fairy lights

name: Wanderer's Camp
description: Our camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, ice-cold gin and tonic and hotdogs. Come by every afternoon from 3 -5 pm for a hotdog or veggie dog, a gin and tonic and enjoy the shade, great company and music
landmark: Large yellow and blue sign that says WANDERERS

name: Camp Piper
description:
A ragtag group of international babes who all appreciate the elegant screeching and sophisticated whine of the bagpipe. Currently seeking a bagpipe player! 
Our camp was founded in 2014 when most of us (being virgin burners) stranded on the playa at the same place, same time. We all woke up to the beautiful sound of the bagpipe. Every since we have been warming wandering souls on the Playa. Stop by for a drink, a hug, and a belly laugh. Sparkles, y'all!
landmark: flag with Camp Piper on it

name: Yellow Balloon
description: Yellow Balloon is a clean and sober camp at Burning Man, offering a space for fun, connection, and wellness without the influence of substances. We host daily recovery meetings, wellness events like yoga and breathwork, and interactive art experiences designed to uplift and engage. Our camp is a vibrant community of burners who love to have a great time while staying sober throughout the burn. We welcome all who are committed to sobriety and those curious to explore a sober experience, providing a supportive, inclusive space to thrive. Join us for a unique blend of fun, recovery, and creativity!
landmark: Yellow flags & balloons and Yellow Balloon sign

name: Champagne Lounge
description: Welcome to the Champagne Lounge! Amidst Black Rock City's hustle, our oasis offers luxurious relaxation. Step into our elegantly adorned shade, sip champagne poured by less than knowledgeable bartenders, and recline on plush playa-tech or mingle with fellow Burners. As the sun sets, enjoy twinkling lights and ambient music for a magical atmosphere. Cheers to the extraordinary!
landmark: Large wooden champagne bottle in front of camp

name: HellVetica
description: HellVetica is a Burning Man camp that celebrates the power and potential of propane. Members of HellVetica are all passionate about engineering and design, and come from a wide range of backgrounds and experiences.
landmark: Orange flame effect structure

name: Yellowstone Burners
description: Step right up to the Yellowstone Burner's Playacebo Experience! We have collected artisanal water from our home area around Yellowstone National Park, infused with the natural powers of this geothermal wonderland. Your Lifetender will guide you through the process of selecting the specific water elements that are meant just for you, creating a customized elixir guaranteed - and backed by research - to give you exactly what you need.
landmark: Shaded upper deck of a full-sized school bus

name: Om Skillet
description: Om Skillet - serving the playa Gourmet Grilled Cheese  lunches Monday through Thursday and hosting the Short Stack TuTu Tuesday dance party at 2:22pm on Tuesday since 2011.
landmark: pastel 30' dome, restaurant, and grass dance floor

name: The Missing Sock
description: Ever wonder where your missing socks go? Well this is your chance! The Missing Sock Monster comes back to the playa once a year! Curious at where your "missing sock" has gone? Please join us for fun sock activities!
landmark: Missing sock signs

name: Bisous
description: Welcome to Bisous. We are an experiential theme camp and non-profit co-created by a team with backgrounds in experience design, community building, and history building theme camps on playa.
landmark: tent in the shape of Black Rock City.

name: Body Shop
description: At the Body Shop, we believe bodies require regular maintenance. Our shop is a whimsical place where the worn down burner can relax their mind, refresh their body, and enjoy themselves for a bit before continuing on their journey. In the style of an auto-body repair shop, we are staffed with friendly mechanics ready to appraise, repair, and certify all of the bodies on the playa. Guests will enjoy a full gamut of traditional tune-ups reimagined for the human body: buffing, lubrication, oil change, painting, fueling, and waxing. We look forward to servicing you!
landmark: 3ft camp sign with colorful letters and an arrow

name: BRC3PO (BRC 3:00 Post Office)
description: Set in a giant rural postbox, the Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services up to 16 hours per day. We offer authentic, one-on-one, creative interactions that range from the side-splittingly silly to the supremely sublime. We also provide an array of curated Burning Man postcards and postage to send those postcards anywhere in the world - as our gift to the citizens of Black Rock City.. Imagine the intersection of immersive improvisational theater, spontaneous talent show, soulful conversation, and stifling yet corrupt bureaucracy. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO -- YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO, if you pay us a visit!
landmark: Giant white postbox with BRC3PO sign and red flag

name: Gong Wrong
description:
"Gong" is both a universal cognate (the same word in virtually every language), and an onomatopoeia (a word that sounds the same as what it describes). It's also a highly under-appreciated musical instrument, as it's typically played loudly, but poorly!

Join us at Gong Wrong for sound meditations with gongs and sound bowls to explore deeper states of consciousness. Reveal your deepest self in ecstatic dance or by playing one of our many drums or gongs. Catch us at our Wednesday night camp party with DJ sets and live percussionists, or meet us on the playa as we share the same energy serendipitously!
landmark: Gong Wrong Illuminated Sign

name: Glorious Paint Hole
description: Come visit our Glorious Paint Hole. Yes paint! There will be music and games here, and we will end our week with some Caturday shenanigans. Our lemonade bar is open during our events. Come get crafty on Friday because we will be getting ready for Caturday and designing some fun cat ears to take home.
landmark: Wooden Wall with Holes in it

name: Someplace Cozy
description: Someplace Cozy offers a restorative sanctuary to the citizens of Black Rock City.  Join us for iced tea, then wander into our cozy space for mindful relaxation, mental and physical recovery, chill beats, and deep conversations.  Our air conditioned tent offers a range of daytime programming, including somatic movement mediations, mindset workshops, yoga, breathwork, and supple soul stretching.  Come by at night for an ambient lounge to relax in.
landmark: Someplace Cozy sign, purple/blue lanterns at night

name: ZaZen
description: Welcome to ZaZen!  Come by and relax in our shade, race our slalom course, leave your sins behind in our Cosmic Confessional and grab a cup of Elvis Espresso every morning.  We are a open and welcoming camp excited to meet new and old burners and share the magic of Black Rock together!
landmark: Cosmic Confessional Booth!

name: EYERIS
description: Last year we did IRIS photography and had so much fun!! The only change we are making is added a few more members to help us get to more IRIS PHOTOS!!! Come on down and make some crafts while you wait for your turn to get an image of your IRIS! (SOMETIMES we even add something special into the PUPIL!)
landmark: OUR EYERIS PHOTOS Posters!!

name: Stardust Cove
description: Salty sea Sirens will lure you into our Pirate lair serving soothing libations and delightful delicacies. Are you and your crew brave buccaneers at heart? Then you can spin our ship's helm "Wheel of Dustiny" to determine your fates! Fates may include singing sea shanties, treasure hunting, raiding, walking the plank, and much more! Mon-Fri 3-5pm
landmark: Crow's Nest Tower - a 16' observation tower

name: Camera Obscura Tribe
description:
We invite you to the world of photography - from enrichment of visual experience to technical support and guidance: we do it all! Our camp is home for everyone - with or without cameras, photographers and just artists.  

As a service, we offer professional photography for everything, from playa weddings to personal sessions and public events - just ask!  We have a walk-in photobooth and plan various photo-related workshops.
landmark: Look for big lit at night letters "Camera Obscura"

name: Caravan of Light
description: Caravan of Light (COL) is an Art Camp at Heart! We are a global collective of Artists from diverse cultures, coming together to share our unique gifts - visual and performance art, music, dance, holistic teachings, and a deeper understanding of Burning Man Hospitality. In line with our BM Ethos of "Radical Inclusion" - Every Black Rock City Citizen is warmly Welcomed!!!
landmark: Gates of Liberation Archway Entrance - 20 feet

name: SLAYER!
description: Come sip heavy metal themed craft cocktails while banging your head to the finest metal tunes on the playa at our Heavy Metal Happy Hour. Slinging drinks until 6:66PM.
landmark: Huge skeletons and black SLAYER flags.

name: Dick Shaped Foods
description: Are you tired of food that's too round? Come to Camp Dick Shaped Foods for a snack that fits in your grip the way Mother Nature intended! Camp DSF is an interactive food camp that offers phallic sustenance, long and girthy dance parties, and our world famous Dickleback shots. Join us throughout the week for workshops, games, food and drinks, and some decidedly amateur burlesque.
landmark: Neon Dick Shaped Food Sign

name: CEOdeck
description:
A remote work retreat for the emotionally Over-employed.
 Join our fake workflow.
landmark: Solar string lights and tall platforms

name: Suuuper Busy
description: Built on the warmth of Canadian hospitality, our camp invites everyone to join in on the fun â€” whether it's playing silly games from the wheel of chance, sipping on custom cocktails, or vibing to some drum and bass tunes. Come hang out!
landmark: Blue flag w/ orange writing that says SUUUPER BUSY

name: Glow Job
description: Glow Job comes alive at night on playa. Home of psychedelic neon art, sculpture and personal beauty services. Visit our glowing blacklight art and beauty salon after sunset while you get ready for late night playa adventures. Blow your mind while you get your nails done. Get your face painted then melt it off. We are LGBTQ+.
landmark: Black lit animal sculptures out front

name: Cosmica
description: Cosmica is the place where rationals and mystics meet. Dip into the cosmic theater, take a meditative journey through the stars, dance to galactic tunes at our Cosmic Feel party.
landmark: Cosmica sign, floating planets & celestial spheres

name: La FelicitÃ
landmark: La FelicitÃ  sign

name: Deep Playa Surprise
description: Deep Playa Surprise brings the magic of the Deep Playa to the citizens of Black Rock City by offering daily gifts of a variety of flavors.  This year were offering up pulled sandwiches, coffee and donuts, cocktails, standup comedy and playa swag.  Come write in our never-ending story book and then go on a Super Journey!
landmark: Deep Playa Surprise freeway off-ramp style sign.

name: Molotov Cocktail
description:
Our shaded bar/chill space offers welcome respite and comfort for the dusty and thirsty.
We will be bringing a variety of alcoholic beverages for the citizens of Black Rock City. We will be keeping various items on ice to refresh the weary wanderer.
We offer a variety of games including cribbage, liar's dice & board games for individual and tournament play.
landmark: Big lit Molotov Cocktail sign

name: Sunset Lounge
description:
Sunset Lounge and Frick Frack Black Jack, you know us and you love us.
Up to our usual shenanigans .. Come find us!
landmark: Large LED Arch and 3 green lasers

name: Iron Rose
description: A relaxing bar offering shade, games, photo booth, and only somewhat dusty seating.
landmark: Red shade structure with Iron Rose signage

name: Light Cone
description: We bring this recreation spot to healing your body mind & soul by foot and sound bath surrounding the pure essential oils mister fountains.
landmark: 2 White Tents & 1 large canopy, lit at night

name: Playfully Yours Village
description: Playfully Yours VIllage fosters love and playfulness through connection, expression and creativity. We have a well equipped dungeon for those who are beginners and intermediate and also those who have been curious about dungeon play. We provide a welcoming experience in a safe and supervised dungeon. We have a variety of equipment and toys for you to experiment and play. We focus on the lighter more sensual side of dungeon play. Spend some time in our Playfully Yours Lounge and enjoy a tasty beverage. Spin our wheel of play, we dare you! Enjoy being the pet in our human petting zoo. Enjoy a spanking or flogging while you visit! Enjoy our great music, stop by to dance, and drink with us!
landmark: petting zoo, web of chains, large lit name sign

name: Rustic WerQ Ranch
description: Rustic WerQ Ranch is a camp full of people who make the many art projects happen on playa.  Drop by for a whiskey or a water.
landmark: White 25' trailer w "Rustic Ranch Fur" on it

name: Alborz
description: If you find yourself parched and disoriented, listen carefully. Follow the melody and you may just stumble across camp Alborz. We'll be happy to nurture your body and soul before we send you back off to find the next adventure.
landmark: Mountain Range of shade with large neon sign

name: B.E.D Bureau of Erotic Discourse
description: Welcome to the B.E.D Bureau of Erotic Discourse! Our camp is dedicated to promoting consent culture at Burning Man by ensuring every theme camp has a BEDucator. We believe in the importance of education and empowerment when it comes to fostering a safe and consensual environment on the playa. Our team of passionate volunteers is committed to providing information and resources to help every camp create a respectful and inclusive space for their participants. Join us in our mission to make Burning Man a place where consent is prioritized and respected by all.
landmark: Hot pink/orange BED Lounge with beds and BED map

name: Soft Landing
description: Soft Landing offers a comfortable space to drink tea, hydrate, and rest in our Full Circle Tea House. Soft Landing also presents the Palenque Norte speaker series featuring over 40 visionary talks and stories spanning concepts such as technology, community organization, medicine, art, science, design and ethnobotany.
landmark: Large white circus tent and the 20 baby blue flags

name: Orphan Endorphin
description: Orphan Endorphin:  a  camp for tomorrow.  Gone are the days of today.  Our camp sits somewhere in between what we were and what we will be tomorrow.  Its like a memory or a dream  a nightmare,  for some if you will,  but dystopia for all.
landmark: Bill and Ted, the Skeleton Guards

name: Santo CabrÃ³n
description: Anarquismo bailable para toda la familia
landmark: camp name in large signs

name: Uncle Larry's Misguided Burners
description: We are the Misguided Burners of Uncle Larry! Home of KART Radio on 88.3FM! Taste a home-brew while getting weird on the streets of BRC!
landmark: Carport near street, large radio tower on RV

name: Beats 'n Deets
description:
Don't lose your shit when you lose your shit. Label it first at Beats 'n Deets. We make labels for all your stuff with a mug shot style photo with you and your camp details on it making it easy for people to return it to you or easy to find at lost and found. And it's a great souvenir. 
Come join us for drinks, specialised in NA drinks, in our circus tent with animated projections on the wall and some of the most underrated DJ's on the playa.
landmark: 40 foot furniture van and large circus tent.

name: Alma Borekas
description:
Moroccan atmosphere with Middle Eastern influence. Traditional chilling area and An open bar serving signature cocktails 2 PM - 4 PM. 

Our legendary Borekas will be served on Tuesday, and mint tea will warm you up at night.
landmark: Big White tent,flags "Alma Flags"

name: At the Oasis
description: A large 30' x 20' wide Moroccan-style tent with keyhole openings that houses a chill space, 24/7 cold water and lemonade and jewelry making.
landmark: A large 30' x 20' wide Moroccan-style tent

name: Jurassic Playark
description: Jurassic Playark promises a prehistoric party experience like no other. So grab your dino-gear and let's make this desert adventure legendary before we all go extinct!!
landmark: Jurassic Park Sign Duh!

name: 706 Tribe
landmark: large neon sign saying '706'

name: Shamandome
description: Since 2008, Shamandome Camp has introduced the citizens of Black Rock City to Core Shamanism as described by Michael Harner and offered shamanic healing, reawakening burners to their rightful spiritual relationship with all nature. The sound of a single drum beating at 185 bpm puts you into an Altered State of Consciousness (ASC), allowing you to journey to the Lower World, where you can meet your Power Animal, get answers, and heal yourself. You can do this because you're human. It is your connection to Mother Earth.
landmark: Shamandome logo displayed on our Greeter Tent.

name: Doggenheim Gallery
description:
Need to get away from the party and chill out? Come by our 24/7 interactive art gallery to enjoy the vibes, paint and check out artwork created by your fellow Burners.

Our gallery guides will be in from 11:00am until about 2pm daily to help you discover YOUR fursona and bring you closer to your inner animal. Refreshing beverages will be served.

PET DOGS, create art and chill out!  Check out our events in the WhatWhereWhen guide. Don't miss our gallery opening party on Thursday from 2pm-5pm to celebrate the artwork that people have created throughout the week!
landmark: Light up "Doggenheim Sign" on gallery entrance

name: Nose Fish
description:
Come get coffee from an undisclosed appendage of the Nose Fish itself Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday mornings and stay for the music! This year weâ€™re giving away cookies!
Bike repair clinics are happening Monday, Tuesday mornings 10:30-12:30 and Thursday afternoon 2-4:30
Hella Halo-Halo Thursday 2-4:30 during bike repair - come get a refreshing Filipino shave ice treat! Donâ€™t forget your cup or bowl!
Electronics Repair M-F 2:00 - 4:30 personal lighting repair/tutoring
Sewing repair service M, T, Th, & F 2:00 - 4:30: come darn your dazzling duds with our resident seamster/seamstress at our super sewing service!
landmark: NOSE FISH sign (LED at night, banner during day)

name: Argonauts
description: Cherish the uncertain, challenge fear, welcome the odd, and seek thyself!  The Argonauts bring a unique and infectious spirit which we share across the playa and in conjunction with reenergizing camp activities including our high-noon ArgoDogs and ArgoShine-enhanced induction ceremonies.  Besides our Argonaut spirit and noontime hot dogs, our gifts include Argonaut dust, sun & fashion bandanas, temporary Argonaut tattoos, and spiritually-assigned individual Quests for each newly inducted Argonaut for the coming year.
landmark: Argonaut flags and beached hull of our Argo ship

name: No ReGretzkys
description:
Wayne Gretzky said, "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take." 

At No ReGretzkys we want to make sure you take all the HOCKEY shots. We're a camp that wants to show you how to handle your stick and play with our balls. Our goal is to get you in our hole, the six-hole! 

We serve hockey shenanigans, Tim Whoretons coffee, donut hoes, and face, face, face during Drag Queens on Ice!
We're a slice of Canadiana. Just like Americana but nicer, more apologetic, and with better healthcare. 
Don't have any ReGretzkys, come and join the Canadian shenanigans!
landmark: 60 foot hockey rink

name: 2 girls 1 camp
description: We serve solar-powered slushies packed with fiber to help keep your playa digestion on point. Come chill in our shaded throne room, earn an "I Pooped Today" badge, and explore remedies for those desert bathroom blues. Join the Great Booty Hunt, a cheeky treasure map adventure to the most gloriously decorated porta-potties on playa. And don't miss our blindfolded coconut oil wrestlingâ€”slippery, hilarious, and legendary.
landmark: '2 girls 1 camp' neon sign

name: Cosmic Giggle
description:
Welcome to Cosmic Giggle! We are burners spanning from NYC to the Bay and crossing continents to London and Beirut. Our name is inspired by an experimental documentary that explores the expansive energy field that we, together, create...and one thing is for sure, it can get pretty random! Here's what we have in store for you this year:
 
We've got a gym! Who said being Playa meant missing out on your pump up?
We've got classes! We work out your externals, navigate your internals, and will get you giggling!
We've got a bar! Rehydrate with electrolytes. Dehydrate with booze. Though beware: we may make you work for it!
Looking to keep your heart rate mellow? We've got cosmic croquet and an oasis lounge.
OH, and meet Freddy, our resident GODZILLA!

 So come on: Enter our cosmic chaos. Have a Giggle!
landmark: Big Green Dinosaur

name: PALINKA LOUNGE
description: Palinka Lounge offers a welcoming respite for Burners new and old around the globe, we offer a comfortable environment for Burners to take a moment to relax, have a drink, introduce themselves, and learn about what it means to be a burner (or learn about Hungarian burners) gaining from our camp-members Burning Man knowledge. We do this not only through sharing a drink, but also by engaging in activities together such as arts/craft, games or trampoline.
landmark: Large red tent with a wooden gate up front

name: Deep Ohm
description: Deep Ohm is a place for centered connection, friendship, and fun. We build large art, burn larger fires, and enjoy spending time in our cozy home on the playa. We are a mutant vehicle support camp for Burnie the Bonfire and we are focused on creating a safe space for anyone who is interested in learning design, engineering, and fabrication. Mistakes are celebrated because they are opportunities to grow. We also serve s'mores and jams around the campfire all night.
landmark: Deep Ohm sandwich board sign

name: Clamp Camp
description: The Clamp Camp mission is to help you hold it togetherâ€¦temporarily. Please stop by to consult with our Clamp Counselors who will help you with your clamping needs, or stay a while for our creative clamptivities.
landmark: Clamp Camp sign on a 20x30 white tent

name: Rabble Rousers
description:
Rabble Rousers is home to the legendary Shenanigan Wagon, a two-level mutant vehicle that roams the playa bringing music, community, and unforgettable vibes. We're here to create joy through ice cream socials, interactive bar events, unique DJ performances, and welcoming spaces for lounging, dancing, and connecting. 

Come find us, join our adventures, and stay in touch.
landmark: Rabble Rouser Signage

name: Lovin' Oven
description:
In the middle of the desert: hot, dry and dusty, we bake bread. Every morning. Just for you!
Let us feed, host and entertain you. Enjoy our freshly baked bread, delight in our fresh mint tea and revel in all kinds of eclectic mid-morning entertainment. Nourish your body, soothe the soul, and awaken to the day with joy.

Since 2011 we've been serving hungry, dusty, lovely Burners freshly baked sour dough foccacia, straight from the oven. Served with any array of tasty toppings, including some vegan loaves everyday and freshly brewed mint tea.
landmark: 18 foot tripod with neon Loaf & Lovin Oven' sign

name: Organic Fruit & Veggie Camp
description: Daily Fruit & Veggie Bar offering fresh organic produce in a relaxed lounge space. Daily workshops and special offering to wet your palette and tickle your fancy.
landmark: Big Vertical Green Flags that say ORGANIC

name: Camp Synthesis
description: Camp Synthesis embodies the melding of three things: Synthesizers, Sake, and Sushi. Here's the concept: People who like producing music with synths, midi instruments, drum machines, etc., hanging out, jamming, teaching others to make music, performing live sets, share Japanese food, and sharing a drink (æ—¥æœ¬é…’).â€¯ Daytime event include interactive synthesizer jams in our domesynths, drum machines, samplers, vocoders, and sequncers.â€¯ Following learning something, we will host a synth jam circle, where anyone can show up and jam with us or use the synths we've got.â€¯ We'll have a small sound system and will host some live performances for anyone who wants to come to "Open Synth" hour.â€¯  Following the Sushi Bar nights, we will host DJ sets from guest SF based DJs.
landmark: White unicorn with a pink horn, br flag, jp flag

name: Pablo's Breakfast Cantina & Spa
description: Start your day with breakfast quesadillas, churro pancakes, micheladas, margaritas, spa treatments, and dancing!
landmark: Lit up dome and the PABLO'S sign

name: Risa
description: Risa is a resort planet, renowned for its breezes, clothing optional beaches and friendly atmosphere. In the afternoon you can enjoy one of our snow cones and lounge in our enclosed kooled area. In the evening come eat, drink, sing, dance, play your instrument and be merry around the fire and enjoy our art.
landmark: 2 White yurts with snow cone feather flags

name: Swing City
description: Swing City brings the energy and vibe of the Original Muscle Beach in Santa Monica California to Burning Man. We strive to provide a safe welcoming playground that can be enjoyed by all ages. Come to participate or just hang out in our shade and watch the various acrobatics available as seasoned professionals and movement newbies alike explore our space.
landmark: 18' Scaffolding Structure

name: Tiger Man Camp
description: Need a stylish, functionable Moop bag
landmark: 3 ft tall tiger man with uplifted arms tiger head

name: EZ Tiger
description: EZ Tiger's Time Drop is an immersive art experience that uses water, audio, lighting, sculpture and mirrors to create an expansive environment that will bend your perception of time and space. Raindrops and eagle tears pour from the ceiling into a vast garden. With a turn of the control knob, the music slows and stretches, and the water begins to fall in slow motion. Real water drops, sparkling as they fall, slow and then hover in mid-air, each drop contorting before your eyes. If you find yourself stunned by the experience and would like to see it again, no worries -- you can reverse time by turning the knob the other direction, lift the water back into the sky, watch as it absorbs back into the eagles eyes, and then see the same drops fall again.
landmark: Large time machine box truck, Red flag

name: Creamee Coffee
description: We blend the invigorating spirit of Burning Man with the universal love for coffee. Each day, we serve up an eclectic mix of fun, innovative coffee creations that awaken the senses and fuel the soul. From espresso-infused adventures to creamy concoctions that defy the ordinary, our camp is a haven for coffee enthusiasts and curious souls alike. Join us for a cup of joy, connection, and creativity as we celebrate the magic of Burning Man one sip at a time.
landmark: Creamee Coffee Sign or at night a very tall led

name: The Society of Supreme Excellence
description: The Society for the Pursuit of Supreme Excellence cordially invites you to get improved physical & mental wellbeing through our elite Flexcore workouts, Yoga sessions & acoustic & amplified jams.
landmark: Three pentagonal dome structures

name: The Pink Squirrel
description: Ever catch yourself daydreaming about playing table tennis, diving into a ball pit, belly-flopping onto a trampoline packed with giant plushies, casually shredding on the drums, hunting for acorns like it's a competitive sport, napping like a zen jedi, dropping beats as DJ Nuts, and sipping pink cocktails at a squirrel themed tiki bar- all the while absolutely everything around you is unapologetically pink? Yeah, we thought so. Welcome to The Pink Squirrel, where you can finally do ALL the things and leave that boring, blinking world behind. Kid friendly, squirrel approved.
landmark: two 4ft pink mushrooms (lit up at night)  in front

name: Hello Mom!
description: Come celebrate the motherly figure in your life, whoever that may be! We provide stationary, stamps, and polaroid pictures to help you write a letter home to Mom, which we then mail from the BRC post office. We serve Mom's apple pie from our cozy living room to snack on while you write. Or, if writing isn't your thing, stop by for a bit of motherly advice or even just a shoulder to cry (or celebrate) on. We love moms and motherly figures of all types!
landmark: Giant letters spelling out "HELLO MOM!"

name: Stoop City
description: Stoop City captures the magic of a fever dream spent wandering the streets of Black Rock City. Come share a secret on our cozy stoops with a new friend, savor a steaming slurp of spicy ramen, or grab a last-minute bandaid from our Asian-inspired bao-dega. This might just be the late night corner bodega you never knew you needed.
landmark: Two large Stoops with a bench swing

name: Electric Gerbil
description: Camp for art crew of Commune, the light up table in the deep playa.
landmark: Sign that says "electric gerbil"

name: Cool Summer Breeze
landmark: Large flags

name: Dogs N Recreation
description:
Neighborhood Mini-Rec Center offering badminton/outdoor games, vegan and hot dogs, live postcards and board games.

Chill, on the outer roads, filled with a little chaos.
Grab a dog! Grab a chair! Let's play!
landmark: Indian and German flags, blow-up animals.

name: Bumblepuss
description: Bumblepuss brings a spa theme to the playa with the addition of the aromatherapy focused Lavender Lounge. Visit and soak in the aromas while you relax in the shade after your Steam Bath from our sister camp.
landmark: steam bath and lavender dome

name: Funky Monkey Camp
description: Furthering the funky merriment of maniacal monkeys everywhere! Music, PARTIES, fire, and climbing structures!
landmark: 22' tall triangular tower, metal Funky Monkey sign

name: Camp YNot
description:
Camp YNot is a sophisticated retreat from the congested main streets and the confusing chaos. Pinkee our Unicorn encourages all guests to escape society and class constraints. Wear your best and join usâ€¦
 
Camp YNot features Mega's Cantina, home of the Famous RosÃ©-All-Day Hour! and will once again be hosting Tapeworm Happy Hour. Always featuring single origin, artisanal tapeworms from around the globe. Choose wisely to suit your personal needs. (Antidotes will be available Saturday). Join us nightly for Pink Pony Club which will have an assortment of entertaining games available.
landmark: Pink Unicorn Camp YNot sign

name: Black Rock City Municipal Court
description: Join us for Court! Whether you're looking for legal information, know your rights trainings, or to simply grab a drink and talk to a tired attorney stop on by!
landmark: 4 large Roman columns and BRC Municipal Courthouse

name: Gaudium Genus Aureus
landmark: Large LED sign (green and red) in the shape of an eye

name: Mary E's Lavender Hand Wash
description: Come feel the Lavender Love and wash the day's playa away! A moment of tranquility is sacred in the desert, and we are here to honor that moment with a lovely hand wash!
landmark: Big purple hand

name: Camp BUI
description: The friendliest camp on the playa famous for our front porch. Drop by for a visit and a cold drink. Join us at sundown for a Shot of the Day or Thursday from 2:00 to 4:00pm for our Pineapple Upside Down Cake Thursday event. We are well known for our fine cuisine and repartee.
landmark: Lighted BUI Banner over entrance and corner sign

name: METAL MIMI
description:
Metal Mimi, the curious little creature who is our namesake, dwells at the Bay Area Metal Shop where Art Destined for the Playa is Born.

Metal Mimi is Witness to Art made Manifest and she is the Keeper of our Magical Dreams.

Metal Mimi Camp was created in honor of the Metal Workers, Welders, and Artists who work to bring their Art to the Dust.

We are here to help them.
landmark: White "METAL MIMI" on a black flag

name: Slutplatz
description: Slutplatz is a vibrant, inclusive camp where fun, laughter, and a little bit of naughty energy are always on the menu. Proudly rooted in the LGBT community, with members from San Francisco, Reno, and Boston, we offer a space where everyone is welcome to be themselves. Whether you're in the mood to grab a cold beer at our beer garden, unwind on our comfy bench, play some corn hole, or just vibe to the music, Slutplatz is the place to be for good times and great company. We're goofy, a little slutty, and always ready to celebrate life together!
landmark: Reflective, illuminated sign & beer garden bench

name: Blue Bull
description: We support the Mutant Vehicle Blue Bull â€” a glowing tribute to Maria Prymachenko's iconic 1947 artwork. This powerful, star-covered beast roams Black Rock City, crowned, bearded, and illuminated with vibrant spirit. Made in Ukraine, the Bull brings art, light, and soul to the dust. Our camp stands behind the vision, the crew, and the journey.
landmark: http://kurenivka.ua/bluebull

name: PLAYA 54
description:
We are a Dance Theme Camp located in the Tokyo sector playing the best Progressive & Melodic Techno. Come help build magical chaos with our new interactive art!
LET'S DANCE in the Dust Together!!
landmark: Large LED lit PLAYA54 sign

name: Off the Dome
description: Come explore & express yourself at Off the Dome! Formerly known as Freestyle Palace, Off the Dome is back in the playa Wonderland for its second decade as the original musical imagination sanctuary: the Playa Talent Incubator. Our namesake DIY Jam Dome is powered by the talent and creativity Black Rock City's citizens. Our stage, mics & instruments are available for singing, rapping and making impromptu music.  Off the Dome hosts the hip hop visionaries:  Black City All-Stars and Black Rock City Regional Air Guitar Championships - now in its 11th year, as well as the Galactivators. We are all about the magical love of performance! Come play & perform with other performers and creators at our innovative haven. At Off the Dome, do it live at Home in BRC.
landmark: Day glo green and orange dome, lit at night

name: Burner Buddies
description: We are a relaxed LGBTQI+ camp known for issuing Gay Cards, throwing the Gay Conversion Party to 'turn' people gay, and Genital Printmaking based on a traditional Japanese technique.
landmark: Tall BB sign

name: Habitat for Insanity
description: We create novel burner technology and use it to bring new experiences to Black Rock City.
