This includes shave ice machines invented by camp members, HVAC/refrigeration adaptations for our new installation "The Tundra," and geodesic dome design by one of the Burning Man old school masters.
landmark: Giant white igloo

name: PO9
description: We connect you with the world, we are the original way to get USPS mail to the playa, as we have been for decades.  We do: USPS to the Playa, Playa to any (international) address with a unique artistic postmark!  (US postage encouraged/required), and friendly (and not-so-friendly) posties: stand in line, and fill out your form... in triplicate... with crayon.
landmark: brcpo9 sign

name: PickleBack Mountain
description: Come by and enjoy our homemade Pickle Back Juice at our Pickle Back Bar. Come through our Saloon Doors in Space, mosey on up to bar, throw down a Pickle Back! Then, for the daring, jump on Gherkin our famous Bucking Pickle for the buck of your life!
landmark: Bucking Pickle

name: LEGENDARY Playground of the Gods
description: The Legendary Playground of the Gods is a place for learning, authentic connection, and celebrating life. This is a place to remember that we are all Divine, Infinite & Immortal beings simply wearing the disguise of being human. Come and find an oasis from the desert, find rest in the shade, get frozen treats and feast on a week of inspired offerings in workshops, classes, music, and entertainment designed to feed your soul. Welcome Home.
landmark: Large Colorful Dome

name: LogRide support Camp
hometown: South Lake Tahoe, Reno, Las Vegas
description: LogRide Mutant support camp for all the Logride Support
landmark: 10 foot tower w pranksters sign. DunkAroo on blvd.

name: Camp Cul-de-Sac
description:
Our Cinema runs from Sunset to Sunrise, Tuesday through Friday. Family-friendly content 8pm-10pm. Silent Films 10pm-12am. A cornucopia of the delightful and absurd from 12am-6am. A different theme every night!

New for 2025 - Welcome Home House Party!  Champagne cocktails and mocktails!  House music (the good kind, not the boring kind)!  Cinematic visuals!  Monday night 10pm-4am.
landmark: Large upright movie screen, couches, cinema sign

name: Titanic's End
description: Titanic's End is going west this year! We will be accessible to the public and will have live music with a saloon and a mechanical polar bear. We will have events through out the week and invite you to swing by.
landmark: Large wooden gateway

name: Cosmic Wolfs
description: A vibrant community celebrating creativity & self-expression. The Nebula Skateboard, a cosmic vessel spreading positivity, has been captured by Valtari and Soric a powerful two-headed desert snake. The Cosmic Wolfs Pack, brave Burners, embark on a quest to rescue the Nebula Skateboard, harnessing creativity, music & skateboarding for an epic showdown at Center Camp.
landmark: 3 16ft, circular tube structures Green/Blue/Purple

name: Stellar Future Camp
description: We will run  a Mongolia Camp. We will provide the triditional Chinese food and Mongolia food. We will  have 2 Mongolia tent on the site. A lot of perticipants and many volunteers will be there. You must have fun at our camp
landmark: There are 2 Mongolia tents. A white and a yellow.

name: The GASS Co.
description: Home of a bunch of busy bees working hard to pollinate and cultivate the playground budding in deep playa.
landmark: White billowy shade structure with white camo net

name: Astro Cats
description: We invite all burners to chill at the Flying Saucer Lounge with special cocktails during the day, and hot or cold sake or premium Tequila at the Dragon Lounge during the evening. You can enjoy acrobatic, fire dancing performance and workshops at scheduled times, and a place to practice and spin fire with us.  If you want to join our kitties for morning yoga or a afternoon tandem running race, bring your mat to stretch and pose with us You can chill on our chairs and watch people pass by while sipping our special drinks. You can learn to be a puppet master and perform at our Improv Puppet Theatre. You can challenge yourself to walk the plank, or play the game of Giant Jenga, or play poker at our game table while enjoying your sake. Yes, we also invite your for our theme dance parties!
landmark: Aerial Rig with lights at night.

name: RADICALOHA
hometown: MONTEREY, CA, SAN FRANCISCO, CA, HAWAII, Everywhere Aloha
description: RADICALOHA is a camp of Aloha! We bring the Hawaiian Culture to Black Rock City. We offer hula, workshops, DJ music and authentic shave ice.
landmark: RADICALOHA FLAG or ALOHABOX SHAVE ICE TRAILER

name: Midnight Moon Market
description: Dumpling Trap (brought to you by Midnight Moon Market) is an old-school Chinatown lounge that serves dumplings and engages guests to have deeper conversations with the hosts and with each other. Our purpose is to create an intimate, delightful experience for the people coming to our camp.
landmark: Dumpling Trap sign

name: Playa Delicacies Cooking School
description: Playa Delicacies cooking school is an interactive learning experience
landmark: Playa Delicacies Cooking School sign

name: Avant Garden
description:
We are a small Burning Man camp focused on creating community and connection both on and off Playa. We maintain a camp size of around 25 members, mostly based in the San Francisco/Bay Area.

This year, we are bringing a two-part gift: Veg Out and The Brothel. Veg Out is our daytime gift, where we will be serving cool, fresh vegetables to overheated Burners. And at night, our Brothel will serve hot, steamy broth to people who want a cozy place to hang out and warm up.
landmark: blue and purple striped, tent-like shade structure

name: Hippocampus
description: Hippocampus invites you to play with us at our Pucker Up lemonade stand and hammock hang-out cafe to connect and take a break from the playa. Also find us in deep playa for refreshingly magical lemonade and sunrise pancakes and coffee.
landmark: Entrance sign with two large sea horses

name: Camp KÃ¼hloff
description: Known as the shaded oasis of BRC, everyone is welcome and encouraged to join us during the hottest part of the day (2pm-4pm). We are here to help you cool-off and chill out with an ice-cold lavender towel and good vibes.
landmark: Camp Kuhloff sign

name: Porch Catz
description: Come cat around at Porch Catz! Sit a spell on our rustic wooden porch and see why we are such a close camp year round. After you've been christened with a cat collar, grab some cat ears and recite the three rules. Sunset Naked Happy Howls, questionable Yoga & decisions, in general - we've got it all! Keep your hands and arms inside the vehicle, but don't forget to maintain thigh contact!
landmark: Wooden Porch

name: It Was Better Last Year
description: Come visit The Crusty Burner for delicious, cold beverages, lovingly hand-crafted for your intoxication and refreshment. Or, at least, beverages. They'll probably be cold. Unless Steve forgets to do the ice run again. But Steve won't ruin your burn with lukewarm beverages...RIGHT STEVE?
landmark: It Was Better Last Year sign

name: The OG Pit
description:
The OG PIT is a little fire, a little fancy, a little filthyâ€”but always family. We build hard, stay late, and never forget why we're here. Whether you're sipping morning mimosa coffee, slapping your way through a late-night meltdown, or screaming karaoke to the stars, you're always welcome in The Pit!
See you in the dust, baby.
landmark: Sign at streetside that says "OG PIT".

name: SK8 KAMP
description: Every city needs a skate park.  We're the 24/7 skatepark of Black Rock City!
landmark: something special/bright hanging from 80' crane

name: Snow Cone Zone
landmark: Lighted Sign at frontage Road

name: Dymaxion
description: Our camp is dedicated to creating the ultimate playa living shelter based off the rarely used rhombicuboctahedron dome geometry. Our dones are constructed of reusable and sustainable panels held together only with zip ties. They can be built nearly as fast as a tent yet these domes have the strength and feel of a cabin. Stop by to see and learn about our latest iterations, share some ideas and learn how to live in the dust in comfort
landmark: Our lite sign DYMAXION in font of silver domes

name: Cabana Club
description:
The Cabana Club is an oasis of hospitality and friendship in the tradition of the old grand social clubs and beach resorts of the early 20th century.  Our Cabana Staff serve up tasty treats and resort-worthy cocktails while our guests lounge in our comfortable cabanas, cool off in our Aluminet shade structure, or go for a spin in "The Spa" with our resident DJ's.  

We're the Favorite Vacation Destination spot for the hard working citizens of Black Rock City!
landmark: Palm Tree Cabana Club Sign

name: Stars And Bikes
description: Bike repair from Noon â€“ 4 pm M-Sa. Professional mechanics with tools and skills to fix all your bike problems.  Self-service station also available.  We can't fix your personal problems, but we'll try.  Swing by! Both you and your bike deserve some loveâ€¦
landmark: Red, flat shade structure with signage for bikes

name: Chicken Cooter Soup
description: Chicken Cooter Soup, a band of misfits, born of the playa, dedicated to give back via hot dogs, icy treats, and carnival games
landmark: Chicken cooter soup signs, Megabus, and legit Wifi

name: Enchanted Booty Forest
description: We love hearing that we're the most welcoming camp on playa, and we hear it a lot! We offer whatever our campers feel called to offer, so it's an eclectic mix of things including workshops, grilled cheese, dance parties, mini golf, and more. Come visit us, but be warned you might never want to leave...
landmark: 13 ft tall truss shade structure & butt butt golf

name: Big Ding Energy
description: Big Ding Energy has finally made it to the Playa to provide wind wing lessons to the citizens of Black Rock City. We couldn't find a truck big enough to bring a lake but learning how to wing on a variety of wheeled vehicles is going to be just good enough. Love speed and adrenaline? Hate having skin on your knees? Come on by for daily wing lessons and bacon grilled cheese. Stretching and warmups will be provided so come by early and make sure your fit and ready to rip!
landmark: Big Ding Energy Sign

name: GYST (Get Your Shit Together)
description: We'll tell you how! It's time to care about Tomorrow, Today! GYST is your friendly neighborhood playa compost collector, accepting your DRY, contaminant-free, compost daily from 3pm to 6pm. Check out our bar and lounge - you bring the beets, and we'll bring the BEATS! Stay for the drinks and the trash talk!
landmark: GYST teepee, flags, & Get Your Shit Together sign!

name: The Real Dilla
description: We are a kitchy tiki themed camp that serves quesadillas several times throughout the week. Sporting a large dance area around our Dehydration station aka the bar, we will also have a Hydration station for those looking for a non alcoholic beverage. After working up a sweat dancing come chill out in the Real Chilla Dome, a covered dome cooled to perfection for a cozy mid day snuggle. You might catch us serving hot broth to wayward burners late night from time to time as well!
landmark: Big painted tiki signs!

name: Duck Stoop
description: Looking for a spot to watch some Playa TV, play some pub games and meet some new friends?  Come join us on our Duck Stoup and have some fun!  All are welcome!
landmark: Playa bleachers and 'Stoop' lighted neon sign.

name: Mindwerk
description: Come to Mindwerk and ride our slide!! Relax in our shady dome and enjoy a Pomerosegasm, the most delicious and refreshing cocktail in Black Rock City! Climb up to our viewing platform where you can behold a 360 degree view of our beautiful metropolis. Exhilarating egress is provided by a convenient slide. It's been called "just the right amount of sketchy" by satisfied customers. And its polymer surface won't burn your buns!
landmark: Big dome with red spandex shade, and a giant slide

name: SUPERNOVA
description: Welcome to the SUPERNOVA!!! Where all your space-aged dreams come true! From Star-Cades to Snug Dens, Bedazzle Stations to Dance Parties, and Intergalactic Mutants everywhere! This is a camp where you can come and feel welcomed no matter how you look because out in deep space hunny we all look a little dusty. Spreading Love and Light everywhere our little Aliens Go!!!
landmark: SPACE CONES! Purple and Green Tents!

name: Combat Zone
description: If you're looking for the best late night food on the playa, come find us. We'll be serving hot noods and cold beats in our sexy tea lounge from 4-6am every night.
landmark: Neon "LIVE NOODS HOT NOODS" sign

name: Project Awake
description:
"Awake" emerges from the collective imagination of a group of inspired individuals, bound by creativity and a shared vision. 
Our mission? To awaken hearts to the power of love and elevate consciousness. It represents the bridge between our human existence and our transcendent realm, showing that love is the ultimate answer and urging a collective transcendence beyond ego. In a world craving for healing, "Awake" stands as a symbol of hope, offering a pathway towards enlightenment and unity.
This Theme Camp is more than art; it's a catalyst for change.
We invite everyone to let down the ego, open your heart and join this journey. Stand with us in spreading love and light. Together, we can forge a new path for our world, one filled with love, peace and collective well-being. We are AWAKE!
landmark: The Project Awake Sign

name: Duckbutt
description: Come shake your tail feathers with us for ridiculous games, crafts, cocktails, and fun performance talents.
landmark: Bright green DUCKBUTT sign

name: Pickle Joint
description:
Downtown Black Rock City's favorite magical little hole in the wall. Serving our world famous Pickle-Tini Cocktail sinceâ€¦ errpâ€¦ too long.
Let's say well over a decade. Always a sumptuous groove on our dance floorâ€¦.or maybe a Led Zeppelin Kazoo orchestra.
landmark: Pickle sign lit up w circus bulbs

name: Pillar of Po Tolo Camp
description: Pillar of Tolo Art Support Camp
landmark: 8 foot tall 'Pillar of Po Tolo' sign

name: Mighty Misfits
description: A Mighty Misfit is a person whose behavior or attitude sets them apart from others in a conspicuous way, yet somehow makes it okay. A fish out of water, square peg in a round hole, round peg in a square hole. If you've ever felt you don't fit in in the default world, come and play with the Mighty Misfits. We are a welcoming, dusty respite with a misfit list of activities. Feed your body and soul with us!
landmark: Big yellow dome

name: Alice in Slumberland
description:
The oldest Alice themed bar on the playa is back, but much less Alice-themed than you'd expect!

Known for intricate cocktails and zany decor, this year the bar returns with an extra small bar, an extremely obvious speakeasy. 
We offer our classic chill lounge with Tarot readings open every afternoon (relaxing space open always). 
In the evenings our drink and drive through becomes a community firepit and fire dancing space, come have conversations with your neighbours.

But careful, you might get trapped in a net if you don't pass our arbitrary DUI checks.
landmark: A disco ball hanging at the entrance

name: DR. PLAYA'S EAR NOSE & THROAT
description: Dr Playa's ENT Clinic helps Black Rock Citizens clean out their head holes daily. Open 12PM-3PM.
landmark: Metal Dr Playa's ENT Clinic sign on scaffolding

name: Big Booty Love
description:
We like big boots and cannot lie! Visit us, don't be shy!

Join us at Camp BBL to clean off your boots, take a rest enjoying our boot-themed camp, or pick up a new pair from our curated boot rack.
landmark: Flag of a peach wearing boots.

name: Camp Homeslice
description: Drop in for a cheerful "Slice of Home"â€”Playa-style. Participate in our Experimental Grilled Cheese Theatre, climb the sky-high HomeSlice Tower's inverted pyramids, or re-engineer your Playa duds and gear at our Radical Alteration clinics.
landmark: The wood and Steel Tower.  You can't miss it

name: Wings of Resonance Art Support
description: Our camp supports the Wings of Resonance art installationâ€”an immersive, large-scale sculpture exploring sound, frequency, and connection. We're the behind-the-scenes crew: artists, builders, and collaborators who maintain and activate the piece throughout the week. The camp serves as our base for coordination, creativity, and community as we bring this interactive experience to life on the playa.
landmark: Painting of the Wings of Resonance butterfly

name: Religious As Fuck
description: Camp Religious As Fuck provides decomodified and non-judgy Christian spiritual practice and hospitality.
landmark: burning bush and Religious as Fuck sign

name: Waffles & House
description: We serve up delicious Waffles, with all your favorite toppings, cold drinks, and bumping House music for your dancing pleasure all week long! Don't forget to come by on Friday  for a syrup licking good time, as that's when we host our world-famous Waffolympics!
landmark: 20' bright yellow lit up WAFFLES & HOUSE sign

name: Studio and Spa
description: Come to BRC Studio and Spa to not only to receive a massage or have your sensual, erotic or daring fine-art photo taken, but join one of our workshops and take some new skill back to the default word. Either way, walk away with a unique photo print, or a new skill, or at least relaxed!
landmark: shade structure with the sign "BRC Studio and Spa"

name: Putt Putt Palace
description: Putt Putt Palace hosts a, 24/7, glow in the dark miniature golf corse and holds daily tournaments. Come stop by for our early am coffee bar and our open every afternoon Putt Putt Bar where we serve both spirits and non-alcoholic beverages.
landmark: Moon Dome

name: New York Dangerous
description:
New York Dangerous (www.NYD.nyc) is a merry band of adventurers from New York City and around the world. We see ourselves as an extended family that loves to have fun together.

On playa, we gift whimsical "what your mom warned you about" daytime events including: Strangers with Candy, Running with Scissors Relay Race, Put-Your-Eye-Out Shooting Gallery, Playing with Fire, and more.

Off-playa and year-round in NYC, we host and participate in shenanigans involving adventure, art, music, exploration, Altruism, and Radical Self-Expression. We love to have fun and strive to recreate the wide-eyed wonder and whimsy of the playa in everything we do - plus we founded the House of Good Deeds, one of the largest Burners Without Borders and fully volunteer-run organizations in all of New York City!
landmark: NYDangerous signage and military tent

name: Roadside Distraction
description: Roll up for a hub of spectacular sidetracks and childlike wonder! Give it your all to set a record for "Most Clothespins Pinned to the Face in One Minute", "Speed Kissing", or "Most Leapfrogs in 30 Seconds". With renowned carnival games and attractions in our Chamber of Wonders, including the soul-searching experience of Burning Man's Darkest Room, the mesmerizing optical illusions and sensory delights within the Hall of Oddities, and a whimsical Give-One-Take-One Gift Shop, there's something for everyone at Roadside Distraction.
landmark: Look for the structure made of trampolines

name: Titicaca
description: Come and join us on the mystical shores of the exotic Lake Titicaca and enjoy our mountain hospitality.
landmark: Titicaca sign

name: Burn Scouts of America
description: Burn Scouts are the OG rad scouts, sometimes audacious, always fun, lovable and welcoming.  Scouts honor!
landmark: Burn Scouts Sign

name: Struggletown Station
description: Struggletown Station is the depot station for The Struggle Bus artcar.  Come hitch a ride with us for art tours and just exploring the amazing Playa sites and sounds.
landmark: 20' Flag Pole with "Struggletown Station" Flag

name: There Ain't No Virgin Mary
description: Cowboy themed bar and burlesque show
landmark: Split Rail fence and Wine barrels with Umbrella's

name: Creation Nation BRC
description: Creation Nation BRC is a radical survival camp where all of our campers provide for their own needs. As a camp, we provide interactivity with Black Rock City citizens through giving many hands-on art projects as well as informational talks. We also provide a few 24/7 interactivity items on the frontage which gets us involved in discussions and socializing with our fellow burners for photos and the like.
landmark: 3'X5' Large white lighted sign w/ Creation Nation

name: Inflation Station
description: Bike repair camp offering guided repair during the day and self service 24/7, with the added bonus of an old school Burning Man daytime bar and lounge. At night we will have a Spatial Audio Experience offering guests diverse journeys in sound with programmable haptic loungers centered within a sphere of sound.
landmark: Green Flag+ DIY BIKE REPAIR INFLATION STATOIN sign

name: Happy Seats
description: Decorate your bike! - seat cushions upgrades, handle bar tassels, DIY license plates, and fun time with new friends under a cool canopy
landmark: Blue Spiral Drappings on our frontage

name: Fingerbang
description: Fingerbang is a rowdy crew of cheerleaders, athletes, and coaches who love to play, dance, and cheer for YOU!  Come grab a megaphone and heckle from the top of our Bleachers.  Join us for Hoppy Homecoming, naughty cheers, riotous games of Burner Family Feud and Porn Spelling Bee, cold drinks and dancing at the Go Fuck Yourself Saloon, and our Cheer Gear and Couture Jockstrap Boutique.  Don't miss our truly epic Wednesday Pep Rally, complete with pom-poms, whistles, cheering, dancing & general mayhem.
landmark: Wooden sign in Varsity Font "Team Fingerbang"

name: Tacoma is for [GHOST] Lovers
description: Tacoma is for [GHOST] Lovers â€“ Home of Black Rock Shoe Repair and the Inky & Clyde Mutant Vehicles. Saving Soles by Day, Chasing Souls by Night! Step in for free shoe repairs, grab a fresh pair from our BOOTique, or just haunt our shade for a spell.
landmark: BRC Shoe Booth, looks like a playable arcade game

name: The Lost Penguin Cafe
description: Welcome to The Lost Penguin Cafe! We are one of the oldest continuously-returning theme camps at Burning Man, and we are back this year to bring our freezing daytime cold snow cones and sizzling hot entertainment to the playa.Take shelter from the hot sun in our welcoming 40' x 80' shaded lounge, relax on our comfy couches, and strike up a conversation with someone new. Sit out a dust storm, or simply watch the world go by as you enjoy casual live performances from noon until the wee morning hours. Ask for Penguin Pee or another refreshing drink (non-alcoholic available) or our traditional evening chocolate, handed out by our cafe hosts. We can't wait to welcome you to our waddle.
landmark: big neon sign that says 'The Lost Penguin'

name: FjÃ¶rgyn's Lair
description:
The Viking Longboat was a potent symbol of life, livelihood, one's journey through life, the afterlife, and was used by the Norse for transport, in trade, in warfare, and as a burial vessel for centuries.
Fjorgyn is a personification of earth in Norse mythology, and the mother of the thunder god Thor, the son of Odin.
landmark: White work truck bed, turned into fuel trailer

name: Declusterfuqerization Gone Loco
description: The Declusterfuqs have gone loco! Come join us for Lucha Libre wrestling & Micheladas on tap.
landmark: Lucha Libre wrestling ring

name: SomeDay Isle ...
description:
SomeDay Isle... Tiki Bar and Broth'l
Inspiration Destination and Late Night Orientation Staytion.
We encourage you to find your dreams.
landmark: 4 tall Bright Green flags & 12' SomeDay Isle sign

name: Northwest Mist
description: World famous misting tent that is like walking into a rain forest on playa. Where we come together to provide a cool oasis for dusty travelers. We open before event opening so that the builders of our great city and art have somewhere to cool off, regenerate and talk to other builders.
landmark: Red and white tent with sign with country flags

name: Baggage Check
description:
Check your Emotional Baggage with us. Spend Time Today to create a Better Tommorow for yourself! By writing down your emotional baggage you don't have to carry it with you; use that freed up emotional headspace to cultivate and connect with your future! We'll turn your emotional baggage into ashes and celebrate your newfound self-actualization at the temple burn. 

Stop by any time of the day or night, lounge in our super comfy dome, treat yourself to our pamper station, get out of the sun, or join a dance party in progress. We have a full slate of events every day - whether it's a Disco Line Dance, giant Cuddle Puddle, Consent Workshop, Hypnotising Eye-Gazing Session, or a Topsy Turvy Happy Hour - we have something for you and welcome all with open arms!
landmark: 30' tall 3000W bright rainbow checkmark.

name: Joie de Vivre
description:
At Joie de Vivre, we're all about bringing the joy â€” even when the dust is thick and the tacos are hotter than the weather. 

Swing by in the morning for a rotating mix of movement, writing, or a card reading. Stick around for Taco Tuesday (yes, it's real), and spin the Wheel of Feels â€” our 24/7 interactive art piece â€” for a little unexpected magic.
landmark: Joie de Vivre arch

name: The Gong Spot
description:
Welcome to The G Spot; you've finally found it! At The Gong Spot, we believe sound, movement, and play have a profound ability to ground and connect individuals. TGS's mission is to contrast the Burn's high-intensity energy. We offer chill spaces (3 individual lounges) for weary travelers to rest, get out of the sun, or even take a smoke break. Our scheduled sound baths (we like Gongs) and vibey spaces offer respite, grounding, or a quick nap for many weary travelers.

Our air-conditioned sound bath tent doubles as an (almost) 24/7 cuddle puddle lounge and hosts a variety of movement-based interactivity (both whimsical and sensual) and talks throughout the week. Join us, and then tell your friends you've finally found The G-Spot!
landmark: A large garlic shaped dome covered in LED lights

name: Dark Sparkle
description: Dark Sparkle is your call to the mysterious, your insatiable drive of self-expression, your community for inclusivity and possibility. Through full-sensory burlesque, music, and ecstatic dance events, Dark Sparkle promotes body-positivity and self-expression.
landmark: Large Dark Sparkle banner, lit at night

name: Half Baked
description:
Make your official 2025 Solar Shrink-Art necklaces, earrings, keychains, bike tags & hat swag using our solar ovens. All art supplies and ovens will be provided. You COLOR it. You watch it SHRINK. You WEAR it! Walk away with some cool, commemorative, self-made swag, along with a greater understanding of the wonderful world of solar cooking. 

Also, try our Tabletop Tug Challenge. Youâ€™ve always wanted to do it at a wedding. Practice here first. Try your luck at successfully pulling a tablecloth out from under a full table setting.
landmark: HALF BAKED banner atop our shade structure

name: DISCO LIPS
description: Snarky performance art by day,dusty rug cutting by night. Stop by Disco Lips to enjoy chugging beats, flowing beverages, nonstop wisecracks, and even some random playground equipment thrown in for good measure!
landmark: Large blue, LED lit Disco Lips sign

name: Rubber Armstrong
description: For everything bad, Mezcal, for everything that is good as well, and if it still does not help, one and a half liters. We are a diverse solar powered camp made up of members from all over the world all sharing a love of Mezcal. Come join us for a delicious sunset Margie.
landmark: LED helmet camp sign with the name of the camp

name: Good Question
description:
What can you expect from our camp? Good Question!

Stop by our shady oasis to deepen your connection with your friends and loved ones, or meet a new friend entirely in a cozy, intimate atmosphere. You'll leave feeling more connected to others, and having formed a deeper connection with yourself.

Come by in the afternoon when we will be serving tea, Dosas (Indian breakfast like a crepe) and batch tea cocktails, or stop by late at night to warm yourself by the fire. Additionally, we will be hosting 24/7 self guided deeper connection activities in our cozy frontage. 

There are no wrong answers, only Good Questions!
landmark: Camp Sign "G O O D ?, 30' Container (Dark blue)

name: Portals, Potions, and Pleasure
description:
The Love Apothecary: A Place of Healing & Connection
Our camp's public offering will be a mystical, whimsical apothecaryâ€”a sanctuary nestled on the Playa that combines elements of a healing space with the warmth and intimacy of a home. The ambiance will invite people to slow down, connect, and be present.

Please enjoy our apothecary counter where members of our camp will prepare and serve the Love Potion. The Love Potion is an herbal aphrodisiac, and stress reliever, paired with a ritual focused on connection, love, and open hearts. 

Interactive "Love Notes" Wall:
Our camp will feature an interactive wall where people can write anonymous love notes or positive messages to strangers on the Playa.
landmark: Love Apothecary sign, potion bar, & love noteswall

name: Way Way SuperGood (by Full Send)
description: If you've ever been crowned the international skee-ball champion of the entire universe two weeks in a row; If you've ever meant to ride off into the sunset on a hobby horse but got sidetracked fluffing pillows (Cajun Style) at a two-star hotel for decades during your search for your life's true destiny; If you've ever gotten so lost in a really good book that you forgot you can't read because you've been too busy calling all the shots; If you think you would like to know what it's like to fly through the air much the way a brick doesn't or even if you've said it before and you'll say it again before and you'll say it before and you'll say it again again... Stop it, Homegirl! You're trying to do too much. Come have a drink and dance with us instead. It's gonna be a Way Way SuperGood time
landmark: "Way Way SuperGood" letters and bell tent

name: Temple O'Flying Spaghetti Monster
description: We are a comfortable neighborhood pub with a-rockin' attitude and groovin' tunes. In honor of His Noodly Goodness, the Friendly Fire Bar will administer ice-cold libations for your mind, body, and spirit. We will also provide unofficial and official playa weddings in His Noodly Goodness' Temple. Come learn about his Noodly Goodness, call almost anywhere in the world on "Talk to Mom" phone, or visit our giftorium. We also offer bad advice, favorable directions, and delicious conversations to invigorate and stimulate your mind. The Flying Spaghetti Monster welcomes all so stop by, be touched by His noodly appendage, stay awhile, and rest your dusty bum.
landmark: The Flying Spaghetti Monster on top of the bar.

name: BurningShip
description:
There are Wood Ships, there are Steel ships, but the best ships are FriendShips."
A bunch of hippie shipmates from all over the world bring their FriendSHIP to the desert for a week of debauchery! Join us at "BurningShip," a cruise ship full of immoral crew that's currently stranded in the desert! We'll be your BOOZE directors, providing you with drinks, smiles, and fun events. Learn how to salsa dance, smoke a premium stogie, and find hidden 'Booty'! Come with no expectations and leave feeling full. Full of love, hugs, laughs, and WTFs. And most importantly long lasting Burning(friend)Ships.
landmark: Sailboat out front

name: Dreamery
hometown: Laguna Niguel, Irvine, San Diego, Kiev
description:
Dreamery is a camp to discover, share and experience dreams. It is an interactive space to read and write dreams and fantasies, happy or scary, random and crazy, sensual or sad.

What dream would you ask for if you could?
If you could go anywhere in a dream, where would it be?

At Dreamery, you might also meet someone special. You can see if you want to hang out for just a bit or maybe become lifelong soulmates.

Got any bad dreams you want to get rid of? Drop them to the Dreamery Alter to be ceremonially burned at The Temple Burn.

Have any happy dreams or exciting tales to tell? Jot them down in The Book of Dreams. Flip through the pages to discover stories and dreams from people from around the world, and you might even find new dreams to call your own.
landmark: DREAMERY roadsign, Star tent, Closed Eye flag

name: Trashistan
description: It's a food bank AND a cinema! Pop by, tell us your tale of woe, and replace your lost food. Vegan and keto available while supplies last. Grab some popcorn and stay for a movie after the sun goes down. Bring us your extra supplies for redistribution.
landmark: red/black/white Cyrillic sign, tan shade structure

name: Parliament Art Crew
description: We're the Art Support Camp that has brought in the past these art installations for the delight of our community: COQUÃ, Atabey's Treasure, MÃšCARO and Got Framed.
landmark: Camp Contraptionist Dome and Puerto Rico's flag

name: Chivo Loco Camp
description: Chivo Loco Camp is a vibrant Venezuelan community bringing flavor, music, and warmth to the Playa. We host a **picanha BBQ** and a traditional **arepa breakfast**, sharing our culture through food and connection. Our chill lounge offers a welcoming space with good vibes and great conversations. Everyone is invited to stop by, enjoy a meal, and experience our hospitality. Come as you areâ€”leave as part of the Chivo Loco family!
landmark: Chivo Loco Flag

name: Hibernaculum
description: Care to get shot in the box? Get dizzy on the Bat Go Round? Savor Bat Coffee? Harvest a dream? How about a late night movie or licking your lips with Bat Blueberry Pancakes? At the Hibernaculum, serendipity rules! Know what a Hibernaculum is? Come find out.
landmark: Black & White Bat Go Round with bat head & wings

name: Chop Shop
description: We are the best BRC bicycle repair shop. We have bicycle repairs, parts and welding.
landmark: Green Canopy workshop on the corner.

name: Glam Clams
description: Community! Music! Mischief! At the Glam Clams, we are the family you want to choose. Come connect with fellow burners and enjoy creature comforts while you detox and relax in our welcoming lounge. Souls of Black Rock City unite!
landmark: Glam Clams sign and giant hanging jellyfish

name: Three of Cups
description: Come on down to get a tarot reading, learn to read tarot, and play tarot games.
landmark: Three of Cups signs

name: Daddy Issues
description: No daddy issues? Come get some! We are a group of life-long friends, predominantly in Seattle, WA. We love being playful, and a little bit crass, but we also invite everybody to come explore their deeper selves through our "Feelings Corner." Join us for our annual events: Queer Pancakes Brunch (Weds at noon) and Drinking with (your non-existent) Dad! (Mon afternoon-evening). At night, you can come swing, or enjoy the views from a 3 story climbing structure. We all have daddy issues, and from this we have become a group of light-hearted, playful, and introspective daddies
landmark: "Daddy Issues" sign atop climbing structure

name: Lunar Disco
description: Embrace the cosmic elements in our electrifying dance and party spaces, with interstellar beats and mesmerizing ambience. Connect with fellow stargazers in our ceremonial space, honoring the celestial bodies and the shared human experience. Embark on an otherworldly adventure at Lunar Disco.
landmark: Amazing sparkly camp entrance and sign

name: Prismaticamp
description: Various artists coming together to offer LED knowledge, personal reflection experiences, dice games, & good vibes.
landmark: 16' high geodesic LEDome made w/ silver aluminumet

name: Hot Stuff
description: Drinks served from dawn onward for the thirsty traveler crossing the desert sands. All manner of chilli hot and ice cool refreshments will be on offer accompanied by music from storied DJs from across the savage sands.
landmark: Neon Hot Stuff Sign

name: Corner Pocket
description: Billiards at Burning Man! Corner Pocket Camp is your Black Rock City Pool Hall. We have FULL SIZE TABLES! Come enjoy learning and playing up to five pool games: 8-ball, 9-ball, Cutthroat, 3-ball, and Goonball. We'll have tournaments with awesome prizes and FUNishments, as well as special events such as "Strip Pool" and "Heckle Pool". Also, DARTS!
landmark: 8 ball on top of a pool cue

name: Zoom!
description: Immerse yourself in ZOOM!, an underwater-themed playground celebrating 20 years of creative chaos on the playa. Explore our giant swings, teeter totters, aerial Lyra, and sea-inspired art as you reconnect with your playful side. By night, our glowing kelp forest, fire spinning shows, and ambient lounge create a vibrant refuge under the stars. Join a flow workshop, catch a performance, or simply rest beneath a canopy of light and sound. ZOOM! is open to all and dedicated to radical inclusion, interactivity, and joy.
landmark: Glowing 40' Z tower and massive LED-lit swing set

name: Illumination Village
description:
Illumination Village is an eclectic gathering of camps, held together by history and shared resources. You will find within the village, much like the microcosm of Burning Man, art and interactivity everywhere. 
Showcasing our fire artists in the front, and then placing our interactivity within the village in our Town Square and internal roads. 

Each year it's a new experiment in radical collaboration to create a cohesive feel for the village, across our many diverse camps. We love the multifaceted variety of environments and believe that it makes Illumination Village a unique and delightful place to visit. 

Come take a steam during the day and make sure to visit our Fire Art Carnival in the evening. Our Fire pit will be lit up late into the night. 

All are welcome!
landmark: Sutro Towers up high, the LED fence around us

name: Suburbia
description: Here at Suburbia, we are putting our efforts into bringing that same tacky suburban culture to Black Rock City. New and old burners will be able to see one of the most disgusting/ugly parts of society in the urban sprawl of the 'default world' displayed in a beautiful and enjoyable way. From the moment someone spots Suburbia, they will see a typical suburban neighborhood, but the with Burning Man principles close to heart. We hope that through this subverted lens, participants will appreciate Black Rock City for more than an escapism from their daily lives, but also an opportunity to encompass the Burning Man principles into their everyday lives when they return to the 'default world'
landmark: SUBURBIA Cul-de-sac with 8 tiny houses

name: Azteca
description:
Join us for workshops and day parties, climb our Desire dome, or relax in one of our shaded hammocks. Enjoy a refreshing paloma, while our DJs spin house and techno. Music and good vibes will be constant, and visitors should expect to have a good time while also having a space for rest, reflection, and expression. 

Vente a nuestras fiestas o talleres, trepa nuestro domo del deseo o relajate en una de nuestras hamacas con sombra. Disfruta una paloma mientras nuestros DJ's tocan house y techno. Musica y buena vibra seran una contratante asi es que preparate para pasarla bien. Tambien tenemos espacio para descanso, reflexion y expresion.
landmark: Aztec Temple. 24-30' tall 4-30' wide. Lit at night

name: The Pearly Gate
description: Pearly Gates is your one-stop shop for the afterlife. Get baptized by fire at OVO Ignis. Confess your sins via Macrophone to whoeverâ€™s listening. Climb St. Peterâ€™s Steps for judgment by whichever deityâ€™s on shift. Register for your next life and get your fortune (cookie included). Be reborn through a giant Womb - or chill with bar angels in the Heavenly Lounge. Come for the flames, stay for the salvation. No shoes, no soul? No problem.
landmark: The gold fence and pillar

name: Pink Ponies
description: Pink Ponies is a diverse collection of kind and welcoming queer campers. We curate and host events and workshops that celebrate queer joy and healing. We pride ourselves on being a great place for all campers to meet and mingle the first Sunday night at our Queeer Homecoming. We also offer daily workshops on a variety of topics close to our community's heart. We celebrate randomness, and anything goes at this weirdly joyful camp. Come build relationships with us that will last a lifetime.
landmark: Neon Signs: Pony, "Pink Ponies" & UV Active Cacti

name: #My last burn
landmark: Love

name: Extinct Oasis
description: A desert oasis themed bar set in the prehistoric age! Daylight activities include themed cocktails, dancing, and a relaxing misted atmosphere. Bring your best dinosaur costume or impression!
landmark: Extinct Oasis sign and 12ft palm trees

name: Unauthorized Libations
description: Unauthorized Libations is on the surface a quirky little speakeasy bar, but we not just a bar or a lounge, we're also a secret third thing. A portal to a world of psychedelia, the occult, conspiracy theories and modern folklore, it's a liminal space where aliens, cryptids and mutants come out to play. After the sunsets, the dance floor bursts to life with guest DJs spinning and dazzling visuals bathing the camp in light. The bar is the beating heart of the camp, pumping out the lifeblood that fuels it all with the best cocktails on playa.
landmark: Unathorized Libations & UL Signs

name: Camp Lip Service
description: Bad Advice dispensed morning to night.  We take the fun out of dysfunction.
landmark: Lip Service Sign elevated 15 feet at camp frontage

name: Gritty Garden
description: Gritty Garden is a diversity driven camp offering a wide variety of workshops. Monday Craft Maker's Day, Heart-to-Heart hug workshop, the Joy of Cunnilingus, and How to Give Good NO. Sunday - Saturday refreshments Bar and ice cream.
landmark: Beige Shade Structure with the Gritty Garden sign

name: Stag Camp
description: At Stag Camp, we invite anyone and everyone (drama-free), including singles, couples, and small groups from all walks of life. We have no strict regimen of things to do or fees to pay. Everyone contributes as much as they like, with radical self-reliance a camp cornerstone. If you're looking for shared showers, meal plans, kitchen shifts, etc., we're not the spot for you. We all just come and hang out, creating a community among ourselves that is unique, fun, and will be whatever you make of it!
landmark: stationary, classic 1950s fire engine and zipline

name: Retrofrolic
description:
Retrofrolic is an adult destination offering multiple features.
â˜† A 2100 sq ft supervised public dungeon playspace 
â˜† A 2000 sq ft public shade porch.
â˜† A suspension point between our twin-towers for flying pole, Lyra, yoga silks or Shibari demos.
â˜† Morning coffee with Mayor Angus
â˜† Daily class to explore your sensual and sexual desires.  
â˜† Learn sane and safe play.  
â˜† Get that heretofore unanswered question about kink answered!  
â˜† No shame, no blame and no regrets!  
â˜† All staff have completed consent classes by B.E.D.
landmark: Red twin towers & big lighted Retrofrolic sign.

name: Dusty Bottoms
landmark: Red & tan shade structure & yellow lace pants flag

name: DinerTown
description: DinerTown is the home of a 1950's style, full service Diner with a burner-twist, run by a bunch of eclectic Canadians. We're open at a 1/4 too, with a full breakfast & lunch menu served with a side of love.
landmark: Large "Diner" sign hanging from the roof

name: Mah Na Mah Na
description:
LED Crown Workshop â€“ Look gorgeous and make it easier for your friends to find you at night. Get your water bottle refilled.

Mouse Trap Roulette â€“ Fuck your fingers. Test your luck my spinning the roulette wheel and seeing whether your fingers get snapped by a loaded mouse trap. Get your water bottle refilled.
landmark: Beige Touareg tent and a signpost "Mah Na Mah Na"

name: Mudskippers
description:
We are a radically-inclusive, radically diverse, and radically expressive tight-knit group of straights, bi, gay and unlabeled lovers from LA, SF, NYC, Miami, Montreal Kansas City, Brazil, Argentina, Mexico, Central America, the Middle East, Europe, Australia and everywhere in-between. 
We are a Tribe. We are a Family. We are a Worldwide Network of Friends. We work and play together to make the burn more fun and give bigger to those that come to our theme camp. Come enjoy our fruit smoothies, our amazing dance parties, fun workshops, or just come chill out with us in our lounge! We look forward to welcoming you to our dusty home on the playa!
landmark: Mudskippers Sign

name: The Pink Spot
description: The Pink Spot is an art car support camp with The Big Bunny art car, Dj driven holding up to 40 burners. We will leave camp  every evening around dusk, please come by for a prefunk and hop on for a thorough throw down!
landmark: 20x20 shade area with heart pole on top

name: Black Rock Academy
description:
We are often approached at Camp Black Rock Academy with the question of, "So what do you guys teach?"
Personally, I dont think the important question is, "What do you guys teach?" But rather, I would follow up with, "What are you willing to learn?"
landmark: Green Chalk board sign of camp name outside in front

name: Siren's Cove
description:
A veteran group of Burning Man friends that have gathered over the years. We have been on many adventures across the world to Rejoice in the wondrous village that is created annually in the high desert dry lake bed.
To celebrate our animal selves in this years theme.

A bunch of Land lubbing Unicorn, Pony lovers and for Water lovers, Mermaids and Aquatic animals.
landmark: Sirens Cove surfboard Sign , and unicorns

name: Bad Education
description: Join Camp Bad Education for croissants, coffee, and chill morning beats featuring "Coffee NutSi" from 0700-1100 M-F.  Stay for the 1200 workout and 1530 restorative practice.  Enjoy a sound bath, cacao ceremony, Yin yoga practice, or guided meditation before joining us on opening Sunday and Wednesday nights for one of our high energy dance parties!
landmark: 6 x 12ft tall flaming pyramids with round LEDs.

name: Dust Circus
description: We are a multicultural and multinational group of people with various backgrounds and lifestyles who decided to create a special space on the Playa. Come to us to have fun and participate in all our activities - Acroyoga, Shibari, New Year celebration, Art Installation. And do not hesitate to hop on our beautiful Mutant Vehicle, the ShroomVroom when you see it gliding on the Playa, let"s experience the beauty of the Playa altogether.
landmark: Look for a green beacon and our jousting court

name: Videogasm
description: Black Rock City's Playa Theater since 1998! Nightly video screenings on our 20' screen. Get your morning coffee at our Slurping Sloth Cafe. Body painting every afternoon in our shade structure. Play with our oversized games. Check out the Sleepy Pickle Bar for one of our daily themed happy hour specials. You Pick it Double Feature chosen by the citizens of BRC (Come by and cast your vote.) Ride on our oversized pocket rocket ship or take your picture in front of our huge inflatable rat, Rizzo! Compete in one of our live Game/Talent Shows or walk our red carpet and talk to fellow filmmakers and content creators. Home of The Black Rock City Film Festival. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday night! Contact us to show your original film on our twenty foot screen.
landmark: Videogasm Lighted Theater Marque

name: Awkward & Tawdry Lounge
description: Part bar. Part lounge. Part sing. Part dance. Part chill. Part Shoot Your Balls Off. 100% Awkward & Tawdry.
landmark: Starlite Bar and Shoot Your Balls Off

name: NumbSkulls
landmark: Shade structure at street with "NUMBSKULL" sign

name: Mary's Little Lambs
description: Marys Little Lambs (MLL) is a Burning Man theme camp that embodies a vibrant, queer, and international community. The camp thrives on its welcoming atmosphere, where wit, fun, care, community, and duty intertwine seamlessly to elevate our collective experience before, during, and after the Burn. With an inclusive ethos, it embraces individuals from various backgrounds, making everyone feel like part of the flock. The camp exudes a sense of warmth akin to a lamb's gentle nature, fostering an environment where diversity and community flourish under the Black Rock sun and amidst the fiery essence of Burning Man.
landmark: Marys Little Lambs Neon Sign

name: Deoxidized
description: Deoxidized is a global oasis on playa that hosts intentional gathering space, a soul series, and endless opportunities for diverse connections with people from around the world.
landmark: 30 foot green tent

name: Infinite Love
description: Celebrate love in all forms: Cultivate Self Love, Deepen Existing Love, and explore New Love. Enjoy yoga, dance, music, tea, and cozy lounges. Rich in daytime programming and shade from the desert heat.
landmark: infinity symbol twisted into a heart, above camp

name: Lady Bullion's Hot Brothel
description:
At Lady Bullion's, we don't just wet your whistleâ€”we summon your spirit.
Steep yourself in hot, nourishing broth and wild herbal elixirs,
served with a wink and a whisper beneath the moss-draped charm of our bayou saloon.
Settle into intimate corners, sway to soulful sounds,
and lose yourself in delightful conversation.
landmark: Saloon with sign "Lady Bullion's Hot Brothel"

name: Inflatable Wildlife
description: Inflatable Wildlife is the premiere destination for all indigenous inflatables of the playa. With a menagerie of inflatable wildlife, steady stream of danceable beats and wild and wondrous interaction helping to magnify the natural syncopated basslines which undulate through us all, we will be serving signature cocktails during an array of events throughout the week, including a chance to meet your mate at our now renowned Not Awkward Speed Dating, Daily Spirits Tastings, Inflatable Goat Yoga, Playa Jewelry Making, our signature, 6th annual Sunrise Pre-Game Party and more.
landmark: Purple sign on front of camp, Pink Elephant

name: Gallavant
description: Ahoy from the Pirates of the Playa (infamous creators of the oldest pirate ship on the playa the USS Nevada)â€¦look for us "Gallavanting" around the playa spreading fun and adventure and hop a ride with us! !   Our mighty USS Nevada will be doing 2+ tours around playa daily from our home port so come visit us, enjoy our signature grogs concocted with rum in an awesome full-fledged pirate bar, The ArrghBar. pARTicipate in our 2+ daily theme parties 10am and 2pm, come get your drink on, play games, and then relax in our Pirates Den â€“ an amazing chill space with couches. Visit our Wayward Wenches Bazaar, because we got what you forgot. Come party with us....It's sure to be an adventure.
landmark: Large Pier Sign with Gallavant across the top

name: Burning Sensation
description:
Burning Sensation is a sensory immersion camp designed to disrupt routine perception and ignite presence through bold, interactive experiences. From fiery flavors to somatic rituals, we awaken participants to the immediacy of the moment. 

At Fire Bar, guests are invited to sample gourmet hot sauces that challenge their resolve, while washing the heat down with bracing fireball cocktails. Rooted in inclusivity, we center BIPOC and LGBTQIA+ voices and bodies at our bi-weekly Playa Vybz party - while creating a space where all are invited to feel, engage, and burn brightly. At night, our camp bridges ancestral practices and modern culture with rapÃ© and sananga ceremonies. 

Come experience hearts, tongues and souls on fire at Burning Sensation!
landmark: The tent with red, yellow and orange LEDs & drapes

name: Misters & Sisters
description: We are a fun daytime camp, offering two main activities, 1. overhead water misters, accessible all week from dawn to dusk, assisted by a camp member, or self-service, and, 2. a DIY Essential Oil body spray activity daily from noon to 3 p.m. Monday to Saturday, or until our daily allocation of bottles runs out.Â  We have 26 different essential oils to choose from and will show you how to mix base, medium and top notes to create your own fragrance. Our oils are therapeutic grade.Â  Give your senses a spa treatment!
landmark: Misters & Sisters camp sign & overhead misters

name: Whiskey Division
description: Nerds, Booze, Kids
landmark: Large Orange Letters "Whiskey Division" above camp

name: Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar
description: Need to upgrade your playa swag? We've got you covered, from funky hats, tutus and sparkle bootie shorts. You never know what you'll find. Open every day from mid-day to dusk. All are welcome!
landmark: Big Camel

name: And Then There's Only Love
description:
Home of the world famous Orgy Dome â€“ where couples & moresomes of all orientations are invited to come and play. We welcome the combination of love in all forms.

We're a sex-positive, inclusionary, and exploratory space that's been a place of fire, fun, and passion since 2003.

Everyone wishing to enter the Orgy Dome receives a detailed orientation covering Informed Enthusiastic Consent. Remember, anything other than an enthusiastic YES means NO!

Our (relatively) dust free and air conditioned space is designed for people to experience social sexuality in a safe and respectful way. We have a 'Just Us' and an 'Open to More' section â€“ so monogamous & non-monogamous folks are all welcome.
landmark: A sign that says "Orgy Dome"

name: Mutant Ninja Burners
description: Are you looking for a place to kick up your dusty boots or maybe somewhere to warm up during the cold night? At Mutant Ninja Burners when you cross our sewer rat picket fence you're one of us! Make a headband, dance and groove to some wubs. Warm yourself by the fire pits. You'll be rewarded with friendship, acceptance and a hot slice of pizza if you come by during one of our wubby, dubby pizza parties. Cowabunga!
landmark: Mutant Ninja Burners sign and rat picket fence

name: Barbie Death Village
description: Barbie Death Village is a delight to the eyes and the mind. Our camp features the Infamous Barbie Art - 1500 Barbies marching into a giant EZ-Bake Oven (Time set at 4:20, Temp on hi. Getting baked!). Barbie's street fronts are full of a range of interactivity! Swim up to our Barbie Swim Up Bar for a drink, enjoy our artistic Barbie-based silliness, stay for one of our many events which range from Pewter Casting, Liquid Light Show, Midnight Toast, Morning Mimosas (Sat), and so much more. Keep an eye out for and take a ride on our beloved Mutant Vehicle: The Barbie Whorehouse (It is not just a Whorehouse, it is a Whore Home.)
landmark: 7 Foot Tall Neon Barbie on a scythe stripper poll

name: Magic Lantern Society
description:
The Magic Lantern is a wandering inn, located at the end of all worlds. Sumptuously-appointed with antiques, curiosities, games, and mysterious old books, we are a space created for deeper human connection, and a warm and inviting sanctuary for the weary and curious traveller.

Our centerpiece is our unique Trading Booth, where stories and secrets are the only accepted currency. Anyone can step up to don our shopkeeper's hatâ€”we believe in erasing the boundaries between host and traveller.
landmark: Garlic-shaped canvas tent

name: Naked Heart
description:
Naked Heart is devoted to the full embodiment of the divine feminine. We offer amazing experiential and experimental workshops that allow you to feel your feminine heart, your radiance, your inner goddess. This work requires the masculine as well; Everyone is welcome. 

At Naked Heart we recognize the need to embrace both the light and the dark in our journeys. When we pursue the light we use movement, the senses, sensuality, sexuality and connection. This beckons us in and brings the light of awareness back into the bodies we have vacated. To go there fully requires confronting our shadows. We embrace those as well as we dive into shame, fear, anger, unsavory memories from this life and past lives, and disempowering images of our bodies. Welcome home.
landmark: Big steel entryway with the illuminated heart

name: Dusty Mule Saloon and Playground
description: We offer the vibe of belly laughs all day, everyday. Inside our vibrant dome, you'll find a welcoming bar offering boozy cocktails or one of our chilled non-alcoholic options with a boogie music theme. Dome interior games include Yard Yahtzee, Pin the Man on the Ass, Truth or Jenga, Cards Against Humanity, Monolopy, etc. Venture through tunnels connecting smaller domes to our main dome for added adventure. Our playground features an array of interactive games sure to entertain all, from large-scale Connect 4 to Rubber Ring Toss Your Cookies and Shut Your Cornhole. LED Tetherball and hydraulic teeter-totters in What Goes Up Must Come Down add to the carnival-like atmosphere. Laughter is the universal love language of friends.
landmark: 30ft colorful dome with purple saloon doors

name: BEER30
description: Voted Best Beer on the playa 7 years running! Maybe some seltzer as well. Shade. Carpet. Seating. Conversation. Scheduled opening M, W, F 11AM-3PM. Other days hours vary.
landmark: Flags with the words "BEER:30" and blue beer flag

name: Deep Eat
description: Get ready to Deep Eat with delicious food & pizza and feast your eyes on the Cosmic Bean, while enjoying loungey in-house music.
landmark: Large "DEEP EAT" sign above our shade structure

name: Land of Monkey
description:
Land of Monkey is a multicultural, international LGBTQ+ camp that welcomes diversity and that promotes human evolution through body (Aguas Frescas, coffee), mind (deep talks on important subjects) and soul (yoga, breath work & meditation). We also have a chill space, our Jungle with pillows and hammocks where citizens of Black Rock City can escape from the sun and relax, listening to uplifting tunes by our resident DJs
At Land of Monkey we believe that we are not yet fully human and must evolve. Learning to listen, to be patient, to understand, to forgive and to be more merciful: these are among the skills we practice in becoming more human.
We evolve by being the best version of ourselves.
landmark: Pink Land of Monkey Sign

name: SnoHo
description: Camp SnoHo is designed to be an inviting sanctuary in the desert. We offer two air conditioned public cooling tents. One for interactivities and one just for cooling off. Serving 12pm - 5pm Monday through Saturday. We also have a self service bike repair station operating Monday through Saturday.
landmark: 2 Large Tents, 2 Geodesic Domes, and SnoHo Sign

name: Kiosk Art Support Camp
description: Art support camp for Honorarium project "Kiosk," an installation using symbols, architecture and energy as a bridge to the future. What we create today will echo in the stories of tomorrow. What will you leave behind? How will your power, wisdom and magic carry on after you are gone?
landmark: 6-ft. hot pink and neon green flags

name: Ganesh Camp
description: Ganesh Camp is a lush retreat for dusty desert denizens. Tue-Fri, 1-5, celebrate and beat the heat in the bar (NA offered too) in a large, cool desert tent from India or sit by the hypnotic burn barrel at night! We have discussion groups (e.g. Stoic philosophy) before the bar opens. We have incarnated this small camp since 2003, so we have figured out some infrastructure stuff, including green infrastructure, and are happy to share our knowledge.
landmark: Rajasthani desert tent or lighted "Ganesh" sign

name: Pickled Beats
description:
Pickled Beats is where sick beats meet salty treats! Join us for two epic 4-hour Pickle Parties, featuring international DJs and signature pickle-based cocktails. 

Grab a chilled pickle from our stand, hit the bar and dance floor, or dive into Human pickle fishing and Pickle blessings. 

Whether you're here to party or pledge your devotion to the pickle, come get pickled!
landmark: 20ft flag pole with purple, orange & green flags

name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
description: An old school vintage tiki and pirate bar.  Deadly tiki potions. A retro future Spaceport. High octane drinks.  Our 2025 Surrealist art expo.  Trippy art. Speakers and more!
landmark: The pirate ship

name: Oontz Pouch
landmark: Circus Tent

name: Never Never Camp
description: Welcome to Never Never Camp - a magical land of sunset weddings, disco laser caves, and bottom-shelf drinks with top-shelf entertainment. Find our Second Bar to the Right for daily happy hours (ask about our exclusive Birgin special!), come see the view of the playa from our rooftop platform, get married at sunset in our wedding chapel, or dance the night away in our laser-filled disco cave. None of this sounds appealing? Come by anyway, hijack our sound system or bar, and make it your own - we're always ready to get weird.
landmark: two-story wood structure, NEVER NEVER CAMP sign

name: Redhanded
description: Caught red-handed by your bodily functions? We've got your back! Stop by our elegant Victorian period lounge for period-themed drinks, and precious period supplies while enjoying fun live events. Got dust in curious places? We'll help you freshen up sustainably. Need extra care? Our cozy Red(handed) Tent offers specialized support when you're bleeding or just having a tough day. Oh, and we've got pee funnels â€” because nothing feels quite as empowering as peeing standing up like a boss. Come sip, vent, and refresh with us at Redhanded!
landmark: White canopy shade with red curtains, wooden sign.

name: Pink Fuzzy Monkey
description: Love to play, dance, and monkey around. Our lounge will be spinning tunes for every taste throughout the day. We love playing music throughout the day, with a more intimate experience on our 20x30 dance floor and 600â€watt sound.  Monday is the our 11th annual Super Hero Underwear Monkey Party with tasty monkey juice at the Monkey Bar (alcoholic or not). Throughout the week, we will keep the playa charged up with our fruit charging stations and entertained by playing Monkey Mayhem. Tuesday and Thursday morning/early afternoon dance/hangout parties. With a large community shade structure we invite anyone to stop by and chill for a bit, get out of the sun, and meet new friends, any time of the day.
landmark: Pink Monkey Flags

name: Swirl Support
description: Basecamp / garage for Chosen Yogurt.
landmark: A pink sign that says Swirl Support

name: A Playa Home Companion
description: We are dedicated to the betterment of the greater community through interpersonal interactions, compassionate education, and supportive patience while embracing and uplifting creativity, authenticity, and diversity. We strive to provide a safe, supporting, and caring environment for rejuvenation and connection to encourage self care, self-expression, and community support.
landmark: White Shade with an antique radio on a small stage

name: Android Oasis
description: Android Oasis offers a refreshing and reinvigorating respite from the heat and harshness of the playa. We offer a staffed  "brain & body spa" with multiple areas to take a load off and be treated to cold refreshments and body work. Come by for misting, massage, mindful music, and a mental break. Stay for the vibes, vines, and vivacious community!
landmark: Palm trees and white geodesic dome

name: Rumpus
description: Morning cereal, crafts and remedies, fun and games, non-electronic beats, and a chill bar.
landmark: purple flags and blue and tan shade.

name: PP - Petanque and Pastis
description:
Come by and say hello to learn how to play pÃ©tanque and enjoy a drink of pastis.
Spending time with us will definitely feels like visiting the south region of France and will let you discover the charming accent of Marseille, ambience from a fresh summer with light cicadas noise and slow local music playing.
landmark: Carport with all the colored fabrics!

name: MESA
description: A sanctuary where the spirit of community, self-expression, and well-being converge. Our vibrant, shaded oasis offers a diverse array of experiences, from drum circles under starlit skies to sunrise yoga sessions, fireside mezcal nights and even late night volleyball (it's lit)!  With a dedication to Radical Inclusion, we welcome all seekers to our haven of pillows, rugs, and couches, where connections are forged, creativity flourishes, and transformative journeys unfold.
landmark: Shipping containers with steps to a chill space

name: RhythmWave
description: RhythmWave brings Conscious Dance to the Playa, along with yoga and other movement practices. 5Rhythms, Open Floor, Soul Motion and others. We offer a space to figure out what is going on inside you and to move through it. Not just a place to show off your latest dance moves. Our offerings are made on a sprung bamboo wood floor beneath a shade structure, and are offered several times daily.
landmark: Hard wood dance floor with 50'x50' shade 14' high

name: The Surge
description: Come charge your small devices at THE SURGE's bar or living room. Join us for cold-brew coffee, meditation, education, conversation in our comfortable living room with a water mister, or grab a tasty brew or shot (or NA wine) at our fabulous bar. Join us for our Cancer Survivor circle on Tuesday and/or Thursday mornings.
landmark: SURGE lit sign and solar panels above the bar

name: Playground
description: Playground is an oasis for the intrepid burner crossing the vast expanse of BRC. Filled with sights, sounds and music, Playground will entrance and delight with fun, fire and dance!
landmark: A large sound stage with eight fiery towers

name: Art Car Camp
description:
on Playa since 1994
a Place to gather and get your issues resolved  
To reunite with old friends and make new ones
Gandhi's Garage for mechanical issues
Barter Bob's Lost Camp Supplies for Gear
Madam Mo for seeing your Tomorrow Today through her many skills
landmark: tan dome with Red lit Eagle headon top   Art Cars

name: Campoline
description: We are an artsy international dive bar of friendly folks and stiff drinks under the circus bigtop of cascading parachutes. You can jump on trampolines under the stars or sun, paint, stroll through art work, belly up to the bar, listen to canned music from show tunes to punk, watch live original music and varied performances, or climb the intellectual ladder of conversation.  Just depends on the night, and the people participating, but always a dependably great time.
landmark: Red and white parachute, outside  trampolines

name: The Sultry Lodge
description:
A sultry crowd from 3 continents!

* Get your hair braided with colorful extensions at the start of the week.
* Enjoy a sultry breakfast mid-week.
* Jewelry making facilities.
* Everybody's Birthday Party. It's for you â€“ after all, you are born someday too!

And every night: A stunning Interactive UV-active Art exhibition.
Come for the art and enjoy the sultry company!
landmark: Tall slanted roof. Red flag above. Slanted walls.

name: MAXA
description: A community of wanderers, dreamers, healers, artists and storytellers around the world. sharing friendship as the only currency.
landmark: Flag with our Deer Logo that will be lit at night

name: Sakenoma
description: CLASSY 5 star no frills lounge experience with bowling, if the bar doesn't get burnt. We do SAKE
landmark: Sakenoma

name: It's Only Natural
description: Our camp offers a safe and inclusive environment for individuals wishing to participate in naturism. The space is fully enclosed, shielding participants from cell phones, cameras, and onlookers in the city. Inside, you will find a communal gathering area, with games, music, and a daily cocktail hour. We provide a friendly, non-sexualized setting for anyone wishing to experience nude recreation.
landmark: Wood fence entrance, neon "let's get naked" sign

name: Gnometopia
description:
Stop by any afternoon to partake in some Gnometivities:
Sing some Gnome songs
Hear a Gnome talk
Get a Gnome massage while listening to Gnome harp
Trade Gnome outfits
Complete a Gnome Quest

Join us for Gnome Night on Thursday night as we explore the playa together as a flock of Gnomes.

There's Gnome telling what will happen at Gnometopia!
landmark: Large gnome-hat flag and Gnometopia signage

name: Camp Equilibrium
hometown: Northen California, Bay Area, Sacramento, Canada, Florida, Australia
description:
Equilibrium has been established as a destination to represent the pinnacle for the collective first world culture in which we live: vacation. Adhering to a strict belief that our shared time together should be one of joy and relaxation, we seek to strike the all too difficult balance of hard work and play.
It is here that we have constructed a series of spaces and activities to ensure that all who step through our threshold experience the relaxation, camaraderie, and playfulness that we all deserve outside the hectic worlds of which we live the other 51 weeks of the year. "Because it's vacation for fucks sake."
landmark: Altrenating Red and Yellow flags along our frontage

name: Twilight language
landmark: Neon, lightning bolt and  diamond totem

name: Deep Playa Simulator
description: Over are the days of having to haul your ass all the way out to the trash fence to enjoy the deep open playa! Now for the first time ever experience the joys and wonders of deep playa from the comfort of the city!
landmark: Orange trash fence, sign with camp name

name: Rancho Sparkle Pony-The Reckoning
description: We operate one of the few "you call 'em, free-pour" entertainment venues on the playa: The Rubber Spur.  Contact us to hold an event, teach a workshop, learn how to run a theme camp, a world-class playa camp kitchen, learn how to operate an art car project!    Rancho Sparkle Pony is your home away from home at Playa BRC!
landmark: RANCHO SPARKLE PONY sign

name: RedNeck Regal Theatre
description: Total white trash movie nights; complete with our best white sheet hanging for a screen. BYOLC (Bring Your Own Lawn Chair) or blanket. What will be showing? WHO KNOWS? Maybe it's a musical night? Maybe it's a black and white version of Creature from the Black Lagoon? Maybe its cartoons! We make no promises. All we promise is that it's an outdoor community movie screening at its best! If the alcohol kicks in, we may even pass around a microphone and do a BMST3K! Come join us!
landmark: carport with velvet ropes and movie marquee

name: Hostel
description: Hostel offers a safe place for consenting couples to have intimate relations for up to one hour(ish), as long as they don't mind the other couples on the other beds, (it's an open floor plan)
landmark: Hostel flag

name: Dark Heart
description:
Morning community dance followed by small, intimate heart-share pods? Incredible afternoon expansive workshops? Sunset rituals? Fire art? Fire DANCE?!? Nightly temple celebrations of intimacy and joy? Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes. 

Start with our Cafe on the Edge, where you can look forward into the mystery and consider what you're going to leave behind. Take the leap into our Dark Temple, where you can plug into the void and remember what all-is-love really feels and looks like and how to bring that heaven to the heart of the playa - you! 

Come drop in with our camp of experienced, international burners who are focused on creating a loving, tight community and flowing the love out to all of you BRC citizens! We love you!
landmark: Large lighted archway with "Dark Heart" hanging

name: Barbie Day Spa
description: Get pampered at Barbie Day Spa: Fingernail painting, foot soaks, foot massage, body wash, erotic massage, cold drinks.
landmark: Nail Spa Flags

name: Camp Against The Machine
description: Destroy machine, return to monkey!
landmark: Green and Red Flag with Grey Robot and Banner

name: Giraffelot
description:
From the academy-award winning studio and imagineers renowned for bringing participants TEN YEARS of well-known adventures like GIRAFFIC PARK, GIRAFFIC WORLD, AER JIRAFFA, ROYAL GIRAFFIC CRUISELINES and the astounding trilogy of UNION GIRAFFIC RAILWAYS PART(s) I & II comes an all-new cinematic masterpiece: GIRAFFELOT.

This dusty time-bending magical adventure promises to be the best renaissance-fair-dungeons-and-dragons-arthurian-legend-themed-camp-adventure of the summer.
landmark: Dual 20-foot tall fire-breathing steel giraffes

name: The Virgin Barry's
description: Welcome to The Virgin Barry's.  We are camp founded by a community that met through fitness.  We are delighted to bring the gift of fitness to The Playa.  Come join us to get your fitness on at Burning Man.
landmark: Black banner: "The Virgin Barry's" & white chevron

name: YES IS MORE
description: Say YES to MORE! More love, more dancing, more awkward interactions. We're here for a good time, not a long time. Come say YES to being MORE in the moment.
landmark: The YES IS MORE sign

name: Cafe Diem
description: We are an immersive cafe experience where each cup of coffee or tea is lovingly made. Take a break from the playa and enjoy the ritual of sipping coffee or tea from a handmade cup under our airy shade structure. Stroll around to check out our art, play board games, or socialize and make new friends. We happily serve cold brew and French press as well as a wide array of teas from around the world including classic and herbal varieties, not to mention hand-crafted sodas.
landmark: Tall wooden tensegrity tower supporting a canopy

name: Space Cowboys
description:
Shakin Yo Business again on the Playa!

The cowgirls and cowboys are back yet again with their version of the Wild West. 

Travel the playa on the Martha - An Art Car with Love & personality. Martha < 3's you! An experience to the edge of the playa.
M, Tu, W; 4p - 7p - Learn Argentine Tango
All day every day - play Gigantic games in camp

Put on your best duds and enjoy your experience at the Space Cowboy Lounge where we barter, trade, howl, laugh, dance, and share liquid libations, music, and much, much more. Bring a bottle, a twelve-pack, or a bag or two of ice to make your lounge hours cool and comfortable. 

Be sure to join us for the Black Rock Hoe Down, a hidden party gem.
SOMEWHERE! A party that will be out of this world.
landmark: Space Cowboys - metal sign, Blue & Orange @ night

name: Consensual Abduction
description: At Consensual Abduction, you'll find a crew of stranded aliens hoping to abduct you into their luxurious spacecraft. In the daytime, come wiggle your limbs on our shady dance floor, fuel up with a refreshing cocktail, or enjoy galactic-sized Consensual Abduction (aren't you curious what that is?). All visitors / abductees can expect strange surprises, silly daily themes, & thoughtful gifts throughout their excursion so come connect, get weird, & let loose with us!
landmark: Camp Sign, light up circular sign, a large flag

name: Camp Shark Cage
description: Welcome to the playa's one and only nautical Nicolas Cage theme camp!  Come steal the Declaration of Independence with us.
landmark: Nic Cage Burn Barrel

name: DUSTFISH
description: DUSTFISH, serving Love and Pho all week.
landmark: The Huge Cauldron hanging from a Gantry Crane.

name: Mos Eisley Village
description:
Mos Eisley... 
You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy. 

We must be cautious.
landmark: Rainbow Star Destroyer signs, 300' LED tether, MV

name: Oceyolotl Sanctuary
description: Jaguar Temple welcomes burners for evening healing ceremonies, traditional Mexican live music, out of this world singing, legends telling and much more spiritual and fun experiences. Enjoy our special cacao, rituals and magical atmosphere!
landmark: Jaguar Art and flag with camp's name

name: Birthday Camp
description: At Birthday Camp, every day is a reason to celebrate. We throw daily birthday parties open to all, complete with cake, party hats, games, and surprise presents. Whether it's your actual birthday or you just want to feel seen and appreciated, you're invited to join the fun. Our camp is a playful, welcoming space designed to spark joy, connection, and a sense of belonging. Come celebrate yourself and othersâ€”because on the playa, everyone deserves a birthday party.
landmark: A giant birthday cake you can jump out of

name: SOLARPUNKS
description:
We're a community of creatives and applied technologists who are harnessing the power of solar energy to fuel our festivities. SOLARPUNKS is an exploration into what society could look like if humanity learns to wield technology to live equitably with our environment and with each other. 

We're here to offer a renewable energy alternative to Hell Station called SOLAR STATION, which will provide free clean electrons to BRC citizens. This is a utility-scale offering that we hope can inspire and meaningfully contribute to decarbonization efforts both on and off playa.
landmark: large solar arrays next to SOLAR STATION

name: MUSE (Maenad University)
description: The Maenad University for the Study of the Esoteric (M.U.S.E.) is a tribute to the deity Dionyus and offers a temple space for offerings as well as for our interactivity which ranges from spiritual to silly. We offer a 24 hour labyrinth for visitors to use as well as a kiosk which will host a variety of camp run and visitor run interactivity. We are a very welcoming group and you are free to say hi and chat with us when we are out and about.
landmark: A  ground based, Lighted seven ring labyrinth

name: No Drama Camp
description: We are all inclusive Camp that provides the Citizens of Black Rock City with a fun and interesting place to stop by for a Drink at our No Drama Bar.  We host many daily events under our large shade structure. Nightly DJ's play music for those stopping by on their way around the Playa.  Enjoy our fun oversized Bar Games, while you sip some of the best drinks to be found.  There is always something happening that you don't want to miss at No Drama Camp and Bar.
landmark: 20ft Black and White No Drama Bar sign

name: OHF- One Human Family
description: From Macedonia to Florida, our camp welcomes everyone to chill in our comfortable space and recharge. Coffee and Tea offered daily along with Conch Blowing, Yoga, Jewelry making and great discussions. Come join us as One Human Family.
landmark: SIGNE COFFEE and Wild 3D UV decoration.

name: Yeah Man!
description: The playa fabulous version of your favorite small town dive bar.  Music selection includes but is not limited to: Hip-Hop, Latin (Cumbia, Afrobeat, Pop Latino, etc.), Old School, Jam Bands, Classic Rock, House, Techno, and more.  Carpeted, shaded dance area with a bar and a pink silicone stripper pole.  Ambient lighting and disco ball at night.  Spank stamp paddles, hula-hoops and Misguidance Counseling.
landmark: Yeah Man! in big red letters.

name: Fatwatt
description: Experience Ego Death, an interactive electric chair.
landmark: "Fatwatt" sign & Ego Death electric chair

name: Black Rock Travel Agency
description: The Black Rock Travel Agency is a gang of pilots, aviation enthusiasts, and adventurers who come together every year to serve the airport village and its visitors located at the end of Point5. Yes, there is an airport! BRTA makes it just like you imagine a Burning Man Airport would be. A massive Starport pyramid structure with entertainment and bar underneath with 30 foot viewing platform above? Yes! A super yummy galley serving pancake breakfast and bbq? Yes!
